Summary: BEST hotel on harbor blvd! This hotel has the friendliest and kind people who were very accommodating and helpful! They have everything you need here for families with young children and babies! We enjoyed talking to all the staff everyday! The rooms were very clean and comfortable! It’s a really short easy walk to Disneyland and it’s great having the on-site restaurant and convenience store for coffee in the morning and everything you need! We definitely look forward to staying again!  I’ve never been at a hotel with nicer staff!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Minutes away from Disneyland and worth every penny!
Summary: From a seamless check in experience with Kristopher, to a stylish and functional room the Anaheim Hotel is the perfect spot for anyone visiting the Anaheim Resort area. We had a mix up with Expedia (which they were quick to fix)  and Kristopher made the check in personable and pleasant. He provided us a ready room upon arrival (which was great as we had a long morning of travel from Florida). Kristopher offered great local area dining recommendations and was very friendly. The hotel grounds were clean and anytime we requested an amenity it was delivered promptly. Housekeeping was always quick to refresh our room before we came back for an afternoon nap or pool time. The hotel bar was nice and comfy  and Abel offered great conversations and drinks. Jonathan the Front Office
Manager Response: Hello Gregory,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that Kristopher and Jonathan were so helpful, and that you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: We had a great stay at the Anaheim Hotel, we went to Disney and had a great experience with Candy at the front desk.
Summary: We had a good experience, Candy at the front desk was absolutely so sweet to us and made our stay great. The rooms we very outdated there could be lots of things done, coming out of the shower and it be title I almost slipped three times it is very unsafe towels don’t do anything to help that but over all we really liked this place, the pizza place was awesome the bar was great perfect walking distance to and from the park. We really liked it here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The proximity to Disneyland & comfort of the rooms & cleanliness of the rooms was top notch! We will definitely be staying here again! The rooms were spacious as well. The beds were incredibly comfortable!
Manager Response: We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff were so helpful, that's truly what it's all about for us. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo made it possible for me to park seamlessly at the hotel.  He is amazing, friendly and just a peach!!!! Thank you for all your assistance this morning.  Even though it’s busy Leo is ensuring we all are assisted timely -
Manager Response: Hi!  Thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful. That's where the magic is! We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Thank you Leo!! He did an amazing job managing a very difficult parking situation. He’s the reason we come back here. Very close to the park and made our overall trip so convenient. Love the brand and decor. This is a great hotel and it shows when they have amazing staff like Leo!!!
Manager Response: Hello There!  Thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly. That's where the magic is! We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My family and I frequently stay at the Anaheim hotel. On this particular trip, for the first time since staying here over the years, our room had several flaws. I received an email asking for a mid-stay report after our first night. I mentioned the items and within one minute (not joking) I received a call from the manager who immediately moved us to a new room and made our stay so much more enjoyable. We will continue to be loyal customers of the Anaheim for years to come.
Manager Response: Hello Debra,  Thank you for your review. We are so happy that things turned around for you, and that you enjoyed your stay. We Look forward to your visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel is amazing! It is our favorite place to stay when we visit Disneyland. The room is incredible, the beds are super comfortable and water pressure in the shower is so amazing it feels like you're getting a massage. The proximity to the park is the cherry on top for this awesome hotel because they are a very short walk right across the street to get into the park.  The staff is all incredibly friendly and helpful, it's like an extension of the happiest place on Earth.
Manager Response: Hello Timothy,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Love the room, it was large and clean. Hotel staff is friendly and so accommodating. The grounds are beautiful. It has a very large pool area. The gift shop has everything you could need plus some cute Disney items. The ability to do laundry was very helpful.
Manager Response: Hello Tina,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Nowhere better than the Anaheim Hotel when at Disneyland
Summary: I always have the best time at the Anaheim Hotel. I have been going there since it was the Anaheim Plaza (long time ago) it just gets better and better. The people they have their are so professional and accommodating the hotel itself brings you back to mid century and it’s such a great transformation when you are enjoying your time away from home The rooms are modest, clean and incredibly comfortable. The pool area is amazing. I think the best part like I mentioned before is the staff and specifically Candi the front desk Manager. During my stay, I witnessed her greet every single guest my name, and ask them how their time was at the hotel. Candi did everything inner power to make out stay as of comfortable as possible.  I am actually a Disney  Vacation Club member and I could
Manager Response: Hello Staci,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful. We hope to see you soon.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Hotel is a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland front gate. Very convenient. There are places to eat within walking distance as well. The housekeeping staff is fantastic. Even with a lot of clothes and suitcases strewn about the room they manage to make the beds and clean the bathroom. The front desk staff is super friendly and helpful. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Terri,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

There is a nice heated large pool for the kids to swim in and burn off some energy. Location is really close to the Disneyland entrance.

Summary: Very clean and comfortable rooms . Staff were amazing and helpful. The hotel is walking distance to Disney.  Very clean outdoor environment and love the play area for kids. The pool was really nice and big.
Manager Response: Hello Wendy,  Thank you for your review!  We are happy that you enjoyed your visit, and we hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights and had a blast! Spacious rooms, friendly staff, great pizza restaurant on sight,  there's also a bar in the lobby with yummy eats and drinks! We stayed in 2 king room! What!? 2 kings, I've never! The grounds are absolutely beautiful 🦩
Manager Response: Hello Christa,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time that you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This place is perfect if you are going to Disneyland.  My wife and I brought our 19 month old and it was a 5 minute walk to Disney.  We received great service and received a great room.  Highly recommend

Manager Response: Hello Lauren,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and our property. I utilized the pre-check in process, which made when we arrived and checked out a breeze. We will definitely be staying here again on our next trip.
Manager Response: Hello Kat,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time that you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Affordable rates, great bed and pillows, great staff, Sam at the desk and Sandra at the bar were great too. Everything was clean and everyone was helpful if we needed anything. Thanks for a happy and comfortable stay, w’ell be back.

Summary: I really enjoy staying at this hotel. Everyone is always so helpful. The hotel is just close enough to Disneyland. The room is clean and very comfortable especially the beds. I stay here whenever I'm in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello Speeni,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We thank you for your loyalty, and we look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

The pool and hot tub are fantastic. We have stayed at other locations on previous trips, but none measured up to the Anaheim hotel. will be staying at the Anaheim hotel for all future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Scott,  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful. That's truly what it's all about for us. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Comfort, Mid-Century Vibe, Close to Main Gate.
Summary: We Love the location, theme, vibe, and comfort of The Anaheim.  It is beautifully landscaped and we love the mid-century vibe.  Paid Parking is not cool, but everything else is terrific.  This is a 10 minute walk to Main Gate.
Manager Response: Hello David,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property, and your stay! We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: My new favorite hotel for visiting the Disneyland Resort!
Summary: This place is an oasis of calm.  The rooms are quiet and well furnished with super comfy beds.  Everyone who works there is so helpful and friendly.  The grounds are just lovely. It's a total escape.
Manager Response: Hello Kathleen,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time that you visit Disneyland, or just need to get away!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo was great! We came with our little puppy Sadie and we have never felt more welcome! He was so nice, friendly and accommodating! Definitely the best first impression for a hotel. We love Leo! Definitely will be back!
Manager Response: Hello Brianna,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Always a great stay staff is very accommodating. Convenient location to enter park. Leo welcomes us and is like an old friend when we return. Front desk helpful with rooms with handicap access.  Looking forward to our next trip.
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property. We hope that you choose our hotel again the next time that you visit Anaheim.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We were greeted as soon as we arrived. Everyone was very friendly. And really went above and beyond. I didn’t get the name of the gentleman that helped me up front but he really made my first impression a great one. After our day at Disneyland it was a short nice walk back to the hotel and Candy greeted us. We were in need of a good coffee and she went out of her way to get us a nice hot coffee (we are big on coffee) so that really made our night.  The pizza press was great for a quick dinner. We will definitely be back!  10/10 if you’re looking for a hotel near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello There!  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property. We hope that you choose our hotel again the next time that you visit Anaheim.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Great location 10 minutes to Disney and multiple places to eat was key for this trip.  No car rental was a good saving expense . Loved the playground and surrounding green areas.  The modern decor indoor and outdoor was very interesting. Staff polite and friendly specially Marco.  The pool and jacuzzi was a bonus after having a long day at Disney.  The pizzeria had very good pizza.  The complimentary coffee also was very convenient.
Manager Response: Hello Sonia,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we hope that you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland and California Adventure
Summary: The Anaheim Hotel always takes great care of us when we visit.  Being disabled they provide the rooms I need to be able to have fun and rest before and after spending a day at Disneyland.  This last time they also took care of reserving and ensuring that a scooter was ready for my husband who has a broken foot so couldn’t walk as normal.    We always recommend this hotel.  It’s within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure.
Manager Response: Hello Kevin,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff were so helpful, that's truly what it's all about for us. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Booked a room here for our Disneyland trip and I’m glad we did. This hotel is walking distance to the park. Perfect for mid day breaks. They have a great pizza restaurant. The service is great, the rooms are clean and comfortable. Will be booking here again
Manager Response: Hello Shelby,  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we hope that you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Retro, fun, clean and close to Disney!
Summary: The staff at the Anaheim Hotel are the friendliest and most helpful that you will find. The hotel is close to the entrance to Disneyland so an easy walk when you are tired. I love the retro look of the hotel. But, the reason we always go back there is the staff and the cleanliness of the hotel and the rooms. The beds are very comfortable which is important after a long day at Disney!
Manager Response: Hello Rebecca,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope you choose our hotel again the next time that you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Love the first visit so well we stayed again . Our balcony faced Disneyland and enjoyed a view if the fireworks.  Daily room cleaning is fantastic. The Pizza Press restaurant was tastey and reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Hello GD,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your visit! We hope that you choose our hotel again the next time that you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We just completed a great stay at The Anaheim Hotel. Everything is clean, clean clean. The room was designed and decorated with functionality in mind and very new and not outdated. For a 40+ year hotel this place is well maintained and has a lot of great amenities. Proximity to Disney is second to none and it is next to the Garden Walk which has a bunch of great restaurants and activities    Take home message is that customer service prevails. The customer service we received was second to none and on par with 4 seasons Ko’Alina Hawaii, Disney California Grand and Disney Aluani Hawaii. Abel the bartender is hard working and a fine craftsman of mixology and Candi, the front desk manger, can write the book on Hospitality Management and customer service. We haven’t had a home since
Manager Response: Hello Dustin,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and have already booked your next trip! We are looking forward to it.   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Super place to stay! Clean, pretty grounds & pool, awesome lobby, great staff! Candi, Kristopher, Sam, Leo, Melissa, Marissa and the Pizza Press staff in the mornings are so nice! Distance to DL is 5 minutes!
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that our staff are so helpful, and that you always enjoy your stay. See you soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I love this hotel.   It has a more adult vibe than most hotels around Disney with a cool, mid century theme.  If you’d like to leave the park and get out of the Disney bubble, this hotel is for you.  The rooms with balconies are so cozy and the space is lovely.   The lobby bar is so great after a day at the parks.  The grounds are beautiful and the pool is awesome.  My only complaint is that the pool was not heated during our stay.   The pool is a big part of why we choose this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Julie,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We do apologize about the pool. Our pool is heated but unfortunately you were here when we cycled the water out this week, and had to reheat it. It is warm again! We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Such a beautiful and fun hotel! Everything you need is on site. The Pizza Press is a great place to eat at in the hotel. Fun outdoor games and a beautiful pool. Rooms are accommodating and comfortable. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hello Mindy,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property. We hope that you choose our hotel again the next time that you visit Anaheim.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is our home away from home. We are longtime frequent guests as Disneyland Magic Key holders. Location, location, location! Literally steps away from the Disneyland Resort. Prime location to Anaheim Garden Walk, and the Convention Center. The staff is professional, friendly, and very helpful. (Thank you Candi! As always, we appreciate your help. See you soon!) The accommodations are spacious, modern, and always clean. I sleep better in their beds than I do at home. The pool is the largest of any property near the parks. You’ll love the vibe in the pool area. The adjacent Pizza Press restaurant is an added bonus. Their pizza is amazing! We are already looking forward to our next visit. Stay at The Anaheim Hotel. You’ll be very happy and comfortable here!
Manager Response: Hi Bryan!  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you always enjoy your stays, and that you continue to come back! We are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Great stay and great customer service.  The proximity to Disneyland is great.  You can easily head back to the hotel to take a break during the day.  The property was beautiful and we'd love to explore it more in nicer weather (it rained our whole trip).  There is a restaurant on property and a nice lounge in the lobby.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that our team was so helpful. Please keep an eye out on our website for updates, as we are always looking for ways to enhance the customer experience, and would love to accommodate you in the future. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My family (from Canada) has stayed at the Anaheim Hotel many times over years and we have a fantastic stay every single time.  It is my daughter's favorite hotel and she insists we stay there every Disney visit. You really can't beat the 5 minute walk to Disneyland. As soon as you walk into the hotel you are greeted with smiles and friendly faces, not to mention the hotel smells amazing. Pizza press offers fantastic food and the cute bar in the hotel is great to sit and have a drink and take a photo. Our beds are always extremely comfortable, the room is always clean and made up the next day without fail. We like to book the 2nd floor balcony room facing the park to watch the fireworks in the evenings that we are too tired to stay in the parks. Big shout out to Candi, she made
Manager Response: Hi Tiffany!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you have enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to seeing you again during your next trip to Disneyland.   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo is the Bell Captain and his kindness and attention is top notch; so warm and friendly you'll feel like you've known him forever!! The location is perfect for Disney and perfect for fireworks view from certain buildings; the lively lobby and updated rooms are above par. Highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, even with the rainy skies. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

They really warmed my heart and surprised us with balloons and a sweet note to celebrate our special occasion. 💖  We loved Leo, who treated my mom like a queen and had her laughing constantly.  The beds are very comfy, and the bar had the best mojito I've ever had! The pool looked amazing, but the weather was too cold to try it, so we will definitely enjoy that for a summer visit! The hotel is an easy,  safe, and short walk to Disney's main entrance, with great nearby dining, including an on-site pizza place. They also offer early check-in and/or will hold your luggage until the room is ready so you can enjoy the parks as soon as you
Manager Response: HI!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and the staff was so helpful. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel was wonderful. We were very close to the parks. They were extremely accommodating with requests. My kids loved the pool and the music was so much fun. It was so nice to have our own little patio and the. Ed’s and pillows were very comfortable!
Manager Response: Hello There!  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you had such a great time, and the kids loved the pool. It is the largest in all of Anaheim! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Love this hotel. Great service and friendly staff. The pool is huge with a spa. Bar is a nice vibe and friendly bartenders. Pizza place is really good and have nice beer. This is our second time staying here and we'll be back for sure!!
Manager Response: Hi Mike!  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that our team was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great location and staff, okay rooms
Summary: The staff at the hotel are amazing! They are super friendly and want to ensure you have the best stay. It was only a 5 minute walk from the entrance of Disneyland, you really can't beat the location! The room was clean and the beds were comfortable but the bathroom could use some work. The shower water temperature fluctuated a lot and we could only get a small amount of water to come out of the shower head. The drain also drains very slowly so you end up having your shower in a bath full of water. They don't have microwaves in the rooms but they were able to provide me with one for $15. I didn't get a chance to use the pool but it always looked clean when we walked past. Overall, it was a decent hotel for the price and I would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that our team was so helpful. Please keep an eye out on our website for updates, as we are always looking for ways to enhance the customer experience, and would love to accommodate you in the future. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: After my arrival to meet my group, Candi provided amazing service and was entirely helpful. All the staff was super friendly and attentive. Drinks at the bar were delicious as well as the PIZZA! It was Chefs kiss!! Parking was tight but had no issues. Didn’t get a chance to enjoy the pool as it was raining the whole stay. With that said It was nice to come back to a clean, warm room.  Thank you Anaheim Hotel!
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My wife and I stay here for 4 nights recently.  The location is really good, close to Disney and a lot of restaurants and shops.  All the staff we encountered during our stay were great.  The rooms are alright but a little dated and run down.  Our bed had been well used and not the most comfortable anymore.  Pool and hot tub were nice.  I wouldn't recommend getting breakfast at the hotel.  We waited 40 mins for two breakfast sandwiches which were overpriced and alright at best.  We needed to stay in the area for a couple more nights and decided to move to a close by hotel that was more modern, had more amenities, and was considerably less expensive.  This isn't a bad hotel by any means I just think there are better options in the area.
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that our location worked well for you, and that our staff was so helpful. Regarding your room, we apologize for your inconveniences, and management is addressing your concerns. We are in the process of updating all of our beds. We have also noted your Pizza Press concerns, and will bring them up to their management team. We would love to bring you back here for another visit, please call the hotel and ask for any front desk manager and we will assist you.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Nicely updated and convenient walk to Disneyland
Summary: I booked a parkview room and loved it!  Huge room, lovely balcony, close to the street we needed to walk on, totally worth the small upgrade charge. We were very pleased overall with this hotel.  Friendly staff, great location to Disney gates, not noisy.  Yes, it is older and has been remodeled, but most of those hotels are older - that's just how it is. Would defintely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello MD,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My husband and I went to Disneyland for one day and stayed at the Anaheim Hotel. There's a restaurant there called the Pizza Press and it was delicious. The Hotel is about 11 minutes walking from Disneyland. The Hotel was clean and our room was clean. Everything was good and I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great Disneyland Hotel with beautiful outdoor spaces
Summary: Perfect hotel for a Disneyland trip. Staff was all very friendly & helpful, rooms were clean and nicely decorated, no frills except PRIVATE OUTDOOR SPACE! This was a totally unexpected treat but our room had a large deck with 2 chairs and a small table and a decent view of the Disney fireworks!! All rooms have that or a private patio. Beautiful grounds and a huge pool! Wish it was warmer & I’d add a day to take meetings by the pool! ;) We traveled with two college sons, brought our own snacks and breakfast bars and had a great time. Will stay again! Thank you Anaheim Hotel!
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: A friend and I stayed at The Anaheim Hotel in December, we took 4 toddlers 3 and under.  From the moment we got out of the car Leo that’s Usually in the front was so friendly and welcoming! He helped come up with a solution to get us in our room with all tots in one trip and also helped us locate a double stroller when ours wasn’t doing the trick! He was patient with our children and with us as we seemed to drop something here or there as we were on the way to our room! The room was decent, it was clean, the patio area was very spacious, the ceilings are out dated, the tvs are nice and big with a ton of channels! There’s a little store with essentials (good variety of booze),there a little bar and a delicious pizza press restaurant in the same building. The gym seemed clean
Manager Response: Hello There!  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My whole family loves this place. You just can’t beat the service and overall value for the price! My husband and I stay here every time we go to Disneyland, and as Magic Key holders, that’s around 10 trips per year. We even stayed here during the pandemic when the parks were closed, and it was still awesome. Comfortable beds, a FANTASTIC swimming pool with cool jazz music playing all day, movies screened at night for the family, and good food onsite at the Pizza Press. They make a lot of effort to have a cohesive, mid-century vibe throughout the property and you can practically see the Disneyland main gate from the hotel! Candi at the front desk was awesome as usual, and always willing to make special accommodations if needed. Even the pizza press staff are terrific…last time i
Manager Response: Hello Audrey,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you always choose our hotel, and we are looking forward to your next stay!   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Great staff, great location to Disney land, awesome pool ( hot tub could be a tad warmer ), overall good stay. Only things I would change are small changes: one Washing machine was broken so hard to plan, gift shop could have offered more snacks/drinks.
Manager Response: Hello Pam,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Perfect Location and Wonderful Service! Our Home Away from Home!
Summary: We just finished a 7 night stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We extended our original stay and Candi was wonderful with amending my reservation and securing the suite we needed for our family! We always appreciate her help when there are hiccups in our schedule or if we have a request or even a need for an additional amenity.  We've stayed at this hotel multiple times and compared to other hotels near Disneyland, we love it here most! There is plenty of parking and the spaces are big, not tight like other places. The hotel grounds are beautiful, along witha gym, pool, laundry area, and a very nice lobby with a bar.  The Pizza Press is located onsite as well and is very convenient. Candi and Jonathan at the front desk, as well as Mike in Valet were a great help! I had multiple families
Manager Response: Hello Joyce,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Excellent location and experience, just walking distance from Disneyland, and many restaurants.  From the moment we arrived, we were greeted by Leo's smiling, cheerful face!!! Leo is such a wonderful person, and made us feel so welcome!!! Our room was clean and nice. The beds were comfortable. The pool area looked very nice and clean, but it was too cold for us to go swimming this time of year. All-in-all, our stay was very pleasant, and I would definitely go back to stay at The Anaheim next time we visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hello there!  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful!  We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We fly in on December 30th and was our first time staying at the hotel. Our room was already set right before check in so I was glad we could get our room. The beds were really comfortable to sleep in and the walk to Disneyland was so close.
Manager Response: Hello there!  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Anaheim Hotel, a great place to stay.
Summary: This hotel is one of the closest to Disneyland park, just across the street from the park. Wait, that’s not all it has to offer, big clean rooms, secured parking with security actually walking around the lot every few minutes ( I happened to observe these, and I like that they take the security and safety of the travelers and their things seriously. Requests are promptly handled by staff and there is always help when you need it. And the staff from the guy located outside the entrance to the ladies behind the counter they’re all very professional and polite. To Ms Candi Crowe who helped us booked our stay, thank you so much! You made our vacation stress free and memorable.
Manager Response: Hello Andrew,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My family and I spent the holiday at Disneyland. The location of the hotel was excellent. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable of the area. This is why I always book a room here when going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello MarNun  Thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit. We thank you for your loyalty with always choosing our hotel. See you next time!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Our new favorite place to stay!!
Summary: Had an awesome stay here! The staff is so kind and helpful and really made our stay feel special. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Walk to park is easy peasy and the Pizza Press was delish and so nice to have right near us! We will definitely be back!! Special thanks to Candi for helping us find the perfect room!!
Manager Response: Hello Teresa,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit, and we are looking forward to your next stay.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We spent 11/28, 11/29, 11/30 & 12/1/22 at the Anaheim Hotel. First, I'd like to mention Leo. I ordered a scooter to be delivered to the Hotel the morning of 11/29.  When I went to the Lobby to pick it up, Leo, who works at the Bell desk showed me how to operate the scooter.  He was so helpful and nice and he had the best sense of humor!!  Excellent customer service!!  Our room was nice,
Manager Response: Hello Susie,  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that Leo was so helpful, he is great! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Best Hotel in the resort area. I have been coming to Disneyland with my Family, once or twice per year for over 20 years. I have stayed at almost every hotel on Harbor. I discovered the Anaheim hotel while in a solo trip in July 2022. Just brought my wife and son down for Christmas and decided to stay here again. It was even better than the first time! Candi and Elizabeth at the front desk were amazing and very accommodating the entire time. The pool is huge! Our room had a private balcony to watch the fireworks. When I stayed in July, they had movies playing at the pool at night, awesome for kids. They have several outdoor activity areas, much better parking options a great lounge and gift shop. I can’t give this place a higher rating. I will be back.
Manager Response: Hi!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! That is what it's all about for us! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel has been my husband and I go to for years. It's located across the street from Disneyland. You can see the Guardians of the Galaxy Tower from the front of the hotel. The rooms are large and clean. The Customer service is excellent. The woman at the front desk were so helpful and friendly. They went above and beyond to make sure our stay was the best.  They have The Pizza Press restaurant on site, very convenient. We will definitely continue to come here for all our Disneyland visits.  Great job Anaheim Hotel.
Manager Response: Hey!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great Hotel across from Disneyland,  Very clean and comfortable rooms. Exceptional Customer Service
Summary: Great Staff.  Candi the Asst Front Desk Manager was amazing.  She looked after our every need and made us feel very welcome. We will definitly be back again and would most certainly recommend the hotel to family and friends and others around the world.
Manager Response: Hello There!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for family visiting Disneyland
Summary: My wife and I just stayed here with my two young boys over Christmas and had a great stay. Large room for us all to spread out a bit. A nice heated pool and spa which we used once and enjoyed. Perfect location to walk over to Disneyland each day as it’s just over the road. Plenty of places to eat and drink within a couple of minutes walk. Walgreens and 7-11 nearby was handy to buy snacks and drinks at to take into Disneyland each day which helped the budget. Helpful hint for visiting Disneyland….pay the extra for the Genie service on app and use single rider on the rides that offer it if you can. Doing both saved us heaps of time by not having to line up and then we were able to ride nearly every ride in 1 day at California Land and 2 days at Disneyland. Will definitely stay at
Manager Response: Hello Nick,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I know this is an an older hotel and that was not the issue. Staff was extremely friendly, lots of nearby dining options, and the park was only a 10 minute walk. My issue was the size of the room. The beds sit flush against each side of the wall so no space. The restroom was the smallest restroom I have ever seen. There is no way 2 people can be in there at the same time.
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your review. Looking at your reservation you booked one of our smallest room types. We have many other room types to choose from, including our Double King Executive Room. I would recommend that for you, and your family. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Everyone in hospitality was super accommodating.
Summary: I was looking for a place walking distance from the Disneyland park entrance and something I could afford. This place fit both those needs.  Housekeeping and the front desk were quick to help remedy a couple small issues I had. Candi and Niecey at the front desk handled and fixed my unskillfully made reservations.
Manager Response: Hello Gail,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that our staff was so helpful, and that you are enjoying your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again. Merry Christmas! 🎄  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Although the staff are all friendly and helpful, especially Sam at front desk, I will not stay here again.  The water pressure in the shower is so low that it's impossible to get a decent shower (a multi day stay requires the ability to get a decent shower for a number of reasons) let alone wash your hair. The shampoo would never get rinsed out - as in trying to rinse under a literal trickle of water. Also the bathroom fan automatically started running when the bathroom light was turned on and the fan sounded like it was going to rattle out of the ceiling. It was so loud that I felt bad for people in the room above. The room itself (2 queens, bottom floor, 100 building) was way too small and felt dingy. The room was supposedly renovated - if that's true it's another reason I
Manager Response: Hello,  We apologize for your experience. I have attempted to locate your reservation but have been unsuccessful. I do not see any reservation under this name. We are in the process of updating all of our rooms. We have many returning, happy guest, and we want you to be one of them! Please call me at the hotel.  Candi Crowe Assistant Front Desk Manager

Summary: Outstanding service and amenities! The staff is amazing, especially Leo! Comfy beds, warm showers, and beautiful grounds! The bar had the nest mojito I've  ever had, and the adjoining Pizza Press restaurant was convenient for a bite after the parks. We'll be back for sure!
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: 1st time to disney as a family
Summary: Drove from Washington state and stayed at alot of bad hotels on the way. This hotel hit it out of the park!! Welcoming, great customer service, friendly.  We had some questions when arriving and the manager (candi c.) Helped us as did the front desk working at the time. They were helpful, friendly and very warm about it. I would totally recommend staying here,helpful front desk, bellhop was amazing, room nice,clean,pizza amazing. Lady at bar was super nice and nice to talk to.   Thank you for helping make the kids 1st Disney trip amazing.   -Davis family
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that our team was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Had a couple of issues and the hotel went over and above our expectations.  We have always stayed here and love it and this is the reason!!! We love this place.   Close to Disneyland, the Pizza Press is convenient, good and open late, the pool is big and the rooms are nice and roomy.  Especially the suites.   Front desk was awesome! We will be back as usual.
Manager Response: Hello Tisha,  We thank you for your review, and we are so happy that things turned around for you! See you next time.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: 1st time at this property and overall a good experience.  The location close to Disneyland is great for walking.  It it an older property, but they have worked hard to update and maintain it.  Friendly staff, decent food options on site or next door.  We would happily come back.
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Spacious room, plenty of towels! Very clean premises, awesome bartender's in their bar located right of of the lounge and wonderful staff! Beds are very comfortable and easy walking distance to Disneyland and many other places... great location! Parking on the premise and easy to leave and come back.
Manager Response: Hello Bonnie,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Older place but clean and can’t beat the location
Summary: I picked this place for location as the reviews said it was close to Disneyland. It is close. 15 mins from our room, ( We were at back of the resort) to be inside Disneyland. The 15 mins was with the walk, security and the lineup in. It’s an older resort, rooms were clean. Grounds were nice. We were there for 3 nights and 3 days at Disneyland so we didn’t use pool or any of the outdoor games. When you have young kids you need to be close as the days are long and their legs are short. I looked at fancier places but they were further. So location is a definite win. The pizza restaurant at the hotel is fabulous. Works great for supper if you take a break during the day. They also have beer to go to keep dads nerves together for the long Disney days. Pop machines and ice machines
Manager Response: Hello Cushman78,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your visit. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: When we first arrived we were greeted by a complete gentleman by the name of Leo . He was so accommodating as I was traveling with my disable sister. Leo is one of the kindest gentleman I ever meet .Leo went beyond the call of duty to assist my sister and I . Thank you from the bottom of my heart . He is differently an asset to your hotel . 10 stars . Thank you so much Leo . Pamela Dupont . He should be recognize for his outstanding service .
Manager Response: Hello Patricia,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your visit, and that Leo was so helpful. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We live local and have Magic Key passes for Disneyland. Hands down our favorite hotel to stay at. From the staff, to the rooms and beds (super comfortable) to their food, all amzing. We stay at least every few months and will continue to do so. Highly recommended...
Manager Response: Hello Ron,  We thank you for your review, and we thank you for your loyalty. See you soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Nice, clean hotel located within a short walking distance to the main gate of Disneyland. Our only complaint is that the heat did not work, which wasn’t comfortable for our small baby with no heat and it being so cold outside.
Manager Response: Hello Kimberly,  We thank you for your review. We apologize for the issue with the heater. Management is addressing that concern. Please reach out to our management team, we would like to make it up to you.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: For a hotel next to the Disney resort it is a really great hotel . The distance to the park is alike a 5-10 minute walk. The hotel itself , plenty of parking and it’s very clean . The Rooms are clean decent size and comfy beds .
Manager Response: Hey!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay! That is what it's all about for us. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim is a great location to Disneyland! It is literally across the street from the Guardians of the Galaxy ride. Beds are comfortable. We had a room with 2 queen beds, there are 2 sinks & a big countertop, and a separate room for toilet & tub. Our room had a refrigerator & coffee maker, no microwave - which I hear is the new thing, but I’m not a fan of microwave removal.
Manager Response: Hello There!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! That is what it's all about for us! We do apologize for the inconvenience of the missing microwave, touch base with us the next time you are in and we will make it up to you. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: The Nest Place to stay in Anaheim!
Summary: I am a member of the DVC (Disney Vacation Club) and I can stay at any Disney property but I choose to stay at the Anaheim Hotel. The people at this hotel are the best! Candy in reservations is Amazing! The atmosphere is top notch, like you have stepped back into the mid century modern age. The pool,  summer time enjoy the Olympic size pool and in the winter the steamy hot tub is the best! Just a short walk to the Park. I actually think the walk is shorter than it is to the Disneyland hotel through downtown Disney. It’s just a wonderful place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello There!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! That is what it's all about for us! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Our stay was enhanced by the large, spacious room and very close walking distance to the parks!! Rooms were quiet, clean, and comfortable! Staff are very friendly and helpful! The property has a fun 50's vibe too!
Manager Response: Hey There!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! That is what it's all about for us! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This was my third stay at this hotel and it’s one of the best near Disney property. Customer service is excellent and the rooms are spacious, comfortable, updated, and clean. We’d been at a not so great hotel for a couple days near Universal and when we got to Anaheim, my kids were thrilled. You’d have thought we were at the Four Seasons. 🤣  The lobby is the coolest and there is always someone there to greet you as you walk in the door. Oh and don’t forget the bar I’m the lobby.   I could go on and on, but I can tell you that you won’t regret staying here!
Manager Response: Hi Alissa!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! That is what it's all about for us! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is a gem amongst so many other hotels in the Disneyland area. We were fortunate enough to find this place and now we won’t stay anywhere else when we come to Disneyland. This place has everything from a nice pool to enjoy when the parks are too much,  great rooms with comfortable beds, wonderful bar and not to mention the coolest mid-century vibe and decor.   If you are fortunate enough to be helped by Candi, then you are in for a real treat. She loves her job and it shows with how wonderful she treats the guests. We will continue to spread to world and bring our friends and family. This is our home away from home.
Manager Response: Hello There!  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! That is what it's all about for us! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: The Magic starts with Leo at the Anaheim Hotel
Summary: The best part of traveling  from San Diego and  pulling into The Anaheim Hotel is being greeted by Leo. Everyone at the Hotel is amazing, but Leo makes it magical for us.  Christmas at Disneyland here we come. Thank you Anaheim Hotel for always taking great care of us.  Happy Holidays, Gina Gonzalez-Iwakiri
Manager Response: Hello Gina,  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and our property. We are thrilled that Leo was so helpful, he is great! We are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We first stayed at the Anaheim Hotel in August of 2021, and returned in July of 2022. A great online deal and proximity to Disneyland drew us in the first time, and our experience brought us back a second time. Since the hotel is in easy walking distance of the park's main gate, we didn't need a rental car, and just used Uber to get to and from the airport(s).  The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. The pool is fantastic, and the grounds are beautifully landscaped. The Pizza Press restaurant on site is very good. There is also a great selection of dining and shopping next door at the Anaheim Garden Walk. The Anaheim Hotel will be our go to for future Disneyland visits.
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and our property. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: We gave it a shot, just not for us
Summary: Staff was pleasant. Only part of property that seems updated is the lobby. We were put in Building 300 and it was SO outdated! Everything was loud too. The entry door… loud! The bathroom door… loud! The bathroom fan… loud! The sliding door… loud! The connecting room door… loud! The bathroom didn’t feel that clean. Parking was $18. It’s about a 7-10 minute walk from the park. The beds were not comfortable and the room seemed pretty small, no space on both sides of each bed for someone to get on. If you slept next to the wall, you had to crawl on the from the bottom. They did hold our luggage in a locked room until the room was ready but I was never informed the room was ready like they told me I would be. I had to call to confirm the room was ready before returning from the park.
Manager Response: Hello Nicole,  We thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that our hotel did not work out for you. We have attempted to reach out to you, but have been unsuccessful. We would love to bring you back to give us another try. We have many happy returning guest. Please reach out to our management team and we will assist you.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: A low rise Hotel with high rise amenities within walking distance of the Disneyland Resort
Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is an easy walk from both Theme Parks and Downtown Disney. Therefore, no shuttle bus is needed. Shuttle buses may be convenient, but they are often delayed by vehicular and pedestrian traffic. The Anaheim Hotel has approximately 300 rooms, making it similar in occupancy to a high-rise hotel. However, the Anaheim Hotel has none of the problems associated with waiting for elevators in multi-story hotels, which routinely are very busy, especially in the mornings, when people attempt to pack themselves into already full elevators. Also, parking is available within walking distance from one’s Anaheim Hotel room, which is not generally the case in high-rise hotels.  The Anaheim Hotel is very clean and quiet. It has a large outdoor swimming pool which is impeccably
Manager Response: Hi There Thomas!  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff is always so helpful! That is truly what it is all about for us. We hope to see you again soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel was amazing. They had entertainment in both throughout the grounds and in the lobby. Everything was kept immaculate. We had somethings delivered from Amazon and the front desk offered to deliver it to our room. I have never had a hotel go to such lengths for guests accommodations. Not even Disney world resorts went to such hospitality. We had problems with lyft for our departure for our cruise. Leo saw this and helped us come up with our solution. Leo was extremely helpful, friendly,  and polite. The only reason I did not give a 5 star was because (as in all hotels I've been in) the room would not get down to 61° F.
Manager Response: Hello Jason,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful. That is what its all about for us! We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Short walking distance to DL and very convenient.  The pizza press is right at the hotel location which is plus after long walk from DL. Large swimming pool and nice , big ground with nice decorations and bean bag toss and play area for the kids. Excellent customer service. It’s an old hotel but clean and comfortable bed , not fancy room but I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time that you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Thank you for making our trip magical!!!
Summary: A great place to stay when visiting Disneyland or any other socal destination!!! The staff are amazing and Leo is the absolute best!!! He made sure we had everything we needed and made us feel at home. We also enjoyed our time at the lounge with Matt!! When you go, order a Tranquilizer.
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: From the moment we arrived the Customer Service was amazing!! From the Valet to the front desk Manager Christopher we had fantastic service. Christoper at the front desk was so helpful and just a ray of sunshine. This was our first time here and he gave my daughter and I an amazing room. The bar is fully stocked and the food was very good, plus have an amazing bartender named Abel doesn't hurt. The rooms were nice and perfect for just sleeping in since we mostly were at Disneyland all day. I highly recommend this hotel, you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hello BettinaHart ,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit, and that our staff was so friendly. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My wife and I booked this hotel to have an unofficial anniversary trip. The staff were extremely friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful. Our room was extremely clean and accommodating. This is a hotel that is a quick walk to Disneyland and we will definitely book this again in the near future.
Manager Response: Hello Caleb,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you spent your anniversary with us, and we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. Happy Anniversary! We hope that you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I just want to take the time to say thank you in behalf of me and my boyfriend to a great front desk assistant manager Candy for having an amazing customer service attitude. We had a great time and really appreciated how friendly and professional she was. You had no idea how badly we needed some rest after a terrible experience being stuck in traffic for more than 5 hrs. You were a blessing and we will be forever grateful for your hospitality and kindness! We hope to come to this place again very soon.
Manager Response: Hello Anna,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that everything worked out, and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim hotel is a place out of a retro lovers dream. It has a welcoming parking lot that allows Disney parking if you’re interested with the stay (and extended for a small cost.)  The walk to Disneyland or Disney California Adventure is just as far as waking from downtown Disney parking lot to the entrance if not a bit shorter.   The hotel itself has great variety of room types but ours was a 2 bed situation since I was with family. The rooms on average had a smoke free patio situation which is great for a fireworks show or relaxing in the outside while enjoying the privacy of the patio.   The grounds were adorably decorated as it was Halloween day when we arrived. We went for the early check in and the late check out for our stay (both at available at an additional cost.)
Manager Response: Hello Alexis,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! That is what it's all about for us! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Just got home from a two night visit to Disneyland.  This was my first time trying this hotel.  Now it will be my go to.  I loved everything about it.  Had a pizza at Pizza Press one night, drinks at the cute little bar, a good night’s sleep, nothing negative at all.  Well, one thing but it’s not the hotel’s fault….I paid for a fireworks view rom and they were cancelled both nights!  Oh well…that happens.  I’ll be back in a few months and this is where I’ll stay !
Manager Response: Hello bethinwashington,   We thank you for your wonderful review. We are sorry to hear about Disneyland cancelling the fireworks. They do that due to weather on occasion. We hope that you stay with us again the next time that you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Great value and walking distance to Disneyland. Stayed at the Anaheim Hotel for a couple of nights since we were going to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. The hotel is a short walk to the parks. The room was spacious, had a mini fridge, and a large TV. It was great, it met all our needs. Parking was $18 dollars a night, which wasn’t bad, since we would have had to pay more if we parked in Disney. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Ladybug808,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: First I want to start out with the welcome we received when we arrived at the hotel. Second every single staff member smiled and asked if they could help us in anyway. The check in was easy and they explained exactly where the room was and where to park. They offered a Bellman to take the luggage right to the room. We came from eight hours away and was very tired by the time we got there. The rooms were large and came with a fridge and plenty of towels. They offered a microwave on request which we took advantage of. We were there six nights and enjoyed every minute of it . Their pool was beautiful and heated. If we had the opportunity we would’ve taken advantage of it. We were a half a mile away from the entrance to Disneyland so it made it easy to come home and I mean home
Manager Response: Hello Pamela,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that our staff was so helpful. We hope that you stay with us again the next time that you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Attentive and friendly staff, clean rooms and facilities, roomy and nicely landscaped grounds, and a huge pool and outdoor games for the kids. This hotel was quiet with comfortable beds. And just across the street and a block down from the entrance to Disneyland—perfect location.   We could have used more hooks/towel racks in the bathroom. A small thing.   The only low-point was the food at the hotel's restaurant, The Pizza Press. I suppose the crushing device used to roll-out (or just flatten) the pizza crusts should have been a give-away that this will far from the best pizza you'll eat. The Cesar salad was literally a to-go container of old shredded romaine with parmesan sprinkled on top and a dressing packet. No croutons. No anchovies. The garlic bread: a pizza crust with
Manager Response: Hello TheGoodShipLollipop,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our property, and your stay. We are sorry to hear about your experience at The Pizza Press, your concerns will be addressed with their management team. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Wonderful location, just make sure you request a renovated room
Summary: The location of this place is perfect for the parks. Easy to come back and forward and have breaks throughout the day.  The pool and spa area was neat and a nice relaxing spot. They only thing that was disappointing was the room. It was VERY basic and dated. We had read that they had renovated but it turns out only some areas have been done so far. If you are going to stay, just make sure you call and request a room that has been done. And a room upstairs. We had people above us that were stomping around from 550am with little kids and as we had teenagers, we were not returning from the parks till 1230am, making very short nights of sleep.
Manager Response: Hello Coulbecka,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your feedback regarding the room. We are in the process of updating all of our rooms. We apologize about the children making noise above. We do our best to make sure that all of our guest are comfortable, and have a good time. Our staff is available 24 hours a day to help with that. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Clean Rooms, Friendly Staff, Garden Setting, and closeness to Disneyland.
Summary: Over the 40+ years my family and I have visited Disneyland, we've stayed at many resorts in Anaheim but we've settled on The Anaheim Hotel as our go to for Disneyland vacations. What we like about it is that it's very clean - the rooms as well as the resort itself. The staff is always friendly and helpful and we like that it's a low-rise resort in a "garden" setting with nice landscaping all around. The price is affordable and it's only a short walk to the main entrance to Disneyland because the resort is right across the street on Harbor Blvd. You can't go wrong staying here!
Manager Response: Hello Layne,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Cleanest, quietest, best deal for this close to Disneyland. Microwave on request, mini fridge, plus decor for my kid's birthday. So sweet. We paid a little extra for a partial park view and watched the fireworks from our balcony.
Manager Response: Hello Carrie,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Not just a room near Disneyland
Summary: The 50s theming throughout was a nice touch. We liked the landscaping around the rooms and the strings of lights over the patio outside our room. The balconies were great places to spend time. Always plenty of parking and a short walk to the Disney parks. Much easier to navigate than Disney Orlando.
Manager Response: Hello cct17,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property, and your stay. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I have been a Disneyland season pass holder for many years. I come to Anaheim often. I’ve tried every hotel on the strip. Nothing compares to The Anaheim Hotel!  Our rooms are big and clean. Short walk to Disneyland. The grounds are well kept. The pool is huge and the music is perfect. But the greatest part is the amazing staff!  Candi who is up front is the BEST! Candi has watched over my family for years. She is kind professional and courteous. She always helps us to find an ADA room for my daughters special needs. She goes way beyond the call of duty. The Anaheim is lucky to have such a special soul running the front desk. She is the reason we keep coming back.  Leo is incredible. He makes you feel like you’re the only person there! I’ve never walked away from Leo without a
Manager Response: Hello Musgrave!  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you continue to stay with us, and that our staff is always so helpful! That is truly what it is all about for us. See you soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Super close to Disneyland but needs updating
Summary: Stayed 6 nights at the end of October for a Disneyland birthday vacation. We arrived around 1am & the guy at the check in desk seemed to be having some kind of breakdown, it was just awkward & strange. We went up to our room & went right to bed after a long flight from the east coast. In the morning it was chilly so we switched the air unit to warm & the room filled with smoke & set the smoke alarm off. We shut it of & the alarm stopped right away. No one came to check on the alarm so on the way out for the day we stopped at the front desk to let them know. The girl at the front desk was super nice & said she’d send maintenance up right away. We never turned the unit on again so I don’t know if it was fixed or not. The rest of our stay was fine. We weren’t in the room much.
Manager Response: Hello Kris,  We thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience, and management is addressing these concerns. We are happy the rest of your stay went well. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: A great hotel in walking distance to Disney!
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times.  It's got an incredible location - an easy walk to the park, even for kids.  The pool is truly awesome - big, clean, lots of room for swimming and play - and you can see the fireworks from the pool, which is a great solution for kids and older folks who don't love the crowds.  Finally, it's just a lovely hotel.  Not super fancy but very clean, friendly people, a nice bar and good pizza, large rooms.  Highly recommended!!!
Manager Response: Hello Tiela!  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that you continue to choose our hotel every time you visit Disneyland! We thank you for your loyalty, and we are looking forward to your next stay.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Such a nice family place to stay.  Clean, large rooms.  The hotel includes many extras such as a bar and a pizza restaurants.  It was all decorated for Halloween.  The staff was also helpful with our luggage.  They helped us get the luggage to the room as well as storing it the day we left.
Manager Response: Hello Leisa,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel, and that our staff was so helpful! We hope that you stay with us again the next time that you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Rooms were clean, beds were VERY comfortable!  Walking distance to Disneyland made it very convenient and saved us money on car rental.  The bar and pizza restaurant at the hotel were fantastic. Everyone was very nice and helpful, and they even decorated our room for our daughter's birthday. The only drawback was that the rooms are a bit outdated and old inside.  Other than that, everything was great.  We look forward to coming back again soon!
Manager Response: Hi There,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a great stay. We hope your daughter had the greatest of birthdays. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Our go to for Disneyland vacations!
Summary: Great location, lovely pool, wonderful staff. Candy & Jonathan were very helpful and made our trip that much better. Reasonably priced for the area and lots of fun amenities. I do wish they would bring back the poolside bar but you can still order food and drinks from the lobby have it delivered for a fee.
Manager Response: Hello There!  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that the team was so helpful. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland. There are some fun updates coming for our pool, so look out for those!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Candi & Leo are two amazing employees. Don’t ever lose them! They were one of the only ones we could actually talk to and be heard. We needed an accommodation and they took us seriously. They tried their best to get us what we needed.  Only downside is I felt we got nickled and dimed for a lot of things and that’s never been the case before. $100/room for early check in is a bit extreme. No microwaves unless we spend $15/room. They charged my card to move two small drinks from one room (that we forgot) Next door.
Manager Response: Hello Kori,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that Leo and Candi were so helpful. Management will look into your concerns. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!    In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: LEO helped us today and he was exceptional!!! Went above and beyond to help us find someone to jump our dead car. He was extremely nice and friendly. We would have been stranded for hours waiting for a tow truck if it wasn’t for him!
Manager Response: Hello Jamie,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that Leo was so helpful. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Loved that we were close enough to take a break mid day, lots of hibiscus hedges, and convenient to have Pizza Press attached to the lobby. We ended up with the absolute farthest room from the lobby (324, 2nd floor, far back left corner), so to cut down on extra steps I’d request a closer room/building next time.  No elevators, but there was a ramp (labeled as “non-accessible”) at the back end of building which helped with rolling luggage.
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for your review! We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland, and definitely request close to our lobby next time, so we can have you up close.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Amazing way to spend our honeymoon!
Summary: The hotel was everything we could need or want. Clean, great location, wonderful and friendly staff, and really peaceful. The biggest highlight was the staff, they made sure we had everything we needed after I fell and injured myself, they went above and beyond to make sure my husband and I had the best stay possible. We couldn't be more grateful. Thank you, and we can't wait to visit again!!!
Manager Response: Hello Destiny,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful. We hope you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Super close, wonderful staff, beautiful pool & grounds and the lobby is cool! Candi and the front desk staff are welcoming and really super helpful. Lots of activities to do with family and really close to Disneyland entrance!
Manager Response: Hello Shellye!  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Highly recommend. Will definitely be back!
Summary: Extremely friendly staff. Leo stood out because of his exceptionally friendly and helpful attitude and charisma. Overall, had no issues checking in, checking out, or fulfilling requests of needed amenities.
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Mike Rodriguez assisting me with handicapped needs
Summary: Mike Rodriguez was SO helpful! I’m handicapped, and he helped my daughter with a parking pass, then he assisted me to get a scooter for my trip to Disneyland the next day. I don’t know what I would have done without him!! Thank you for having such a caring employee!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, full of activities, and clean
