Summary: We stayed here for several days. This time it was during Halloween month and they had the property decorated. Every employee said hello to us and we enjoyed the pool (biggest in Anaheim). It’s my favorite hotel
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Anniversary Concierge at our Favorite Hotel, 5 Stars!!!!
Summary: This is the BEST hotel to visit, the staff is amazing and this time our stay was even made more special thanks to Kristopher from Concierge! For our anniversary he surprised us by spoiling us with a room make over. There is no other hotel that will go above and beyond to make you feel special and welcomed. The staff makes you feel like family every time, rooms are always super clean, we love visiting the bar as well, they have free coffee in the mornings for the quests, front desk is always friendly, nice pool area; bellhop always greets you and housekeeping are super nice. You are just a 5 minute walk to the park. So close to Disneyland. This is the best hotel 5 STAR rating!!! Will continue staying here, highly recommend, you won’t be disappointed :D
Manager Response: Hello Richard!  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that our staff was so helpful, that is what it's all about for us! We look forward to having you stay with us again.   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: What makes staying at the Anaheim Hotel AMAZING!!!! Is the staff, Kristopher who is the concierge treats you like family. When he makes a recommendation on where to eat, LISTEN TO HIM!!!! He is a wealth of knowledge, kindness, and knows what it takes to be in the hospitality business. Another amazing staff member is Candi! She is super friendly and helpful. She is kind and caring and wants you to have an enjoyable stay while at their hotel. The Anaheim Hotel is the only place we stay when we come to play at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello David!  We thank you for your review! We also love Kristopher, he is great! We are so happy that you always enjoy your visits, and that you continue to choose our hotel. We are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Checking in was a breeze with Leo’s help! He helped us stow our luggage before our room was ready so we could go enjoy downtown Disney! He was very informative and walked us to the front desk for check in. Thanks Leo!!
Manager Response: Hello Katythematey,  We thank you for leaving your review. We are so happy that Leo was so helpful, he is amazing. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Great hotel with an overlly friendly staff, very clean rooms and great rates and a huge swimming pool. We will always stay here dor our Disney trips, whixh we do a lot of as we live locally. Look no further...
Manager Response: Ron!   Thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you continue to choose our hotel every time you visit Disneyland! We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Such an amazing experience. The staff was really friendly, led by Candi. Checking in was super easy with their new process. We stay here whenever we go to Disneyland! A+, 5 stars!! If you are going to Disneyland this is the best place to stay! Also close to good food and CVS. THANKS for helping  make our trip  awesome!!
Manager Response: Hello Rallymonkey!   Thank you for your review! We are so happy that your trip went well, and we are looking forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I recently stayed at the Anaheim hotel during a visit to Disneyland. All I can say is Wow. The service here is amazing. At the front desk on any given day Kandi, Rachael, Marissa and Christopher did everything to make our stay the best. Also the bell crew was amazing. Leo, Marco, Caesar and Carlos made sure we got to our rooms safely and with ease. All in all the customer service here is AMAZING. Our room was stylish and comfortable. They have a Pizza Press and bar in the lobby. And it’s literally across the street from the parks. 5 min walk to the entrance. We will always stay here.
Manager Response: Hello Carie!  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that our staff was so helpful, that is what it's all about for us! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I really had a nice experience staying here. Leo and Mike who were outside at the front were amazing. My son and I stayed here from Sept 18th to 24th. I would definitely stay here again. The pool Is huge and they have extra towels if you forget one in your room. The room itself was huge. Comfy bed and nice patio. My only complaints would be the bathtub needs an update and the patio had spider webs around chairs and plants. Water pressure in shower was not so good. Also if you want to sleep well at night I recommend asking for a second floor room. A lot of noise was heard from upstairs when I was trying to sleep . I really like the hotel and location otherwise.
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your visit, and that Leo and Mike were so great! We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We have always wanted to stay here and we finally did!! We booked a double king room, at first we were in the original (not updated)  rooms which are nice and work for the park. But Candy at the front desk was so kind and upgraded us for free to the updated king room! These rooms are so cute! And so retro!! The grounds were amazing too, it felt like our own little place. They had Halloween decor up and movies with free popcorn at the pool, which we took advantage of when we arrived. Lives the pizza press too, super good pizza! And the bar helps too!!! Can’t wait to come back, thank you again Candy for all your help!!!   The Muir’s
Manager Response: Hello There!  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your visit, and that Candi was so helpful! We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim High School Class of 92 30 Year Reunion would like to thank you and your team for what most of our classmates are calling the best reunion yet. It was truly a pleasure to work with everyone at The Anaheim Hotel.   Everything at the hotel exceeded expectations. The service was out of this world. Whether it was setting the menu, audio visual, hospitality suite, valet parking, cleaning staff etc. The food at our banquet in the Cabana ballroom was excellent. Not hotel food but food like you would have at home or one of your favorite restaurants. To top off the evening, we had the Disneyland fireworks across the street.   From the bellman, front office to Tina Riley, the Director of Sales and Marketing, this hotel is outstanding. Interfacing with Roxane Cornell, the
Manager Response: Hello Juan,  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that your reunion was a success, and that our staff was so helpful, they are the best! We look forward to hosting more of your events, and we hope too see you soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We've stayed at Disney properties in the past but find the walk to the Anaheim Hotel much easier.  Rooms are large and having Pizza Press on site is super convenient! Would absolutely stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello MP!  We thank you for your review. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: What a fantastic place to stay!!! From the minute we arrived we were greeted by Leo who set the tone for the rest of our stay! Perfect location for early morning starts at the park, coming back to rest and swim in the afternoon where our rooms had already been serviced and then heading back to the parks at night. With my husband and 10 year old son I can’t recommend this hotel enough. From the pool, to the staff, to the location, to the rooms it was perfect. Leo, your assistance when recommending services to assist with my disability and looking after my son and a case to help get his light saber  home was exceptional and the hotel is lucky to have you representing them. What can I say but thank you for a perfect stay at Anaheim!!!
Manager Response: Hello Mishachiang,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your visit, and that Leo was so great! We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Hidden Gem with customer satisfaction as their priority.
Summary: 5/5 A true hidden gem within the amongst other hotels near Disney. The staff are excellent and friendly and the rooms are clean. A specific member of the staff is the real reason we continue to give this hotel our business. Leo greets us every time we visit and goes the extra mile to ensure our stay is superb. Leo, thank you for all you do and keep representing the Anaheim hotel…you rock!
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My husband and I absolutely love our stays at the Anaheim hotel. The rooms are super clean and organized. Leo, one of the supervisors is always very welcoming and attentive whenever we visit. The bartender, Sandra makes the most delicious drinks. And Tina, the hotel manager is always a doll! We got married here October 2021 and Tina was super helpful in organizing our wedding. Also whenever we visit the parks, we’d rather pay for parking here and walk 5 minutes across to the parks instead of having to pay for parking at Disneyland and wait for the tram. At the end of the night we don’t have to wait in another line for the tram. We simply just walk across the street to the hotel.   10/10 will always recommend. We are loyal costumers of the Anaheim hotel for life.
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: A Great Retro Stay  Close to Disney!
Summary: We loved our stay at The Anaheim Hotel. we come to Disneyland a lot and this hotel is definitely in it’s own league for cool factor. First off, and it’s just a short walk to get to Disneyland. The staff is kind and knowledgeable. The grounds are immaculate and there is a giant pool. The rooms are clean,  large, and comfortable which are perfect after a day walking around the parks. It was also great that there is a pizza restaurant that’s open late in the hotel. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We love staying here! The proximity to the park can’t be beat, the rooms and pool are great and the staff is amazing - especially Leo!  He went out of his way to help us with our bags and call us a car, and his energy is contagious! We will definitely be back and hope to run into him again!
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I just don't feel like I can properly convey to you how visiting this hotel makes me feel. I have been lucky enough to be greeted by Leo almost every single time l've come to this establishment. When I tell you that his energy and enthusiasm sets the tone for my day, I am not exaggerating. His love for life and genuine excitement to see me is something people actually dream of. When you think about "magic" it's Leo! I know this seems silly... But if people are actually writing about their experiences, and they're not writing about him, then there're missing out. I'm so lucky to have had these experiences bc it's employees, committed employees like Leo that make The Anahiem Hotel, what it is!!!
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Had a great stay, but you can find a great hotel anywhere. It's the staff that make the difference. And Leo did just that. He made our experience amazing by going above and beyond. Thank you LEO! Can't wait to come back on our next Disney Family trip.
Manager Response: Hello Linda,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: this hotel is a 5-minute walk to Disneyland or if you are tired you can pay for the ART busses (prepare to wait a bit) and they have a stop right in front of the hotel. The staff was friendly in all my interactions, even after having to reprogram my room's keys for what it seemed a million times (they do warn you ahead of time to not keep the keys next to phones or wallets with RFDI blocking tech, which I failed to do). The hotel has a very classic art deco style reminiscent of the Original decor of Disneyland hotel.  The only minus is that the plumbing and AC could use some updating. The property is well maintained and they offer activities during the evening.
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. Management will look into your concerns regarding the keys. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo was so helpful, sweet, and accommodating in so many ways! We appreciate him and we loved our stay here! The hotel was beautiful, charming, and fun and super close to the park which was an easy walk.
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The hotel is a little older but is decently priced for the location and the amenities. The window AC in my room was placed directly in front of a bed with a 1ft gap. This meant that the air flow could only be directed into the bed, not over/around  it. It took longer to cool down the room but it eventually did. The week I went was particularly hotter so the lack of airflow was very apparent.  Highlights of the stay: The Pizza Press is located in the hotel and is a really convenient food choice.   The distance is almost perfectly between the parks and the convention center.  During my stay, my car battery died and the helpful staff got me up and running! Shout-out to Leo!
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We have informed management about your concerns, and will address them immediately. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We chose to stay here for our Disneyland trip and loved it! It has a really cute mid-century theme and everyone is genuinely so kind. There was a long wait at check-in however that was because they were booked up the night before. We were allowed access to the pool and lobby in the meantime and they stored our bags. Leo specifically was our favorite! He was kind and patient with my kids who were super wound up after our flight, he greeted us every morning, and he made sure we had everything we needed while we waited to check in. The hotel is literally a 4 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance sign and maybe 8 minutes from the front gates. It was a super easy walk after a long day (and we really try to avoid long walks after opening and closing the park) 😂 House keeping came
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We have stayed here as a family and also as a fun girls trip multiple times over the last few years. The hotel is clean, comfortable, and the staff is awesome!  You can’t beat the ability to have two king sized beds in your room, yard games to play with the kiddos, huge pool, amazing pizza in the building AND be one block from Disney. Check in and check out is always smooth- you won’t regret booking here at the Anaheim Hotel!
Manager Response: Hello Danielle,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that you continue to come back.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We recently rented two rooms at The Anaheim Hotel for 5 days for a trip to Disneyland.  The hotel is older (1960's?) but well maintained and consists of several two storey buildings on a good sized landscaped piece of property. The place has a low-key relaxed vibe without being hectic like other Disney area hotels. The Mid-century theme really suits the place. The rooms are large, clean and well maintained. The staff are all very friendly and helpful. Christopher on the desk gave a great breakfast place recommendation, and Mike at the front door always has a smile and a friendly conversation at the ready. The hotel restaurant, The Pizza Press has quite a spare decor but the food is good both for breakfast and very tasty pizzas for dinner. It is only a 10 minute walk to
Manager Response: Hello Rich,  We thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property. We hope that you stay with us again the  next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My recent stay was great!  The room is spacious and clean and the bed amazingly comfortable!  The staff is kind and super helpful!  Especially Leo!  He went out of his way to help me, calling a car service to get me to LAX and waited with me to ensure I was safely on my way!  He is the BEST
Manager Response: Hello Kimberly,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit, and that our staff was so helpful. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Grandsons Prefer The Anaheim Hotel Over Others!
Summary: Hotel was clean, convenient to parks and nearby shops/restaurants. Employees were outstanding, all were helpful and seemed to truly enjoy their work. Particularly Marco and Leo who greeted us every morning and evening. They helped us to recover items we had left behind throughout the hotel. We traveled with our grandsons (17 & 10), both felt this was the best hotel they've ever stayed.  There were so many things that kept them busy including a huge swimming and the tabletop game in the lobby. But the most important thing was the kindness of the employees. Plus the on site restaurant, Pizza Press, was very good.
Manager Response: Hello Carol,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Perfect location with about a 20 minute walk to Disneyland. Cute retro feel and very clean rooms. We arrived before check in and took a shuttle from the airport, they stored our luggage so we didn’t have to keep it with us until it was time to check in. There was movies at the pool in the evening and a restaurant on the premises. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Kim,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Excellent service, comfortable, clean, and stylish!
Summary: We stayed here on a tip from a friend and I’m so glad we did! This hotel is so lovely, and the staff make it even better. Elizabeth and Kristopher were so personable at check in, and upgraded us to a double king room when the AC in our room couldn’t keep up with our needs. Mike and Leo the bell people were absolutely wonderful, helping us with all of our luggage and were so kind to our kids. YThen, we found the OLYMPIC size pool that was pure joy for our family especially with exceptional poolside bar service from Sandra, and the 60s music had me feeling like I’d gone back in time, but better. I can’t wait to come back again soon!
Manager Response: Hello Lauren,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so friendly, and helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great price, friendly staff, clean room
Summary: We recently stayed at the Anaheim Hotel and it was well worth the price. There's a pizza spot in the hotel and also a full bar. One thing we very much enjoyed was the location. Its only about a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. My girlfriend and I have been staying here for years and the staff is willing to help with any sort of issues that may arise. Take in the authentic smell when you walk into the lobby and enjoy yourself in this retro style hotel. If you're not looking for something that will break the bank, check this spot out.
Manager Response: Hello Kevin,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property, and that you continue to stay here. We are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Five minute walk to the parks, clean, awesome pool and very friendly staff. I didn’t like the carpet in the  rooms though but the walk in area and bathroom areas were tile. Also two sinks and we had two king beds
Manager Response: Hello Taregirl,  We thank you for your review. We are happy that you enjoyed your visit. We hope that you stay with us again the next time your visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times and have always had an amazing experience. At our most recent check in Marissa and Kristopher were great. Above and beyond accommodating requests! The bar staff is great. Ask Matt for fantasy football advice.  And our favorite is Candi. She has always been so friendly and helpful. Thank you Anaheim Hotel for continued great service. We’ll be back!
Manager Response: Hello Mr. & Mrs. Borrud,  We thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit, and that you continue to choose our hotel.  We are looking forward to your next stay.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Best Disneyland Hotel we’ve stayed at!
Summary: Wow. The Great looking, sparkling hotel, incredible pool, exquisite decor, truly kind and caring staff—all within a quick walking distance to Disneyland. What more could you want? Truly top-notch hotel for the right price.  Other highlights include—movie showings in the pool at night and a soundtrack to match the mid century modern decor.
Manager Response: Hello Brett!  Thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you love it here, and we cannot wait for you to come back!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: A great choice for our first trip to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed as a family of 5 for our visit to Disneyland 22-25 August and loved the hotel. Perfectly located, taking less than 10m to get to the security check at Disneyland. Rooms a great size, clean, comfy beds with plenty of towels and toiletries. The Front Lounge was perfect for relaxed food (great wings!) and drinks after a long day in the parks - and we could see the fireworks from the tables in the bar area. The best part about our stay was the people - in particular Marco who was so kind and helpful and is an asset to the hotel. The team at the Front Lounge were fantastic too. We didn’t get time to take advantage of the huge pool but it looked great and the grounds overall were nice and well maintained. We hope to return next year! Top tip: think about using this hotel for
Manager Response: Hello Ringles22,   We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Marco was so helpful! We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Surprisingly really nice hotel.  Although I think it was built in the 1950's or 1960's, it's kept up very well.  Everything in the room worked, it was very clear, very friendly staff, even great Hawaiian Tropic soaps and shampoos.  The location is just perfect, almost at the entrance of Downtown Disney, which means you can walk to the Gardenwalk shopping center, CVS and Walgreen's nearby, and perhaps a hundred or so restaurants all within walking distance.  They charge a reasonable $20 a day for parking for hotel guests.  I liked the adjacent Pizza Press restaurant for breakfast, it even had a nice quiet outdoor patio.  Prices were reasonable and the food was good.  They show movies every night by the nice pool.  My only complaint was they put too much fabric softener in their
Manager Response: Hello Pattayainsider,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and your feedback regarding the fabric softener has been noted. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit The Disneyland Resort Area.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Such a lovely hotel with great staff, especially Leo who we adopted cos he was so cute. He was fantastic and nothing was too much for him. Rooms were excellent and the pool was huge. It was also a great viewing spot for the Disney fireworks.  Had a really nice stay.
Manager Response: Hello Sue,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit, and that Leo was so helpful.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great Hotel withing walking distance to Disney
Summary: I stayed here with my partner, adult son and my 12 year old.  Hotel had everything to make a comfortable stay.  Parking was extra but your car was locked away.  Check in and check out was extremely easy and the reception staff were very helpful.  Very clean rooms with toiletries added as a nice little touch and there was also a fridge in the room.  My only gripe was the air conditioning unit was on the floor leading out onto the balcony and one of the beds was right against it so it stopped some of the cold air going around the room and made the bed linen a little damp. The hotel is a 5 to 10 minute walk to the disney parks and there are lots of restaurants and shops nearby. Would stay here  again.
Manager Response: Hello Dawniola,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit, and that our staff was so helpful.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Unexpected Treasure at the Entrance to the Disneyland Resort
Summary: I have driven and walked past this hotel property many times over the years.  The hotel recently showed up in a search of multiple hotels and after comparing, I decided to give it a try.  Very comfortable setting, clean rooms and nicely furnished.  The staff is friendly and welcoming.  I have stayed a second time in two weeks and plan on staying again during my  next visit to the Disneyland Parks.
Manager Response: Hello Traveling Tad!  We thank you for your review, we are so pleased that you enjoyed your visit! We look forward to your next stay.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

The proximity to the park was ideal and the large pool, Pizza Press and lobby bar were great additions as well!  We will definitely return to this hotel for our next Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Hello Melanie,  We thank you for your review, we are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Leo was super helpful letting us know the check-in and parking options (we arrived way before check-in time) and even helped my wife choose the correct bag for her outfit.   This will be my first choice for our overnight Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Hi There!   We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: First time visit to Disneyland. We were not familiar with the area and hoped we made the right choice for a hotel. We were not disappointed. The hotel was amazing! Great location, great staff, clean rooms, awesome pool, and the smell in the lobby was a breath of fresh air!  The distance and convenience to the park were a top priority for us. Traveling with two young children, we were able to shoot back to the hotel mid day and go back later in the evening with ease! We will definitely be back! The hotel made our first time visit a great experience!
Manager Response: Hello Theresa,   We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The front desk staff were great when we checked in and Leo, the bellman, was so amazing! He was super friendly and helpful, and made us feel so special! The hotel is nice and very close to Disneyland.

Summary: Out of many places I've stayed that are close to Disney, this is for sure my favorite so far.  Great friendly staff, great bar and good options for food in the area, all your needs in walking distance, and helpful staff to show you the way. Very much enjoyed my stay 😁
Manager Response: Hello Ryan,  We thank you for your feedback! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is great. Retro vibe with staff that are amazing. Close to everything and pizza press is right on the property. Huge pool with beautiful gardens. The parking is great and safe. There is a cute gift store inside and a bar. It's only 2 stories and gives you a comfy feel. Some have patios and balconies. Rooms are big and you can do upgrades and even add cookies to your room which are very very good.  Just relax in the pool and grab some pizza then chill at Disneyland to watch a show. Great for families, business, solo people... ENJOY!!!!!

Leo, Caesar and Marcos made it effortless to get to our rooms and park our cars. The service is 5🌟and they make you feel wonderful here. We will always stay here!!!

Summary Heading: Lovely Retro Hotel close to Disney
Summary: We had an amazing stay at The Anaheim Hotel. Loved the mid-modern design in the lobby and Frank Sinatra playing outside at the pool. The pool is amazing and huge. Never felt crowded and loved that you could order drinks/food at the pool. Our room was very comfortable as well and we were able to see the fireworks from our balcony.  Very short walk to Disney as well so made it easy to come back to the room mid-day for a break. Can't wait to visit again!

The only thing lacking in the stay was the air conditioner in our room was struggling to keep the room cool.  Everything else was amazing.  I would not hesitate to book this hotel on a future visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here with our 12-year-old grandson and had a lovely time. We didn't have Disneyland tickets for the first day, so we spent a few hours at the huge pool in the late afternoon after checking in and loved our time there. The on-site Pizza Press restaurant  had tasty pizza and couldn't have been more convenient. The property was a little dated, but there was lots of green space and it wasn't too spread out. Our grandson forgot his swimsuit, but we were able to buy one at the gift shop--a big relief! The room was fine--it faced and inner courtyard and was fairly close to the lobby.  It had a small balcony that supposedly had a partial fireworks view, but we didn't think we'd see much from there, so we walked over to Downtown Disney, where the view was much better. The best

Summary: Jocelyn was amazing! I was celebrating a special birthday and she made sure that everything was perfect!! The room was clean and cool. The beds were comfortable. I would definitely stay here again. So close to Disneyland!

Beds really comfortable. Has a fridge for convenience as well. My granddaughter and us loved the pool area. It is large, well maintained and has blow up Flamingos swimming around for fun! The location being almost directly across from park entrance make this a go-to spot. We will be back!!

The food was excellent and the service was bar none! The hotel is clean, they have a great outdoor space with a good size pool and the location is unbeatable, right across from Disneyland.

We went to several venues looking for a special place to have my daughter’s 15th birthday and this Hotel made it happen. Roxane Cornell Event Manager and Genevieve were great at meeting all of our needs. Roxane went over and beyond to make us feel that nothing was impossible. The staff from the parking attendants, servers, reception, Julio Coordinator Mgr made sure that during the time we were setting up that nothing was missed he is definitely a valuable employee. In fact several are already making
Manager Response: Hello Gus & Nanette,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! Summary Heading: This is a great place with a great location to Disney
Summary: I just really enjoyed this place!  We stayed with our family for a few nights to take the kids to Disney. I loved how easy it was to walk to the park and come back for naps and then go back out to the parks!   We got here a little early but Sam was so helpful and luckily there was an open room so we could check in slightly earlier.  The place is so charming and the staff here is really top notch. Everyone was incredibly friendly and seemed to genuinely enjoy helping guests.  They even got me a tiny bit of cleaner for seashells my daughter got on the beach before we got here that smelled.   The pool had towels and pool toys in it. Everything was super clean. My kids loved the pool.  When we come back we’re definitely staying here again. I highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Hello Meagan,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Sam was so helpful! We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: From the moment you arrive, you are greeted with hellos and friendly service from every single worker on property. They go above and beyond to make you feel welcome and at home while you are on vacation. The hotel is clean and smells amazing as you enter the lobby. My family will definitely stay here again during a future visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I visited the Anaheim Hotel  and  was luckily greeted by Leo who is so sweet and personable! He assisted me with finding parking and has such a great attitude. It really brightened up my day! Thank you Leo!
Manager Response: Hello Ashproa,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that Leo was so helpful, we look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Manager Response: Hello Amy,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The lobby looks amazing, but it doesn’t match the rooms.  They had more of a motel feel.  They were tiny and dated.  There was a nice patio with lounge chairs but no table to sit at.  The room didn’t have a safe, so I called the main desk and they sent maintenance really quickly - he installed a new one within 30 minutes.  The pool is great, but rarely had towels available.  All in all, it was a fine place- the location was great for walking to Disney.  We didn’t spend much time in the room other than naps and sleeping.
Manager Response: Dear Corrina,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Our sincerest apologies if we failed to make your recent stay memorable. Management has been made aware of your concerns. Our team would love another opportunity to accommodate you and your family. We hope you will reach out to us so that we may rectify our shortcomings.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great value. Clean rooms, excellent location, super helpful staff. Everyone we encountered was friendly. Basic accommodations. Well kept for the age of the hotel. Didn't swim in the pool, but they try to have different activities during the day. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Nikkie,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and our property. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Once you step into the lobby of this hotel, you know the magic has started for your Disney vacation. The staff is friendly and eager to help. The ambiance is light and comforting. Summary Heading: The only convenience about this place is the location
Summary: The only convenience about this place is the location (5-minute walk from Disney). The rooms are old and they are not maintained. The carpet and tub do not look clean. I wish their room look near to their nice and modern lobby.

Summary: I really like  this retro hotel which is close to the Disneyland parks . I have come here before the pandemic and every year after . My first issue is the website stating “ room service “ so everyone is aware there is no room Service . The bar area honestly used to be “ the best “ service drinks etc . Not sure if all the good bartenders left but it’s very hit or miss now in the bar section not only for drinks but also for any food that may want to  be ordered. I like the convenience and closeness but I always want an amazing experience .the person that meets and greets ! Absolutely awesome came in Thursday evening greeted us  really nice. The other issue is pizza press I love the pizza ( plus bonus for anyone with gluten or dairy issues they can accommodate. Again pizza amazing
Manager Response: Hello Heidi,  We thank you for your review. We apologize there was some miscommunication about room service. Management is looking into these concerns. We do offer room service through The Pizza Press. Breakfast is from 6am-10am and then lunch and dinner from 12pm-10pm. We are happy you enjoyed everything else, and we look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Two night family stay for our three day Disneyland adventure. Room had plenty of space with two queen beds for our family of four (two young kids on one queen bed). Room had plenty of space, clean and plenty of towels, soaps/shower gels/etc. The hotel is perfectly located to Disneyland with only a 10min walk. For breakfast there is an ihop and Denny’s 5 min walk instead of hotel breakfast for better choice. The hotel pool is spotless, warm and plenty of seating and towels. Small gym is on site and cleaning/launderette available. The hotel has also outdoor play areas for kids and adults! We didn’t dine in the hotel on any night as the days and evenings were spent in the Disneyland resort. The hotel is for sure one of the best priced, located and value on the strip  The hotel is a
Manager Response: Hello Ilsal,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel, and your stay. We hope you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Checking in was an issue. I felt discriminated by both manager and front desk employee. They would not allow us to check in with 15 minutes left for check in and told us to wait until 4pm. However, not even 5 minutes later, a white family approached the desk and were given a room. Then another family arrived and the manager began checking them in while they just ignored us as we sat a few feet away. We had to ask why weren’t we being checked in. This was totally unacceptable but all the manager could say to me is to lower my voice and ignored my complaint and insisted on checking me in NOW and dismissing me. Because there were kids around I didn’t continue to make an issue of it but felt really embarrassed by the whole situation. I felt that because we were Latino, both manager
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our go-to hotel when we visit Disneyland. The staff is friendly and welcoming. The rooms are large, clean and comfortable. It is a quick walk to Disneyland. We feel it is the best deal for a walking distance hotel.
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for writing your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was so friendly. That's truly what it's all about for us. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Nicest hotel adjacent to Disneyland. Leo is a gem though.
Summary: I don't really write a lot of reviews. I figured they'd get lost in the sea of everyone else's experiences and opinions, but sometimes I just need to write it down. My son and I were on our annual summer baseball roadtrip and caught a few games in Anaheim and Los Angeles. We had a day off and wanted to head to our favorite place, Disneyland. We had just stayed at the Disneyland Hotel in April for his birthday, and this time we just wanted a few nights off property in something a little bit more affordable given the nature of our roadtrip. I read all the amazing reviews about The Anaheim Hotel and the exceptional service and Leo, so I booked three nights here.  When we arrived, we were unfortunately not greeted with the smiles I was expecting — maybe it was the end of a
Manager Response: Hello John,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful. He is amazing, and we are lucky to have him on our team. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This was our first stay at the Anaheim Hotel.  We usually visit Disneyland once a year and have stayed at several of the other properties over the years.  We chose this property for the short 5 minute walk to the Disneyland.  I booked a double queen with partial park view for my family of 4, which includes 2 teenage daughters.  The highlight of this room was the balcony, which was very large and had a view of the Guardians of the Galaxy ride in California Adventure.  The room itself was fairly small and it took some time to figure out how to efficiently operate the air conditioner.  The bathroom needs an update as the floor tiles were broken and the ventilation is inefficient.  The room was very clean and the beds extremely comfortable.  The grounds  of the hotel are absolutely
Manager Response: Hello Eron,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we hope you consider us again the next time you visit Disneyland. Management is looking into the concerns regarding your room. We also have larger rooms with two king size beds that might accommodate you and your family better.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Our favorite place to stay every year
Summary: My family and I visit Disneyland every year and we choose this hotel every time. It is so clean and nice, excellent location, but the best is their customer service. We are treated so well every single time. Leo is so helpful and always remembers us. And Todd is the kindest! He always is so helpful and goes above and beyond to make our stay the best. We’re so happy with our stay every year and we always come back!
Manager Response: Hello Christine,  We thank you for writing your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was so helpful. That's truly what its all about for us. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I looked into several hotel options across Harbor Blvd from Disney. I chose The Anaheim Hotel based on reviews that they have good customer service, and the staff did not disappoint! They were so nice and helpful, and we even ended up extending our stay with them for the last two nights of our trip. Our room was serviced (I hear that’s a concern with Covid at some hotels), the front desk staff and concierge went above and beyond and helped us work out an ecv rental that was better quality and price than what I had initially planned on using, and even the first person we met when we pulled up to check in made us feel like VIPs. Our room was comfortable, and the kids enjoyed watching Disney Jr while we got ready for the day and any time we were lounging in the room. Plenty of room
Manager Response: Hello John!  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I had a great experience at the Anaheim Hotel.  The rooms are spacious, beautifully decorated, and comfortable.  The hotel has a retro Palm Springs vibe and very fun.  The Pizza Press was delicious and convenient.  They were playing movies at the pool when I stayed.  It is just across the street from Disneyland.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Corey,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Definitely a better room than previous ones. STILL NEEDS UPGRADES! If only they could take the same carpet theme in the lobby and carry it to the rooms, that would be great. Room was clean and beds/pillows nice and comfortable. I would have definitely given 5 stars if not for the carpet. Very friendly staff and beautifully renovated retro lobby was a plus. For the price point, would have expected better finishing touches.
Manager Response: Hello Shawn,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We are actually in the process of updating all the carpet in our guest rooms. We hope that you consider us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We enjoy the Anaheim Inn. Disappointed that we didn’t get our usual room with the patio but the room we did get was good. Very good Hawaiian Tropic toiletries and soap. Can’t beat the location for walking to Disneyland. Like the retro theme. Great pool. Pizza Press is very convenient on site. Disappointed that complimentary coffee is now just a small cup. The larger free cup was a great benefit the last couple times we stayed here.
Manager Response: Hello Pathfinder579473,  We thank you for your review. We apologize that you did not get a patio, those rooms are highly requested. Reach out to us directly before your next trip, and we will do our best to get you a patio. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to the parks.
Summary: Great hotel CLOSE  to Disney.  We had 4 rooms for 15 people. Beds were clean and comfy, hotel bathroom has some wear, but functional and really not that bad.   I normally stay at Disney properties and travel at least once a year to the parks, but since there are no longer any perks like extra hour - there really isn’t a benefit.   I will defiantly stay here in the future.   I left my Apple watch on the balcony of our hotel room on the day of check out and called the hotel within minutes of leaving. I returned that afternoon and they held it at the front desk.   Staff has integrity and were very helpful throughout our stay.
Manager Response: Hello SonjaPoppins,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you had such a great stay with us, and our team was able to assist you. That's what its all about for us! We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Overall we had a great stay, close to the Disney parks which is what we were here. And we had a great experience at the bar and with the vibe of the hotel. Definitely did not disappoint and we will be back in the future
Manager Response: Hello Lissette,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Vid Con visit stay, Anaheim hotel
Summary: Super stay! Staff are super friendly , Pizza Press is tasty, great quality and value for money. Walking distance to Vid Con (and Disneyland ; ) beds super comfy and staff really helpful with almost everything. Made our stay very welcoming and warm , Thankyou to all the amazing people at pizza Press for fab pizzas and staff at Anaheim for great customer service. Pool is enormous !
Manager Response: Hello Sara,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay while visiting the expo. We hope that you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Anaheim.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Staff great Marco A+, great location. Bit old bathrooms.
Summary: Rooms are clean and well decorated but some what old. The Bathroom Fixtures were so so as well as the towels.  There was a smell always on the room  corridor, either trashy o drain smell.  Staff was really great specially MARCO was really a great host caring and anticipated to our needs.   Great location from Disneyland Parks really walking distance and great neighborhood.
Manager Response: Hello Tania,  We apologize for the experience you had, and management is addressing these concerns. We have attempted to reach out to you regarding your stay. Please call me at the hotel at your earliest convenience, we would love to make things right.    In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: He was amazing we had an excellent experience at the hotel and it was thanks to Marco. Oke of oyr friends felt quesy he was there helping us out qith gatorqde and a chocolate. I really think pepple like him make your experience more pleasant
Manager Response: Hello Daniela!  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that Marco was so great. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We visit Disneyland at least once a year for our nugget’s birthday. Decided to try The Anaheim this trip and I think we found our new home! The hotel is an adorable mid century decor and the pool is Olympic! What made it for us was Kristopher! You can find the fanciest stay but not get the kind of customer attention and interaction that Kristopher he welcomes you with! Customer service is becoming a lost standard in these times but Kristopher makes it very much an art! It’s personalities like his that we appreciate and look for when we decide to make a place a home away from home. Thank you for making us feel special and thank you for making our little one such a special focus. She can’t wait to see you again Kristopher! We will be back soon!
Manager Response: Hello Cheti,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that your "nugget" had such a great birthday. We are thrilled that Kristopher was so helpful, he is great! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay and a timeless and vintage hotel literally across the street from the Disneyland Resort
Summary: Great stay at a vintage and timeless resort…incredible location (across the street from Disney), a 10 minute walk.  Attentive staff, huge beds and clean rooms and Pizza Press was delicious! Can’t go wrong choosing the Anaheim Hotel for your stay.  Courtyard was beautiful for entertaining as well
Manager Response: Hello Carl,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: It had everything you want/need in a hotel with the most ideal distance to the park. The area itself is so central and close to convenience stores, coffee, food, and practically anything you need. I unfortunately did not have time to use the amenities but they looked amazing. The only thing I would really complain about is the shower’s water pressure. This might be a personal problem, but I noticed it would take me twice as long to shower because the pressure was so bad. Other than that, things were pretty much perfect. I would definitely recommend this to anyone wanting to stay close to the parks.
Manager Response: Hello Chelsea,  We thank you for your review. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay. Management is looking into your concerns regarding the water pressure in your room. We hope you consider our hotel the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Comfy bed and a quiet rook is exactly what we needed after a long day at Disneyland! You can’t beat the 15 min walk either! We were able to come back mid-day and enjoy the pool! Great onsite pizza place and a friendly staff. Would recommend and will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hello Bekki,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and our property. We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Anaheim Hotel and Large Band Group
Summary: We visited Anaheim Hotel with 125 students. Staff was very accommodating to all our needs. Many rooms were needed. They were very helpful to our needs and went out of their way to make our stay pleasant. Special shout out to Leo DaSilva for being helpful, professional, approachable, and  super friendly. He went well above 5 stars! It made our stay away from home like home. Thank you!
Manager Response: Hello Century Band!  We thank you for your review! It was a pleasure having your group stay with us. We hope you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Anaheim.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This is the best place to stay at that is walking distance  to the park. The room we stayed at had a patio and a great partial view of the park. A big Shoutout to Leo! He was very helpful and fantastic service! Will be staying here next time.
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for your review! Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disney trip. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful! We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland or Anaheim!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We arrived to the hotel early and Joe right away helped us with our luggage and checked them in. Our room wasn’t ready yet because it was early in the day so we headed down to Downtown Disney and love that the hotel is just about a good 5-8 minute walk to the park. That was a huge plus. Once we got back our room was ready and the best part was Joe with our asking got our bags ready so we could head up to our room. I thought that was super sweet of him to make us feel really welcomed. The front desk staff were so pleasant and ready to help so I can’t even complain. Our room was super clean and the hotel itself is very well put together. From the moment we’ve arrived to the bar, front staff, gym, pool and all the services we are very content with our stay! So happy we booked here!
Manager Response: Hi there!  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff was so helpful! We hope you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great experience! Such kind staff! Leo was so kind and helpful to all customers! It was very refreshing to see!
Summary: Such a great experience! Kind and helpful staff! Leo was kind to all customers! It was refreshing to see someone attentive and happy to help! I was able to get in my room early! Desk staff was great too! I will definitely be back! I was able to bring my dog my room worked out perfect!
Manager Response: Hello Lorria,  We thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Great family atmosphere. It is so close to Disneyland. Everyone that works there is friendly and super helpful.  Leo is one of the parking lot attendants/bellhops and made us feel like he had known us forever. The manager Nathan is excellent and will make sure all of your needs are addressed and looked after.
Manager Response: Hello Jackie,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo from our bell team and Nathan our GM were so helpful. They are the best! We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Perfect location and Amazing Staff with very comfortable rooms!
Summary: This hotel is wonderful! The entire staff from front desk, to bellman, to housekeeping, everyone was friendly and welcoming and willing to go above and beyond. The location is fantastic a short walk to the entrance of Disneyland. Also very close to numerous restaurants and Walgreens and CVS and 7-Eleven and a small market. We had a first floor room with two queens and a very nice sized patio which provided extra space and a nice sitting area outside or for the kids to play. My one very small complaint is the pillows, they only provide two for each bed, we asked for more multiple times and they were never received. Not a big deal and we made do but would have been nice to have more. Although breakfast is not included, a short walk to Disney land is Denny's and you can pick up a
Manager Response: Hello love_4_travel4ever,  We thank you for your review, and your feedback. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I wanted to write a review on my most recent stay at the Anaheim hotel. It was my birthday girls trip getaway and the service I received by beyond extraordinary. It had CANDI’s name all over it!! I received not one but two phone calls prior to my arrival at the hotel letting me know our room was ready for us. Check in was a breeze (I utilized their online system which made it seamless and effortless).   As we pulled into a parking spot, to figure out what room we were in and to unload our luggage, we were greeted by LEO. Leo could not have been nicer, more attentive or more excited for us to be there. He wished me happy birthday he took all of our luggage to our room he checked on us throughout our stay. He was an absolute delight to see. I actually found myself looking for him
Manager Response: Hello Jeanette,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and your birthday! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Awesome location for Disney & Convention Center
Summary: Booked this place a loooong time ago for Star Wars Celebration, and it lived up to our expectations when we finally got to visit last week. It's a smaller property with two-story buildings dotted around a courtyard and pool, so it's less busy than a lot of the hotels around Disney. They do charge for parking each day but it's discounted compared to public rates, but being within walking distance of Convention Center and Disney makes up for that. Staff were super helpful and room was well-cleaned each day with our piles of souvenirs scattered around the room! Restaurant on the grounds wasn't real busy each time we went, but pretty quick and good food. Bar is real nice as well, and during non-covid times they're supposed to have a swim-up bar/restaurant at the pool but sadly that
Manager Response: Hello Kevin,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort area.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Huge shout out to The Anaheim Hotel! Candi Crowe, part of the management staff saved the day for us. My husband accidentally got booked in on the wrong day through a third party website, the hotel was sold out but she gave us an emergency room. We came from Vancouver and would have been pretty stranded if it wasn’t for this wonderful lady. The bartender at the lounge was great and so was the rest of the front desk staff. The room was clean and large. The pizza smelled great although we never got a chance to try it, as we were at Disneyland almost of the day. We would definitely recommend The Anaheim Hotel to anyone looking for a great time in Anaheim. Big thanks from the Sangha family!
Manager Response: Hello Holly,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that we were able to accommodate you, and that everything worked out. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: First time staying here & the employees are amazing!
Summary: From "Welcome to the Anaheim Hotel" to "see you next time",  thank you Anaheim Hotel. The staff was great but I remember Leo, the best to greet and guide us from the time of arrival to leaving. Definitely recommending this beautiful ambiance to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that Leo was so helpful, he is great!  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: When entering the hotel parking lot we are immediately greeted by Leo. Leo is phenomenal, so kind and attentive. He makes sure to take care of you immediately. We come to this hotel simply because Leo is there and we know we will be well taken care of. Thank you Leo, you deserve a raise! The hotel is literally in a perfect location, so close to the parks and restaurants.
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for your review, We are thrilled that Leo was so helpful. We hope you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Love staying at the Anaheim Hotel
Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is like a second home for our family.  We have been staying there for 15 years and in the last year we stay about every 6-8 weeks.  The staff at this hotel is amazing.  Candi at the front desk is the best and always takes very good care of us.  Mike is always there to help us with any needs.  Every member of the staff is incredible.  The rooms continue to get better and better.  It’s always very clean.  If you have any complaints or concerns they take care of it immediately.  The pool is AMAZING.  They now serve food at the pool.  AND…you can watch fireworks from the pool or hot tub.  It’s a very short distance to get inside the park.  As well, if you need a scooter rental the front desk can order one for you and have it delivered.  Another important thing is
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you had such a great stay with us, and our team was able to assist you. That's what its all about for us! We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I would like to preface that my husband and I did not get the pleasure of staying here BUT I wanted to leave a terrific review for a TREMENDOUS employee who goes by the name LEO. Leo helped my husband and I find parking for when we were in Anaheim for the Star Wars celebration at the ACC. He was extremely helpful, and an absolute delight to talk to. We literally couldn’t have done it without him. Not only that, but Leo went out of his way to really help build my confidence with my first ever cosplay. Though I’m sure he’ll see a billion more faces within the next time we’re in Anaheim, my husband and I will be staying at this hotel next visit just because of the amazing service and vibes Leo gave us! Jonathan the front desk and I believe the manager was also incredibly kind,
Manager Response: Hi Tabrina,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you had such a great stay with us, and our team was able to assist you. We LOVE hearing that you had such an amazing trip. That's what its all about for us! We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: I like the vibe of this hotel.
Summary: The first time my family and I stayed here, the furniture and the 60's music caught my attention. It has a mid-century modern feel and brings me back to when I was a young girl. Super cool place, great staff, and a beautiful pool. The front desk staff and the bellman were very helpful. Very close to Disneyland. Many thanks for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Hello There,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you had such a great stay with us. That's what its all about for us! We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Best place to stay next Disneyland
Summary: We stay here all the time, we love this hotel. Its close proximity to Disneyland makes for an easy walk, the retro Mid-century vibe is relaxed and welcoming. Michael at the front door is the most kind, helpful gentleman. He remembers us every time, he goes out of his way to be nice to tied toddlers, I do not have enough kind words describe him.
Manager Response: Hello There,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that Mike was so helpful, and that you enjoyed your visit with us. That's what its all about for us! As a return customer I may recommend you look into our loyalty program, The Anabella Club, lots of great perks for return guests. We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Our #1 choice of hotel when visiting Disney
Summary: We’ve stayed at the Anaheim Hotel three times over the last year. It’s super close to Disneyland(literally across the street) and the rooms are very comfy. The walls are a little thin, like many of the hotels across from the parks, but I bring a fan for some white noise and it works wonderfully. Plus, after our first full day at Disney, we definitely don’t have an issue getting or staying asleep! The manager, Candi, is wonderful, and went above and beyond to rectify a small issue we had, and all the other staff that we had contact with was friendly and helpful. Another huge plus for us is that we have two cars usually, and the Anaheim Hotel has ample parking, so we don’t have to find another location to park our second car!  We will continue to stay at the Anaheim Hotel when
Manager Response: Hello There,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that Candi was so wonderful, and that you enjoyed your visit with us. That's what its all about for us! I may recommend you look into our loyalty program, The Anabella Club, lots of great perks for return guests. We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel is located two blocks from Disneyland! The grounds are nice,  the management is wonderful,  and the swimming pool/hot tub was great!  The puzza press located inside the hotel waa very good too!
Manager Response: Hello There,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that your experience was so wonderful, and that you enjoyed your visit with us. That's what its all about for us! We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: We had a wonderful stay!! Thank you Leo!
Summary: My sister and I stayed here a couple days ago and we had a wonderful stay. When we arrived our room wasn’t ready yet but they were happy to hold our luggage so we could go into Disneyland. Which was just a short walk up the block. We went back to the hotel after 4pm and our room was available. The room was great! Just what we needed, clean and quiet. The beds were comfortable and the balcony was a great bonus!   When it was time to check out, the staff were incredibly sweet! We had a late flight and wanted to go into Disneyland before we left and they held our luggage again!!   When we went back to pick up our luggage, Leo helped us with our bags and waited with us for our Uber.  When our car arrived, Leo helped us put our bags in the car which was much appreciated!  Throughout
Manager Response: Hello There,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that Leo was so wonderful, and that you enjoyed your visit with us. That's what its all about for us! We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: All around awesome place to stay!
Summary: Staff is extremely friendly and went out of their way to get us early check in so my daughter and her girl friends could get ready for prom. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The bar has great cocktails and the bartender is always friendly! We stay here quite often when we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Christie,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that you continue to choose our hotel every time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great staff, clean rooms and walking distance to disneyland
Summary: We love staying at the Anaheim Hotel. Rooms are always clean and the staff is amazing, especially Candi! She is always friendly and very helpful, she once upgraded us and my daughter has never forgotten it, a future returning customer from a kind gesture!
Manager Response: Mr. Moore,  Thank you for writing your review. We are thrilled that you continue to choose our hotel every time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We were greeted by Candi & Rachel during check-in. Candi went above and beyond to make our trip incredible! While I can’t list in detail everything that she did for us because I only have limited characters, I will say that her attention to detail and willingness to serve us was above all experiences I’ve ever had at a hotel.   Candi called us as we were settling into our room to make sure that our room was adequate and met our expectations. Which it did. The vibe of the hotel is so fun and the staff definitely help to keep that energy elevated while you are there.   We did ask for maintenance to come and check our air conditioning unit because we thought it was malfunctioning, and they were prompt to send someone up in the very late evening/early morning hours. The
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for your review! Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disney trip. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Had a great stay! The staff is super friendly and the grounds and pool are fabulous. The hotel is a little older but it is super close to the Disneyland parks. The gift shop is great and pizza press is great! I would definitely stay here again. It was very quite and convenient.
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for your review! Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disney trip. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Hotel close to Disneyland Park. Short 5 minute walk. Lobby is updated in a Retro theme. Our room was on the 2nd floor of the 300 building. Each room Has it own entrance from outside. The room was clean and beds were comfortable. Our room was quiet and we didn’t hear noise from neighboring rooms but could hear people walking by quite well. The bathroom tile and grout was broken. Small cup of complimentary coffee in the pizza shop in the morning. Staff was friendly, especially the bell persons. Check in and out was easy. Extremely convenient location to the parks!
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for your review! Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disney trip. We apologize for the inconveniences, and management will be looking into it. We are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We have been staying at the Anaheim Hotel since 2016. It is such a convenient location and a great price.  The mid century design is nice and the lobby has welcoming seating areas, water dispensers, and Matt at the bar is always friendly and gets us whatever we are looking for.  The main reason we keep coming back is Leo. Our toddler granddaughter even knows him by name and asks where he is if it is his day off. He is so helpful and goes way beyond his duties to make sure EVERYTHING is up to our satisfaction.  We consider him a friend of the family at this point and are always happy to see him again!  As always, we will be back!
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for your review! Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disney trip. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I am so glad i decided to book my stay at The Anaheim Hotel! It was my first time staying at this property and my experience was amazing. Candi is awesome and was so helpful throughout our entire stay, anything we needed she was on top of it. Our room surpassed all of our exceptions and you cant beat the 10 min walk to Disneyland. We go to Disneyland yearly and will be staying at The Anaheim Hotel on all of our future visits!
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for your review! Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disney trip. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: LEO!! This review is for Leo who works at The Anaheim Hotel.
Summary: LEO!! This review is for Leo who works at the Anaheim Hotel. He was one of the most helpful, kind, generous employees we have ever met. We come here a few times a year and this experience we had at this hotel exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend The Anaheim Hotel. It’s beautiful and very close to Disneyland main entrance. Thank you for employing such great people!
Manager Response: Hi There,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: What an amazing first guest impression.  My wife and I brought our 2 older kids (out of 4) for a rare theme park adventure.  As a family that doesn't usually get the "grand" experience, we decided on this budget hotel (or so we thought).  Candi greeted us at the desk and accommodated our all of our needs, and made us feel like the most important people in the hotel.  What a blessing this has been!    I highly recommend the staff and this facility.    Also, even for a place that seems like its been around for a minute, its very nice inside, the rooms are clean and comfortable, and we couldn't be more thrilled.  Thank you!    Have I mentioned that Candi was phenomenal?
Manager Response: Hello There,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that Candi was so wonderful, and that you enjoyed your visit with us.  We hope you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel, so close to Disneyland.
Summary: We had the best stay. Great service. Housekeeping every day! Friendly staff. Upscale amenities. The best part was how close it was to Disneyland.  5-10 minute walk. Hawaiian style atmosphere.  Beautiful grounds, big pool.
Manager Response: Hello Julie,  We thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I love coming to this hotel.  The staff is amazing.         As soon as we walk in Leo greets us with his beautiful smile. He is always on point! There is no better feeling than being remembered. Leo makes my family and I feel special and is one of the reasons we keep coming back. This hotel is magical. Candy at the front desk is always wonderful too. She is another reason we feel comfortable coming here. This hotel staff is wonderful. The grounds are completely clean and flawless. Great grounds if you happen to be in a wheelchair!! We get nothing but good energy coming from this place. I highly recommend this hotel because of the excellent staff. It’s more than just a hotel!  Thank you Leo!!
Manager Response: Hello Mr. and Mrs. Musgrave!  We thank you for your review, and your continued loyalty to our hotel. We know you have many hotels to choose from in The Disneyland Resort area, and we are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel. We look forward to your next visit :)  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We traveled with our son and daughter and their 3 kids. We asked to be close to one another, and they gave us adjoining rooms.
