It was so fun to have the littles burst in our room in the morning excited and ready for Disneyland. The rooms are clean and they do room cleaning every day.  We loved the deck off our room. It’s nice to sit out and have coffee in the morning before we left for the park.  We love the Pizza Press that is on the property.  We were there for Easter and they had a little egg hunt for the kiddos.   We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Hello Brenda!  We thank you for writing your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and our property! We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I would highly recommend this place! We had an amazing stay while visiting Disneyland! Very helpful and nice staff. Great pool! Rooms nice and clean! 5 minute walk to Disneyland! We will be staying her again!
Manager Response: Hello Bobbie!  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was so helpful. That's what its all about for us! We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Charming hotel that is clean and close to the parks
Summary: We had a great experience at The Anaheim Hotel and will definitely stay here again. is it a 5 star resort? No, but the rooms are clean and comfortable. The staff was amazing and took great care of us and you cannot beat the close location.
Manager Response: Hello Sarah,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that our staff took such good care of you :)  We hope you choose our hotel the next time you visit Anaheim.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel has always been good. Close to the park and has a certain nice pool. Leo in concierge is great!!! Thanks for the great trip. The pizza press has great pizza offers coffee for guests in the morning.
Manager Response: Hello Amy!  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful! We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The staff here is nice and friendly. Leo is the best he is so kind and is a lot of help. Best customer service I’ve ever had. He always goes out of his way to help me. I’ll be coming back again thank you.
Manager Response: Hello There,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that Leo was so friendly, and that you enjoyed your visit with us.  We hope you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great value, great service and large comfortable rooms
Summary: I was going to “save money” and stay at the Desert Palms, they changed their policy for allowing mobility device companies to drop off mobility devices for guests, they NEVER notified me, I found out by contacting the scooter company a couple days before my stay, they told me, I had to cancel my reservation and scramble to find an accessible hotel room. My favorite place to stay, The Anaheim Hotel, had just what I needed. I’m not compromising on any more stays near Disneyland…just go with The Anaheim Hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Barbara,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We know you have many hotels to choose from in the Disneyland Resort area, and we are honored that you choose our hotel! We look forward to having you stay with us again :)  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Service Management

Summary: The hotel is very close to Disneyland. Super convenient! It isn’t the most luxury hotel, more of a motel but, you can’t beat the price and location.  Our air conditioning was super loud which is why I’m giving this 4 stars but other than that it’s a great value.
Manager Response: Hello Alaina,   We thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences with your AC, we have maintenance on property 24 hours a day should you ever need assistance. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Service Management

Summary: A huge shoutout to Leo, helping my sister, niece and I transport 10 bags of luggage + a car seat, almost all by himself. Leo was also so friendly and easy to talk to which made us so much happier after a 3 hour car drive. Awesome service even from the check in, help is always welcomed. Thank you!
Manager Response: Hi There!  We want to thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. We know you have a lot of choices when booking your Disneyland trip, and are always excited to have you stay with us. It's great to hear that you had such a wonderful experience with our bell team. They are a great team to work with! We look forward to having you stay with us again sometime soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Service Management

Summary: We checked in early and Leo not only held our bags but also told the next bellman to take to our room if the room was ready before we got back.  Every time he saw us he checked in to see if we needed anything.  Leo is the reason we finally found our “hotel home” while visiting Disney.   Hotel across the street from Disney is a close 2nd reason.
Manager Response: Hi There!  We want to thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. We know you have a lot of choices when booking your Disneyland trip, and are always excited to have you stay with us. It's great to hear that you had such a wonderful experience with our bell team. They are a great team to work with! We look forward to having you stay with us again sometime soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Service Management

Summary Heading: Best Hotel for a Disneyland Trip
Summary: My Family and I had recently stayed at the Anaheim Hotel, where I have stayed numerous times in the past and had always been very satisfied. This visit, I was met with several issues that I suspected may have been simple post-COVID adjustments. The Manager (Candi Crowe) was aware of my concerns and issues. She reached out and insisted that I try the hotel again as the issues that were brought to her attention were exceptions and not actual reflections of the hotel. I am so happy to report that any issues or concerns I had on my most recent trip, evaporated away and the Anaheim is back to its former glory.  The Anaheim Hotel is very close to the front gates of both parks, which is a welcome luxury after walking all day. The hotel has a pizza restaurant that is excellent. It does
Manager Response: Hi There!  We want to thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. We know you have a lot of choices when booking your Disneyland trip, and are always excited to have you stay with us. It's great to hear that you had such a wonderful experience with our guest satisfaction team. They really try to go the extra mile! We look forward to having you stay with us again sometime soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Service Management

Summary: Check in / check out process was easy. Room was ready when we arrived. Location was very convenient when visiting Disneyland. It is a 5 minute walk to the main entrance to the Parks. Parking was safe and affordable. No issues with the vehicle. Security was wandering the parking lot often. Much cheaper and faster than parking at the Disney Parking Garages. Room was a little dated but clean. Carpet was a bit old but otherwise the room was more than adequate if you are going to spend most of your day at the parks anyway. Lobby and pool area are updated in mid-century modern décor.
Manager Response: Hello Manny!  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again, and management is looking into your concerns.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Candi and her staff are very helpful and accommodating.  We are looking forward to staying at this property again in June!  Not only is the customer service amazing, but the proximity to Disneyland is great as well! I highly recommend this hotel!!
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you continue to choose our hotel every time you visit Disneyland! We are looking forward to your next visit :)  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Special place in a GREAT location
Summary: This hotel is super cute and has great outdoor amenities (games & heated pool + hot tub) plus a yummy pizza restaurant connected to the hotel. Super fun vibes. The hotel room itself is your basic hotel room, nothing fancy, but clean and gets the job done.  The staff, especially Candi, are wonderful. We told them it was our anniversary & they surprised us with a gift when we checked into our room. Candi was knowledgeable, super friendly & went above and beyond to make our stay the best. Also, we were able to safely store our luggage between checkout and when it was time for our flight so we could explore without having to deal with our bags.  Plus, it's legit a 10-minute walk from your hotel room to the Disney security line - you really can't beat this.  Highly recommend this
Manager Response: Hello Gabrielle,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and our property. Congratulations on your anniversary! We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Me and my wife and son came for a honeymoon and the staff was all super friendly They went above and beyond to meet our needs especially the bell captain Leo dasilva I would highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Hello Miguel,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that Leo was so friendly, and that you enjoyed your "surprise"  in your room. Our Concierge Marissa set that up :)  We hope you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for a great location
Summary: This hotel was in a prime location to Disneyland Park and food.  We will be staying here again. The only downfall was the hot tub was out of order but I understand things happened and the pool towels were starchy and the size of a hand towel so you had to use at least 3.  The beds were great, the room felt clean and fresh! The tub controls were backward so the hot water was cold and the cold was hot. They also just need to adjust the doors to the room as they did not seal so there was a lot of light and noise being let in. They just need to add some door sweeps/weather stripping.   We will however be coming back! (just wish they had breakfast included)
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you love it here, and that our staff was so helpful! We have informed management about your concerns, and they are being addressed. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Front desk was very helpful, friendly and courteous. I arrived well before check in time and had time to kill. I bugged them a few times for things while I was waiting and there was no issue at all! They treated me well and in this world, that’s all I can ask for!
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you love it here, and that our staff was so helpful! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We stayed at this hotel last September for about 11 nights, and we will be returning again later this week solely because of how friendly the staff was.  Don't get me wrong, it is a nice hotel, with decent amenities and located within easy walking distance Disneyland (way closer than several other hotels that advertise being close to the park).  The selling point was entirely the staff though.  Every single staff member says hello and makes you feel really welcome, to the point where it feels like home away from home.  Very excited to stay there again!  Mike the bellman was especially friendly.  We had many conversations with him through the course of our stay and he always would remember us and previous conversations, which is not something I can say about other places we have
Manager Response: Hello Amanda,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you love it here, and that our staff is so helpful! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This is an awesome option if you’re going to Disneyland. Reasonably priced, upgraded rooms and amenities, on-site restaurant, and a 7-10 minute walk to Disneyland. Perfection!  We stayed for 2 nights when we took our twins to Disneyland for their 6th bday. I had written in our reservation notes that we were celebrating their birthday, and didn’t expect much. However, when we entered the room, they’d decorated the beds with Happy Birthday sighs, had blown up a bunch of Mickey Mouse balloons, left confetti on the nightstand, gave them a bag of candy and delicious cookies, and even left a hand-written birthday card. It blew us away! And it TOTALLY made my daughters’ day! Perfect start to our trip.   The hotel itself isn’t brand new, but they’ve done a great job with renovations
Manager Response: Hello Emily,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: A solid option for families visiting Disneyland who want a short walk
Summary: Pros: Extremely close to the parks, reasonable prices, large, clean room, good towels,  comfortable beds, good access to power and USB outlets, easy online checkin/out, and great staff (the Bell staff was awesome - thanks to Leo Dasilva for making our trip easier).  Cons: Tiny bathroom, Rooms near the ice machine are noisy Neutral: the attached restaurant is a pizza place, which can be great or terrible depending on your needs. We did not use the parking or pool, so I can't comment on those. To sum up, we will probably stay here again. It's clean, close and family friendly.
Manager Response: Hello Bluebird,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that Leo was so helpful. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: AMAZING STAY AT THE ANAHEIM HOTEL
Summary: We stayed at several hotels in Disneyland and I will definitely go back to The Anaheim Hotel.  Their staff was outstanding, kind and friendly.  We went with several family members and one of the rooms was supposed to have two king beds and instead had two queen beds.  The staff was very helpful and the mistake was corrected immediately.
Manager Response: Hello Getaway23496,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you and your family enjoyed your visit. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Anaheim hotel was everything we needed. Thank you to the wonderful staff for a wonderful stay! Great amenities and close to the park. Amazing sized pool. You can even leave your car parked here on checkout day if you plan to go to one of the parks! For a small fee- less than Disneylands!
Manager Response: Hello Alexia,  We thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I just loved this mid-century modern hotel very conveniently located by Disneyland. We had a room with a fireworks view and you could sit on the balcony and see the Disneyland fireworks.  Our room wasn't huge, but it was just what we needed.  The beds were very comfortable.  The staff were wonderful as well.   Couple of items I would change - in the lobby they pumped this very strong perfume smell all the time - I was not able to be in there very long because of my allergies. Another would be related to the AC in the room - the rooms have small window units situated near the floor - I am not sure how well this would cool the rooms in warmer temperatures.  While we were there the temperature was moderate to cool and the room still felt stuffy - we had to open the sliding glass
Manager Response: Hello Michelle,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We are also looking into your concerns. We hope that you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Best Choice of Hotel near Disneyland! The very best.
Summary: We stayed at all the hotels across the street from Disneyland and this is our first choice. We’re loyal to this hotel now because of their top notch customer service, mid century modern decor and great pool. Not to mention the insanely comfortable beds. Hope that you get to check in with Sam, that guy always finds a way to make our stay over the top amazing. He is what inspired my husband and I to write this review for the hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Megan,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to stay with us! We are thrilled that Sam went above and beyond for you, and we are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Went to Anaheim hotel for business- Leo was extremely helpful and funny from the moment I parked my car- he attended to our every need, helped with luggage and even helped when he saw me roaming the hotel later that day, clearly lost. I wi visit again! Everyone was extremely helpful!
Manager Response: Hello Rebecca,   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your visit, and that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I can’t say enough….from the ease of access to the parks and excellent customer service this property is perfect!  Oh and Housekeeping is top notch, they even organized our toiletries that were left out on the  counter.  Also, you can view the fireworks from the pool.   If you are looking for a family friendly property near Disneyland, this is the place!
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel, and had such a great experience with the team. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Came for a family/friend wedding and stayed a few extra days for Disney and relaxation, enjoying every moment!  Every interaction with staff came with a personal and caring touch so shout-out to the whole team making this possible, from room service to maintenance to front desk and management. Very large pool, outdoor recreation spaces, and seating areas; great for all kinds of activities. Oh and Pizza Press on the premises was a favorite lunch spot. A short walk to Disneyland, Downtown Disney, and surrounding shopping/eating. We very much enjoyed our stay and will return someday!
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel, and had such a great experience with the team. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Service was excellent! Food was really good at the Front Room Lounge, they cleaned the rooms and replaced the towels, sheets everyday!  The games they had were fun! The pool was very nice. 11 ft was the deepest. that’s rare to find! The room was nice with a big Flat screen TV! I’ve never written a review but I feel like I had to! I’d love to stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Vince,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property, and your stay! We hope you choose our hotel the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: After driving over 10 hours in an oversized van with 5 kids, we were greeted very warmly by the staff (Candy, Tristan and Jocelyn). We had a lot of questions and needs (combined reservations so we wouldn’t have to switch rooms, adjoining rooms, roll-away, parking for an oversized vehicle). They helped and solved every issue. We felt so happy after our long drive with how easy it was. Plus, we are right across the street from the park! We will stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you chose to stay with us, and had such a wonderful experience. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel.

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel twice in 6 months for Disney trips. It’s clean, comfortable, and so close to Disney! Not to mention the lobby smells like heaven. Leo is always so helpful with our bags and getting us to and from our room. The pool is awesome and huge! It’s so big that even if other guests are there it feels like you have it to yourself! You’re not making any mistakes by staying here!
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel, and had such a great experience with Leo. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: The Kindness of this Amazing Staff !!
Summary: I stay at this hotel 4 to 5 times a year. I love this place ! In my 5 years of being an  A/P or magic key holder as we are called now this is my favorite hotel and the best place to stay if you need to bring your Dog or if you have kids who love huge pool to play in !  My last 2 trips were  bitter sweet and were 4 weeks apart . The first trip was last minute because my dog Littleman  had passed away and I just needed to get away go to Disney and ugly cry. I left san jose at 1 am and arrived at the hotel at 7:30 am . Karen was so kind and  got my room right then at 7:30 so I could nap and relax before heading in the park. Sam and Leo  were both so kind and professional making sure I had a great trip both of them had met my dog on my trip in september and they made me feel at home
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel, and had such a great experience with the team. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We've been staying at this hotel our past 10 visits to Disneyland.    It is a block and a half away from where taxis and buses would drop you.  The property is pretty large and is comprised of some 8 bungalow style buildings, each 2 story, and each with it's own patio or deck.  Finally, the price is pretty competitive given it's proximity to the park.
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I was meeting family members in the area and the staff made me want to stay here myself. Leo at the front door was beyond kind. Immediately struck a conversation with me and made me feel at home. After telling him I was just here to meet with family, he walked me in to the front and provided a warm handoff to the concierge. The scent alone in the place was amazing, but also the front desk was super helpful as well. Helped me with my questions about the property and all while maintaining interesting conversation. If given the opportunity, I will be staying here no doubt!
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel, and glad to hear that Leo was so great. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo was very kind and helped us out with our luggage. He handled all of our luggage while directing us from the hotel to our Uber pickup destination. Thank you for making us feel welcome and taking care of us!
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel, and that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Can’t beat kitty corner from the park entrance!
Summary: We always stay here when we come to Disney.  Kristopher gave us a free upgrade this time to the executive queen room.  Much appreciated!  We love the Olympic size pool.  They’re always pumping awesome big band tunes in the pool area so it feels festive.  The accommodations are not deluxe but you really cannot beat being across the street from the park entrance.  We go back to the hotel midday to nap since the hotel is close enough to do that.  It’s magical.
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel, and that Kris was helpful. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The location was so convenient for our Disneyland trip. The rooms were cleaned every day we were in the park. The staff was so friendly and helpful. Highly recommend this hotel for your Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Hello Bex,  We thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed  your stay, and we are looking forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We always have a wonderful stay at The Anaheim Hotel. Kandi, Marcela, Leo and Mike are the best and always make us feel so important and comfortable. Even when we are just parking. We will always stay and park here.
Manager Response: Hello Orlando,  We thank you for leaving your review. We are so happy that you continue to enjoy our property, and that our staff is so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The location of this hotel cannot be beat. It was so nice to have a short walk from the parks after a long day or for a quick midday nap. The rooms were very comfortable and quiet. The beds were comfortable. The hotel lobby theme was fun and updated. We didn’t use the pool or yard games but they all looked very nice and well kept. The rooms could use a minor upgrade but that will not stop us from returning again.
Manager Response: Hello Heather,  We thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to your next visit.   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We booked a room at the Anaheim Hotel through Disney. The proximity to the parks was a definite deciding factor. We were however taken aback by the courtesy and professionalism of the staff, the comfort of the beds, the parking, the spacious room, and so much more!   My hat is off to Kristopher first and foremost because he was a fantastic front desk guy for the majority of our stay. The proximity to Disneyland is excellent. It is just a nine minute walk to the parks and a fantastic option if you don't want to have to stay on property at Disney. The parking is very secure, with security personnel patrolling 24/7.   The attached restaurant, The Pizza Press is a fantastic dining option, and one we will visit again.   If I have one qualm, it is the AC. The temperature in the room
Manager Response: Hello Rick,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and that Kris was so helpful, he is fantastic! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Never be cheap with hotels, you get what you pay for.
Summary: Good lobby!  The hotel rooms are dirty and the bathrooms are worse them a college dorm.   The so called gym/laundry mat looks like it is never cleaned.  When I asked for cleaning wipes for the equipment in the gym,the front desk said there is someone who cleans it hourly.
Manager Response: Hello Peter,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We deeply apologize for the experience you had. We have attempted to reach you. We would love a chance to make things right with you, Please call the hotel so we can discuss your stay. We have noted all of these concerns and management is looking into them.   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Love this hotel and Leo is amazing!!!
Summary: I am honestly not surprised to see Leo’s name popping up in all of the reviews about this hotel because he truly is amazing! We’ve stayed at this hotel twice already during our visits to Disneyland and it was because of Leo and his hospitality that we decided to keep coming back to Hotel Anaheim. He’s so genuine and you can tell he enjoys meeting new people and really enjoys what he does. We’ve had the opportunity to meet a lot of the other staff as well and everyone has been so nice and accommodating. The rooms are spacious, clean and the best part is how close it is to the main entrance of the parks. It is so convenient and nice to not have to walk too far after spending around all day at the parks. I highly recommend this hotel and can’t wait to see Leo again on our next
Manager Response: Hello Jeanette,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to having you stay with us again.   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Second time I’ve stayed here and I’m obsessed
Summary: Mike & Leo are Amy favorite people. My first stay was in October 2021 and my second trip was a couple weeks ago. I can’t wait to go back! The first trip was for birthdays and they left a card and fresh baked cookies in our room.
Manager Response: Hello Allie,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your visit, and that Leo and Mike were so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We stay often but Candy and Marissa always make it extra special! This time, cookies and a bday card awaited us in our immaculate rm! Rob thanks Marissa! Candy arrived the next day making sure to yell hello to us 8n the jacuzzi! That's service and makes us feel like we're home! Until next month! We love you guys so much! xoxoxo The Loud Smith Family!!!!
Manager Response: Hello!   We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that you continue to choose our hotel. We look forward to your next trip!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Hotel is good, but Leo was better
Summary: Hotel: Close to Disneyland,  11 ft deep pool, great staff, huge tvs, with 3-star coffee and a pizza resturant serving breakfast burritos.  Leo: An incredible employee who deserves a place in your checkin/checkout experience.  But, do you deserve Leo? Ask yourself that as he's hauling your Mickey Mouse dinner plate collection from the hotel room to your car...
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I’ve had an annual pass to Disneyland for year so I’ve stayed at plenty of hotels in the areas and the Anaheim is by far my favorite. Leo and the rest of the staff make you feel like you’re staying with best friends. I will definitely be staying at the Anaheim for future trips.
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that you love our property, and that you enjoyed visiting! We look forward to having you visit us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay and Super close to Disneyland
Summary: We spent 5 nights here for a trip to Disneyland. The location was excellent and it was an easy walk to Disney. Check in was a breeze and it was easy to find our room. The property was extremely clean and well kept. We had a double king room which was plenty big for the 3 of us. Housekeeping only came in if requested and we had a small issue trying to swap out towels but it was handled promptly. You could see the Disney fireworks from the pool area/parking lot. The pool was huge with plenty of chairs/loungers. Overall, it was a great stay and we would not hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon,   Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to your next visit!   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We went up 2 days this week for Disneyland and parked at The Anaheim Hotel both times. On Tuesday Mike was friendly and helpful, he always puts a smile on my face before we start our Disney days.  Then on Thursday Leo was really helpful as well. He has always gone out of his way to help my family when we visit and we appreciate him so much!  Even though we didn’t stay at the hotel this time, we enjoy being able to park there and always look forward to when we can stay since the hotel is great! We use them for our parking and hotel needs whenever we go up.
Manager Response: Hello There!  Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that you continue to park with us, and we are looking forward to your next visit!   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Whenever we visit Disneyland, we always book with Anaheim Hotel. It's close to the front entrance and is clean and quiet.   And we always look for Leo, whose smile makes our trip that much better!!   Thanks!
Manager Response: Hello Kay!   Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that you continue to stay with us, and we are looking forward to your next visit!   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: It's Close to the Main Gate. Otherwise... Meh.
Summary: I've stayed at The Anaheim Hotel two times now. It's a "you get what you pay for" situation. The place is pretty dated, thin walls, room doors that are hard to open and close (we had to physically KICK the door of our most recent room to get it to open), verrrrry out-of-date bathrooms. Rooms are a touch on the small side, but you're not in them much, so not a big deal.   The best thing about The Anaheim Hotel is its proximity to Disneyland. An easy walk to the entrance (easier from the rooms located near the front of the property!). Staff members are generally friendly and the bartender made us a couple of stiff drinks after a long day at the parks which was appreciated. Attached pizza restaurant is convenient and reasonably priced.  This hotel is a no-nonsense, no-frills option
Manager Response: Hello,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We deeply apologize for the experience you had.  We have attempted to reach you, but was unsuccessful. We would love a chance to make things right with you, Please call the hotel so we can discuss your stay. We have noted all of these concerns and management is looking into them. We would love to have you come back and stay.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We didn’t stay at the Anaheim Hotel this time, but we used their Disneyland parking option. As it turned out, we made 2 DL trips this week, due to an out-of-state visit from a friend. On Tuesday, March 8, Mike was so friendly and helpful! He is such an exceptional staff member. Today, Thursday March 10, Leo was so helpful! He is incredible: helpful, friendly, and courteous! These two men give the visitors to the hotel an amazing first impression!!
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer,  We are so happy that our location works out for you. We are thrilled that Mike and Leo were so helpful! :) We look forward to having you stay with us soon.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We have been parking here since we got our Disney passes in September. It’s a great location, only 5-10 min. walk to Disneyland. Whenever we park here it’s a great pleasure to see Marissa who is always super friendly and kind. She always remembers me and my son and greets us with a big smile. It’s nice to see a welcoming, familiar face! Thank you, Marissa!
Manager Response: Hello Escape473700,  We are so happy our location works for you, and that Marissa was so helpful! We would love to have you stay with us!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The front lobby is very retro meets modern and pretty.  Plenty of seats while you wait for check in.  The rooms are very clean and tidy.  The beds were super comfy and the patio is a great touch I did not expect as its larger than you’d think.  The front desk was super helpful and courteous.   We will definitely be staying here more often. It’s only about a 6-10min walk to Disneyland depending on how fast you walk.  The only thing you should prepare for,  is check in is at 4pm. No exceptions like some other places.  There is an early check in fee otherwise,  4pm is it.  Not a negative, just something to keep in mind.
Manager Response: Hello Mark,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to having you stay with us again. Our check in time is 4pm, but if we have rooms ready early we can check you in early.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We had a great experience here. The check in/out process was really easy, and the price was a good deal for such a quick walk to Disneyland. The room was clean and had everything we needed. Having a private patio was a nice perk, but I wish it had a light outside for use in the evening.
Manager Response: Hello! We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that you love our property, and that you enjoyed visiting! We look forward to having you visit us again. In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel.

Summary: We chose this hotel primary for the location, as it is a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. This was for sure a huuuge perk of this hotel, but we also enjoyed the overall experience! Our room was nice and had lots of drawers for storage. The hotel staff was super friendly and made us feel very welcome every time we saw them. Check-in and check-out were both super easy and painless. Highly recommend! Will be coming back!
Manager Response: Hello! We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that you love our property, and that you enjoyed visiting! We look forward to having you visit us again. In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel.

Summary Heading: It's the little things that count
Summary: I spent 8 days at the Anaheim hotel, the first half with a bachelorette party (only 2 of us stayed) and the 2nd with my family. When my daughter arrived, later that night she ended up with a serious stomach flu for over 24 hours (she was devastated to lose a whole day and a half at Disney!) needless to say, we didn't leave our room other than to go to CVS or get food. My husband went to the front desk a couple times to ask for bags for a bucket (yuck), and more towels. The cleaning staff were super friendly and took the old towels out and brought us new towels. The next day, Tristan (?) at the front desk saw my husband walking by and checked in to see how my daughter was feeling. It's those little things that make a stay great! Overall, the location is AMAZING, especially after
Manager Response: Hello Dana,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled that Tristan was so helpful, and we are happy your child is feeling better. We hope you choose our hotel again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We came to Anaheim for Disneyland/Disney California Adventure. The Anaheim hotel is so conveniently close to the Disney security gate. The rooms could use some refreshing, but overall it met our needs and the beds were comfortable. We will consider the Anaheim Hotel again if/when we return to Anaheim and would recommend it to others visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello CJW,  We thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: GREAT hotel, even GREATER STAFF!! WE LOVE LEO and ROXANNE!
Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is a great hotel with the FRIENDLIEST staff. Leo went from being a stranger to becoming my best friend within a matter of minutes. The staff is so accommodating and want to make sure you feel like family. The pool and hotel grounds were kept very clean and everyone was so friendly. They were so accommodating to our extremely large group (29) and made sure we had everything we need. Everyone deserves to feel like family on a vacation. Make sure to tell Leo HI from SKYLINE CHEER!
Manager Response: Hello there!  We thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that Leo and Roxane were so helpful. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Perfect hotel for a trip to Disneyland. The staff were very friendly and welcoming! Leo and Karen were especially helpful and accommodating when helping us get checked in. Also loved the large pool, bar area and pizza restaurants connected to the hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Lexy,  We thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that Leo and Karen were so helpful. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We travel to Disneyland several times a year and have stayed at many hotels in the area. This is our favorite place for a couple years now. Staff is always friendly and accommodating.  rooms are daily cleaned with fresh towels. I love the old Hollywood retro feel. Location and price are a welcomed bonus.
Manager Response: Hello David,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that you continue to stay with us, and we are looking forward to your next visit!   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: A great stay! Thanks Leo and Ethan
Summary: When my girlfriend from out of town wanted to enjoy a day and night at Disneyland, we decided we don't want to drive home. I jumped at the chance to let her know about The Anaheim Hotel. It is close to the park but more importantly a safe and lovely place to get a room. We interacted with  Ethan and Leo and both gentlemen were wonderfully kind. Leo works parking/security and we felt completely safe. Ethan was so polite everytime we interacted with him. It is great when you can stay somewhere and be treated with respect and kindness your whole stay. The rooms are clean and the ambiance is fun. Love the ultra lounge look and The Pizza Press is right next door! We didn't get to enjoy the pool etc since we spent most our time at the parks. We were quite delighted to have a great
Manager Response: Hello Ailene,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that Leo and Ethan were so helpful, and that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Wow!! What a gem!! This hotel was in the perfect location for Disneyland. Tristan and Marissa at the front desk are the best and went above and beyond to help make our stay unforgettable. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hello Jessica,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that Marissa and Tristan were so helpful! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We loved our stay here as it gave us everything we were looking for. The price for its proximity to Disneyland is great, and a quick walk to the parks entrance. The grounds and decor are unique, clean, and simple. The staff gave us a huge amount of care. We had an issue with a third party booking that Candi very hospitably resolved and left me with a very postive experience that complimented our time at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Keith,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. It was a pleasure assisting you, and I hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We stay at the Anaheim Hotel 3-4 times a year. It is our go to for all our Disney trips. Candi at the front desk has been nothing but helpful and has made our trips great everytime. Our daughter loves the pool, wife lives the Sinatra music. Staff is helpful and polite.  Best hotel for your buck in the Disney Corridor.
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for your review, and we are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and that Candi was so helpful! We look forward to having you stay with again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: LOOOOOOOOOOVED IT! I go to Disneyland quite often from Vegas, and this was my first time staying at this property and I loved every bit of it. Directly across from Disneyland, this was the perfect location. Took about 10 minutes to get to Disney and there were many nice eateries nearby. The Anaheim Gardenwalk is right behind it too! I am a travel agent and used to work for Tripadvisor, so my requirements for a hotel are pretty high, and this property met all expectations. Let me start by saying that Marissa at the front desk was phenomenal! I won't say exactly what she did for us, to avoid others trying to take advantage, but she really made the entire stay comfortable and accommodating. The entire staff at the front desk was very polite and friendly, even the guy who takes in
Manager Response: Hello LeWanda!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property, and that Marissa was so helpful! We look forward to having you stay with again, and yes book direct!   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Room was comfortable and surprisingly quiet.  Staff were universally pleasant and accommodating.  Housekeeping was particularly warm and friendly.  Fantastic room for the price and just an 8 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland. The balcony sealed the deal.  Fireworks were visible from the room
Manager Response: Hello Akronaut,  We thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We have been parking here will the tram service has been down at Disney. Its way better than walking from Mickey and Friends parking structure and parking has always been available, except one day we got there and they were full. However, Leo went above and beyond and ensured we got a parking spot! He was so kind and sweet and ensured we were able to have a good day at Disney knowing our car was in good hands!
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that you love our property, and that you enjoyed visiting! We look forward to having you visit us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel is located 5 mins away from Disneyland and has a great pool. I love that the rooms are always clean and ready for my stay. The pizza press is a great place for dinner and has great breakfast and coffee for the morning. The rooms were kept clean and refreshed daily and the new store is a great addition for late night snacks and beverages so you don't have to go anywhere else. I also appreciate having groceries delivered and held until I am able to pick them up. Please consider this location for your next family vacation.
Manager Response: Hello Sarah,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and the Pizza Press! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Went to The Anaheim Hotel to pick up a scooter.  Leo the concierge was extremely helpful and very professional.  He offered us tips on our Disneyland trip.  He is very friendly and knowledgeable.  He gave us history of the hotel & offered us water while we waited.  Never stayed here but already booked my first stay!
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that you love our property, and that you enjoyed visiting! We look forward to having you visit us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Leo, Leo, Leo is the star every hotel needs!
Summary: We arrived at the hotel too early for check in due to a mix up in travel plans and the staff were extremely accommodating. Being weary and tired we waited a brief period in the lobby while being offered drinks and comfortable seating, several staff approached us with offers of water and guidance on what there is to see in town. Kristopher was super helpful and cheery on check in and gave us a wealth of information regarding our room, access to disney land and what to expect ahead for our trip. While waiting in the lobby Leo approached us and worked his unbelievable logistical magic to get us into our room early so we could pass out on some very comfortable beds. We can't sing the praises of Leo enough, he made our stay very warm and welcoming and we couldn't be happier to have
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that you love our property, and that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We love the amenities of this hotel, but Leo is the real gem. He was overly accommodating for our parking situation and made us feel like this hotel is a bit magical itself. He should honestly be running the whole place! Amenities deserve a 5, the rest of the staff would make it a 3, but Leo bumps it back up to a 4.
Manager Response: Hello!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that you love our property, and that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel is amazing. First I’d like to point out the fact that it is extremely close to Disneyland main entrance. It’s very affordable, very clean in the rooms and all around the grounds. Big beautiful pool. The staff are all super friendly and helpful. The pizza place that’s connected to it is awesome. I love sitting in the courtyard listening to the water and just relaxing. I have never had a bad experience here. I come here a lot with my family and I will not stay at any other hotel. I highly recommend this place!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Denise,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy that you love our property, and that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: It’s a clean, friendly and welcoming hotel. It is an older hotel but has been renovated to not feel as old. But you can not beat the location if you’re coming for a Disney trip. The walk to the Disney entrance is about the same as the walk from the Disney parking structure to the entrance so you can easily walk to and from the Disney park in less than 10 minutes. I will definitely stay here again for my next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Hello Timothy,  We thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your visit, and we are looking forward to your next stay.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Few small fixes and they could be Disney!
Summary: We arrived early unable to check in early because our room was not ready we were given a key for parking and the pool. We enjoyed lunch at the Pizza Press with excellent fast friendly service and good pie! Then we let the kids go swimming while dad and I enjoyed relaxing poolside. Check in was at 4:00 pm, I went back to the front desk shortly before then where they had a crowd of people trying to check in. My room was not ready still so I relaxed in the lobby for about 30-40 minutes more. Karen was a wonderful guest experience provider, she walked up to me with my room key explained all I needed to know and offered to have someone help us unload our luggage. Our room was clean and spacious! We made ourselves at home right away and prepared for our quick walk to Downtown Disney
Manager Response: Hello Shauna,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit, and that Karen was so helpful. Management is looking into your concerns. We look forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great lobby, bar and Pizza Press! Convenient and clean!
Summary: Great for the minimalist who doesn't require bars, night clubs, babysitting services and room service. It's right across from California Adventure (as most hotels around there are, right across from the Guardians of the Galaxy ride. Friendly and accommodating staff and at the time of this, there is a testing sight to have your swabs done for your flight home. (I don't want to write the word of the virus but you can be tested there.) They don't do daily housekeeping but we asked one time for them to swap out the towels and it was done while we were at the They have a good sized pool and hot tub! A lot of hotel hot tubs are 6 people maximum but I think there were a dozen of us in there with room to spare. Nice heated pool you can swim in 'til 10 at night. We had a nice, private
Manager Response: Hello Cijay,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We apologize for the miscommunication about daily housekeeping services. We offer housekeeping daily. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: As usual, a beautiful stay, awesome room, clean pool and my girls Marissa and Karen made my day when I arrived! They greeted me with a huge HAPPY BIRTHDAY as I arrived and Marissa made it even more special by leaving a bday card and cookies for me in my room! This is why we choose the Anaheim because we feel like family is greeting us everytime! Thank you and don't laugh, but see you in 5 days again!! You all rock!!! -The Smith Family
Manager Response: Hello Shellye!  We thank you for leaving your review! We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, and that Marissa and Karen were so helpful- they are amazing! We look forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: 1st time our grandsons have been to Disneyland trip!
Summary: Thank you Anaheim hotel for making our trip to Disneyland with our family so amazing! Your hotel was beyond what we expected and we loved the oversized rooms, large balcony where we could sit and visit and have drinks, play yard with corn hole, heated pool, yummy pizza all for such an affordable price!! The best was the 6 min walk to entrance from hotel! We will definitely be back and recommending this place to everyone going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hello Michele,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We stayed here for 2 separate stays in November, both were great.  Todd, the bellman is beyond amazing.  Pleasant, easy to chat with and super helpful.  Candi at the front desk was also great.  Love staying here and look forward to coming back when we can!
Manager Response: Hello Donna,  We thank you for your review. We are so happy you enjoyed your visits, and we look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We arrived and were happily greeted by Leo he was very helpful and went over and beyond to help us with our stuff to our room. I love running into great employees that love their job and are great at doing it!
Manager Response: Hello Monique,  We thank you for your review. We are thrilled to hear that Leo was so helpful. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is our go to place to stay when visiting Anaheim. The staff is great and the supervisor Candi Crowe is absolutely amazing. She is always so helpful each time we have stayed. Any questions or concerns we have she always answers or takes care of. The cleaning service was always spot on, they went out of their way to fold clothes and blankets left on the bed and nicely arranging the kids stuffed animals on the bed which made the children's day! We love the pizza press! Food is awesome. Love the close walk to Disney! This hotel is amazing and perfect! Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Michelle,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. Thank you for your kind words. We are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Always love staying here! Anything you need, 24 hour desk service and huge pool!  Bar & Pizza , a mix for everyone!  Leo & Candy always check in to make sure I have what I need & the room is what was expected!  It’s a 6-7 min walk to security at Disney!  We will always stay here ! Sign up for the loyalty program and you receive free stays as well as discount at pizza press and waters!
Manager Response: Hello Morgan!  We love it when you stay here! Thank you for your review, we are so pleased that you continue to stay here. We are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: In November of '21 we had the pleasure of introducing more of our extended family to The Anaheim Hotel. It has been our go-to place for many years. This trip a dozen of us stayed in five rooms and everyone liked the mid-century-modern decor. Of course, the staff made the stay. Rooms were clean, the grounds were well groomed, the pool is a great distraction from the Disneyland hustle and bustle.  Very competitive pricing, and although you may find a better rate somewhere else, it won't be as convenient or as enjoyable.  Kristopher and Candi put the stay over the top for all our family.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Hello Sam!   We thank you for your review! We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your family trip, and that you continue to come back! We are looking forward to your next visit.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for a Disney trip
Summary: We loved our stay at the Anaheim Hotel! We stayed in an executive queen room and added a rollaway bed, it was perfect for our family of 5. When we walked out of our hotel room door we had a perfect view of Guardians tower - literally right across the street. It was a 10 min walk from our room to the security line at Disneyland. I counted only two non-disney hotels that had a shorter walk. Also right next door to the Gardenwalk which seemed like an outdoor mall with restaurants and a movie theater.  The room was clean and quiet, the beds were comfy.  The bathroom was spacious and bright with a large double vanity. The in room fridge was small, but still enough space for a few snacks and drinks. The staff was very attentive and helpful, quickly bringing extra towels & toilet paper
Manager Response: Hello Jane,  We thank you for taking the time  to write your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and our property. We hope you choose The Anaheim Hotel the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great stay, will definitely be back!
Summary: The good: LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION! It couldn’t have been better. We came back for a mid day nap. Also, they are pet friendly and I didn’t hear one bark the whole time, also didn’t see random poo anywhere (including the pet walking area).   The bad: TINY ROOM & BATHROOM! We did get the standard room with a patio, I’ll definitely upgrade to the executive room next time (on the 2nd level) for a little more space.   The ugly:  I took off a star for 2 things —-1) the bathrooms are outdated, chipped paint, they desperately need makeovers. They were so tiny & tubs were obviously glazed over several times, just tear them out and make it better. 2) Soundproofing is very much needed for the 1st floor rooms! We were awaken every night around 11pm by the pitter patter of an elephant
Manager Response: Hello Blondie!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review and feedback. Please call us when you would like to come back. We have several room type options, even large rooms with 2 king beds! Also, we are in the process of updating all of our rooms, and doing one building at a time. We are looking into your concerns.   We look forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Perfect location. Darling lobby decor. Rooms are basic and bathrooms are dated but the price was amazing and everything was clean. Request extra pillows at checkin. We could see the fireworks from the hotel. Christopher at the front desk is amazing.  I’ll be back!
Manager Response: Hello Lorraine,  We thank you for your review, and we are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and Kristopher was so helpful! We look forward to having you stay with again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Nice, boutique hotel located across the street from Disney and California Adventure. Excellent staff and service. Cool vibe, 60s design. Only negative from my perspective was some peeling paint on the sides of the buildings. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Jeff,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and management is looking into your concerns. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located near the Disneyland Resort. It was an easy 5-10 minute walk (depends on your pace) which makes it a perfect distance after a long day at the park. We were able to go back to the hotel a couple of times during the day to rest - a necessity on New Year’s Eve! They have pet friendly rooms as well and our dog was happy to stay with us instead of a sitter.  This hotel is also conveniently located near the Garden Walk and restaurants on both Harbor and Katella. There is a 7-eleven and A Mart on the corner of Harbor and Katella so if you need snacks and water you can pick them up after a short walk. No need to drive anywhere!
Manager Response: Hello Sbkasha17,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review! Thank you for all the feedback and tips. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: The best thing about this hotel is LEO!!
Summary: The location is wonderful!!  This is the first time we have checked into a hotel and weren't able to get into our room early.  I get that this is a busy hotel and all so we left and walked around and returned.  They took our bags and we parked.  We met Leo when we arrived and he was so warm and welcoming!!  The front desk people not as much.  We sat in the lobby by the bar and waited to check in.  Numerous people came in with kids and got rooms. They couldn't tell us why we couldnt get a room.  We had to keep getting in our suitcase for different items.  Finally after trying again, Leo was able to get us a room and it was in building 700 which is the farthest building away.  The room was adequate for our needs.  The shower didn't work that great, took forever to warm up.  The
Manager Response: Hello Laurie,   We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear that Leo was helpful. We apologize you were not able to get into your room early, we do our best to check guest in as soon as rooms are ready. Management is looking into all of your concerns, we hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Everything about the resort is old school glamour.  Space is key here with lovely big grass areas, plus the biggest pool in Anaheim I believe. The staff were always friendly when walking through the lobby. The rooms are perfect for what you need. Clean, good beds, cool AC, cute little private courtyard (for ground floor units) and quiet.  Highly recommend this property. We will be back
Manager Response: Hello YourAussieAgent!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review! We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and your stay!  We hope you choose The Anaheim Hotel the next time you visit Disneyland!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I can't say enough about the staff at the Anaheim Hotel.  They were extremely friendly and helpful.  The hotel is clean and well maintained with comfortable beds.  We loved the retro feel of the lobby. The rooms were nice but not what you would call luxury.  The best appeal overall is the location.  Located almost directly across the street from Disneyland, it's just a short walk to the park.  The hotel is also within close walking distance from a number of restaurants including The Pancake House, Denney's, Cheesecake Factory, Babba Gumps and California Pizza Kitchen to mention a few.
Manager Response: Hello Feenix22,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time here! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is in a fantastic location with if you want easy access to the Disney Parks. It is just a short walk across the street. We stayed in a two king room which was a nice option for a little larger sleeping accommodations. The room was clean and had a double vanity bathroom which again, is a nice option for getting ready in the morning. The beds were ok, not the best, but comfortable. The room itself was a bit dated and smelled musty when we arrived. The fridge worked fine, but there was no microwave available. The handle on one the sinks was impossible to turn on. When the heater turned on, the whole room sounded like it was a jet about to take off for a few minutes and then rattled a lot. The shower was decent, but the tub and tile was looking quite worn. We did
Manager Response: Hello Suzie ,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking into your concerns regrading the room you stayed in and the walkways. We hope you choose our hotel the next time you visit The Disneyland Resort!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel is great.  Updated rooms and amenities; fantastic pool; even more fantastic staff.  Our room was on the smaller side; but had everything we needed for our stay.  Our one request was handled immediately.  The staff is amazing - eager and willing to help in any way; even just to smile and brighten your day.   We will be back to stay again!
Manager Response: Hi There!  We thank you for taking the time to give you review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel, and that we were able to accommodate your needs! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: As soon as we got in everyone is friendly & welcoming ! We came in on a delayed flight so we’re happy to finally get there . Marissa was awesome at our check in !!! Room was clean , loved the balcony , beds were comfy . It was perfect for our Disney trip ! It was My Twin daughters 12th birthday so when we got back to our room on our last night hotel staff left a Happy Birthday card & cookies ! My kids loved it ! So nice 😁 Pizza press was great ! Close walk to disney ! Definitely will stay again !!!
Manager Response: Hello Sophia!  We thank you for taking the time to give you review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel, and that your daughter had a wonderful birthday! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This was my third time staying at The Anaheim Hotel, this time with my sister and brother-in-law. We felt so spoiled from the moment we arrived until we left. Todd, the bellman, was working almost every day of our stay and we became great pals. A+ service and so lovely to talk to.   Used the on-site pool on our first night as well which was such a fun added amenity.   The affordability, cleanliness, and great vibes of the hotel, plus proximity to the Disneyland Resort, make it my first choice every time. I'd recommend The Anaheim to anyone!
Manager Response: Hello Jo C,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit, and that Todd was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Manager Response: Hello Catalina,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are happy to hear that Leo was so helpful and accommodating. We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Rented a scooter and needed help and the hotel staff were very accommodating, especially LEO, he was fantastic and a delightful individual to encounter, he had the best smile and attitude, especially after long days in Disneyland, the hotel was very nice, but it was the staff that made the stay fantastic
Manager Response: Hello Darcell,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review, we are thrilled to hear that Leo was so helpful, and that our location worked out for you. We look forward to your next visit!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo was so sweet and caring . He spotted my dad coming out of of our car in the handicap parking with his cane . We were just coming to do the day parking instead of my dad  walking to Disneyland from Mickey ands friends thru the tram . The distance to Disneyland was not that far from the entrance to Disney .  But in since Leo spotted us and he told us that he is able to get us a scooter right away where my dad does not have to walk from the hotel all the way to the guest services to get a scooter. He was great and so nice , he called it in . The scooter was so much more cheaper than Disneylands price and he can take it in the park , out of the park and back to the hotel . If it wasn’t for leo my dad would have to strain his leg . The anahiem hotel had great service . Thanks
Manager Response: Hello Desiree,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review, we are thrilled to hear that Leo was so helpful, and that our location worked out for you. We look forward to having you stay with us.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: THE BEST Place To Stay When Visiting The Mouse ! -- GREAT Location..GREAT Rooms..GREAT Staff ! -- Mike..Is A GREAT Employee + Took Care Of Me. -- A Short Walk To .. "Da Mouse House" ... Is Nice Too ! -- Look Forward To Many More Stays Here !!
Manager Response: Hello Gregory,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that MIKE was so helpful! He's amazing!! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The location is fantastic, the room was clean, comfortable, and spacious. Todd was a great help getting us checked in and also checking on us when our shuttle back to the airport was late. He arranged a backup for us in case our shuttle never showed.
Manager Response: Hello Haylee,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and that Todd was so helpful.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I highly recommend The Anaheim Hotel. I have stayed there many times and also utilized their day parking for Disneyland. The hotel is very clean and smells so fresh when you walk in. Pool area is very nice. The staff is wonderful, especially Leo. He is so kind and personable and makes you feel right at home.. You can’t beat the location…cross the street and you are steps away from the park entrance. Don’t hesitate to book this one, you won’t regret it!
Manager Response: Hello Michelle,  We thank you for taking the time to give you review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel, and that Leo was so helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel just a short walk from Disneyland
Summary: Anticipating long days of trekking all over the Disneyland Resort, I prioritized hotels within a short walking distance from the park.  That said, I had an excellent five day stay at the Anaheim Hotel.  The room and bathroom were clean, the air conditioning was excellent, and the bed was very comfortable.  The staff were very courteous as well.  The Pizza Press is an adjoining restaurant that has some good food. I'd recommend ordering from your room and let them deliver it to you.  (For some ungodly reason you have to stand in line the entire time while the pizza is prepared, baked, and boxed up.  Not very fun after a day trudging around the parks!)  All in all I had a great stay and definitely will be staying there the next time I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello SciFiDriveIn ,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking into your concerns regrading The Pizza Press. We hope you choose our hotel the next time you visit The Disneyland Resort!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Talk about customer service Leo and Candi go above and beyond! They are welcoming and truly good people. You don’t find these diamonds in the rough and for Anaheim Hotel to have two is a double plus. I would recommend this hotel anytime someone asks for a hotel to book. Love them!

Summary: I’ve never felt the need or the desire to ever take the time to write a review. Especially one that’s positive in nature. Manager Response: Hello Will,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and that Marissa was so helpful. Summary: Just arrived at the Anaheim Hotel and was promptly greeted by Leo. What a pleasure to have someone eager to help with bags and so helpful and friendly as were the front desk. Room is very clean and patio is wonderful. So fun so far.

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff, rooms were clean and updated
Summary: Mike Beilman should be the CEO of this establishment, he is exactly the face that you want to see upon your arrival. Mike is always smiling, he is very warm and very welcoming, just what I needed to see after my 8 hour drive from my home in the bay area. I could tell that Mike really cared about my experience at this hotel, he always asked me if I there was anything he could do for me on  each day that he saw me. I was so impressed with Mike Beilman that I called the hotel when I got home to speak with the manager, who's name is Austin, I am still waiting for a call back. I just wanted to tell Austin the manager what an absolute asset Mike Beilman is to this company. Mike Beilman is warm, genuine, caring and honest. He was raised by a good family, you can absolutely tell. He is

Summary: We stayed here for our Disney honey moon. The service was exceptional. While the hotel is older, it is nice and recent updates have made this hotel a fun place to stay. We’ve recommended them to many family and friends already.

Summary: When we come down we don’t spend a ton of time in the room because it’s typically a Disney trip but we can almost always get into our room early, the hotel is so close and the pizza press after a long Disney day is the best

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Hotel during Halloween week for my vacation to visit Disneyland. The reason I chose this hotel is that it is ten minutes walking distance from the park and it is reasonable in price.  I also have to say the service I received was great. Two employees were very professional and very friendly, Todd and Mike, my experience with both of them made me feel welcomed.  I know on my next visit to Disneyland I will stay at this Hotel, again. I highly appreciate and recommend staying at this great hotel. Two thumbs up!
