We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit The Disney Resort Area.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I stayed here back in August for the first time and the location is amazing! We decided to to stay here again in October for our oogie boogie bash/Disneyland trip. This time I had adjoining rooms with my family.  The rooms are good and I found the beds to be very cozy. The walk from the entrance of Disneyland to the hotel is perfect! Especially after our third day and my feet were dead LOL.  The staff here is amazing as well! Everyone is super nice and very welcoming.  One of the managers named Candi took great care of us on this trip.  She was very accommodating.  Our bellman Leo went above and beyond for us! Super helpful and very friendly.  He always had a smile on his face and gave us great suggestions on places to eat.  I will definitely be coming back for our next Disney
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is perfect for couples and families. Large rooms, exercise room, pizza bar on site and the biggest (Olympic size) pool, ever!! There’s an on site bar and they used to have really good specials and very kind staff!   There is a charge to park; however, gated parking and staff walking around making sure the site is safe.
Manager Response: Hello Jamie,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel! We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit The Anaheim resort area.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We had a wonderful experience at the Anaheim hotel. The staff member Leo who helped us with our luggage was amazing very kind and super helpful we have two kids so it was super helpful to us. We really appreciate the help.
Manager Response: Dear Jaslinnoelgomez,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear Leo assisting you with luggage and being helpful. We hope to see you next time!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: It was a beautiful place to stay! Our room had its own fenced patio and it was a very lovely property! Rooms were clean and the walk to Disneyland gates was very short! Parking was easy and hassle free- overall great place to stay!
Manager Response: Hello Elise,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time here! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My family and I stayed at the Anaheim Hotel for a few days while visiting Disneyland. The hotel room was such a great price and very well upkept. Such a wonderful hotel and we are definitely coming back.   But the best part of our stay here was Kristopher at the front desk. He was so incredibly kind and upbeat I genuinely felt like he was a lifelong friend. Every time we passed through the lobby, we looked forward to the silly banter we would have with Kristopher. The Anaheim Hotel is so lucky to have an employee like him!   Thank you for the extraordinary stay.
Manager Response: Hello Madison,   We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time here, and that Kristopher was helpful. He is a pleasure to work with. We look forward to having  you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel was close to Disney- only a 10 min walk. The lobby was clean, staff were friendly. Now for the bad. Grungy, mold in shower, stained shower curtain, dingy carpet, lumpy bed and pillows, water pressure was practically a drizzle, pool was dirty. There were two failed fire alarms during the evening/night. Also our battery stopped working on our door key and we were told to wait by our room for maintenance who would be right up… yeah took them 45 min. The A/C unit was blocked by the curtains and obviously didn’t work well. All in all way overpriced for the room quality.
Manager Response: Dear 535Harleya,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Our sincerest apologies if we failed to make your recent stay memorable. I can ensure you these issues rarely happen. Our team would love another opportunity to accommodate you and your family. We hope you will reach out to us so that we may rectify our shortcomings.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Celebrated a Wedding and two night Stay
Summary: First and foremost, this hotel is definitely a hidden gem. Sometimes overlooked due to the size of the exterior from the street, but this place is B-E-A-U-T-I-F-U-L once you step inside.  My wife and I got married at this hotel on 10/16 (their wedding packages are amazing and very affordable!) and it exceeded my expectations. The staff were friendly and knew how to cater to our needs, especially during our most stressful times aka day of wedding. During the wedding, their staff were very supportive to the point they went out of their way to make our day magical.   From the hotel side, their newly renovated rooms are stunning (as they say, never judge a book by it's cover) and is definitely a bang for your buck; especially being right across from the Disneyland entrance.
Manager Response: Dear Dnatividad,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear Tina and Leo doing everything we can to provide a first class hospitality experience. Congratulations again! We hope to see you folks next time you're in the area.  Warm Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I just wanna get straight to the point ...Leo, you are amazing with serving customers!!  I loved your energy!!  You were so very helpful, and I am so blessed to have had a wonderful customer experience even though it was to pick up my electric scooter, my family was grateful for your wonderful and happy spirit!  You sure went beyond making me and my family HAPPY as we went on our way to Disneyland.  By the way, my ohana says we will definitely book our hotel stay at the Anaheim Hotel the next time because of the happy people that greeted us at your beautiful hotel.  Take care Leo, stay safe happy and healthy!  Aloha 🤟🏽
Manager Response: Dear Wa2xisme,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our Bell Captain Leo. He is exceptional to have with us. We hope to see you next time.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable and close to Disneyland.
Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is a great choice if you want a clean, comfortable and affordable stay.  When I was booking my trip I found comparable hotel's rates to be much higher. I really feel that this is the best deal out there.
Manager Response: Hello Disneyfayn,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit, and we look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, comfortable rooms, wonderful staff
Summary: We had a 4 night stay at The Anaheim Hotel last week. We were immediately greeted at the front desk by Kristopher, who made sure we were completely taken care of. Our room was on the ground floor, was very clean, and had everything we needed. The bed was very comfortable and I was able to sleep very well. It's about a ten-minute walk to Disneyland, which is why we booked in the first place. There is a soda machine near each building as well as an ice machine. The attached pizza restaurant, The Pizza Press, was a must-try on our first night, and it was delicious and not too expensive. Every time we saw Kristopher, he asked how we were doing and if there was anything he could do. When we checked out, he genuinely seemed sad he wouldn't be seeing us any longer. He gave us a card
Manager Response: Hello xjennersonx,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time here, and that Kristopher was so helpful. Summary: This hotel is quite cool. I really love  the ulta lounge  look. It is very clean and you can tell they take pride in the upkeep. Everyone there is so nice. I really though that Leo and Ethan exemplified above and beyond  customer service!! There is nothing better than employees that really love helping people and  truly enjoy their workplace.  I mentioned that it seemed they are happy employees and both stated they loved their job.  For me, it is important that a company treat their employees right. When they do, the employees will give their best and that only makes me want to continue to go there again and again. The Anaheim Hotel is just a quick walk to Disneyland and I wouldn't want to go to any other hotel.  Ethan mentioned my perfume smelled like his mom's and hey, that's

Thank you Anaheim Hotel!

Summary: Love the vintage vibe of the hotel, felt like I was taking a trip back in time to a place where style and service really mattered. The hotel feels more like a resort than a just place to just crash after visiting the parks (which has been our experience with most of the “good neighbor hotels”. Exceptional service from Mike and the rest of the staff. Mike went out of his way multiple times to insure our family had everything we needed and took amazing care of us. He was so kind and helped us start our vacation off right. He made great recommendations and helped be sure that we still had a great time at the hotel before we could even check in. The rooms are large and comfortable. My kids had an amazing time at the pool, and we enjoyed lounging in the shade watching them.  There

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with this Hotel; we normally stay at a Hilton or Marriott.  It was very clean, staff were amazing, and location was perfect to walk to Disney.   Our door man Todd was on the ball anytime we walked by or needed anything.  I will stay here again when I go back for sure!  The Magnusons

Summary: First I need to give this place some major credit overall, everyone we interacted with was super kind and helpful, the grounds were maintained beautifully (I work in landscape) , all amenities were in working order. Even though this hotel is a little older it does not in any way feel that way. Ok my favorite part, Leo was by far one of the very best customer service professionals I have ever met. I can’t say enough about him and his professionalism , he has this dedication to his guests that is virtually unheard of these days. I want to thank Leo and the entire staff for helping us find our forever hotel, won’t be going anywhere else. Kudos!!!!!!!!!

Summary Heading: Great place close to the parks
Summary: It's a nice place with a retro vibe. The best parts about it are the little patios that come with most rooms. How nice to have a little outdoor area with a table and lounging chair! The bathrooms are pretty dated, as are the sliding glass doors. I wish there were screens on the sliding glass doors so that you could let some air in! There is a scale in the bathroom, which seemed really strange. Who wants to know their weight when on vacation at Disneyland? Nobody!   The pool is really well maintained, and there are grassy areas to play lawn games provided by the hotel. The staff at the pizza place were very nice and gave me hot water for my tea every morning.   Great place, close to the parks, bathrooms are clean, but dated and small, but the patios are wonderful. Second time
Manager Response: Dear Tonja E,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit you travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding your recent stay. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland trip!
Summary: I didn't want to pay the premium prices for the Disneyland Resort hotels, so my family and I booked a couple of rooms at the Anaheim Hotel.  We had a great experience!  First, shout out to Todd and Mark.  Super kind and helpful folks that work the front.  The lobby was stylish and cool, and the front desk was helpful.  Our rooms weren't ready until 3pm-ish, however we arrived on location at Noon.  So it was important for us to find somewhere that would hold luggage.  The Anaheim Hotel was more than happy to do so.  Great service!  Rooms were clean and the beds were comfy.  Disneyland is a VERY short walk away, so this location was great. This will definitely be my go to place for future Disneyland trips!
Manager Response: Hello Aaron,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Spent a couple days at this hotel for our annual Disneyland trip. Concierge Mike and the rest of the crew went above and beyond to make our daughter's and our stay memorable.

Summary: This hotel is close to the Disneyland resort (about a 7-minute walk to the main gate) and to the Garden Walk. Their beds are very comfortable to sleep in and their staff is very friendly.  This is the hotel we always stay at when we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Tanya,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope you chose our hotel the next time you visit the Disney Resort area.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My stay here was great no complains! Have nothing bad to say about the hotel , Great experience.  Great hotel near Disney! Definitely will be staying there again during our next trip. LEO (staff member) who we met during our stay is one of the kindest person I have met! He went above and beyond to help our family during our stay. Honestly so impressed with his attitude to help.  Thank you Leo!   We also met Rogelio (staff member) was polite and kind and willing to help with anything.   Thank you to both of them, so happy to have met people like you guys that take so much pride in your work!

Summary: My family and I stayed at The Anaheim hotel last month and Leo was very helpful! It was my son’s first hotel stay and he loved it, especially having our own little patio to play on. We really enjoyed our stay there and will definitely be going back!
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review, we are so happy to hear Leo was so accommodating. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This area  in Anaheim is so busy due to its close proximity to Disneyland. Despite the hectic atmosphere, this hotel still manages to have such great customer service. Leo - the valet was so helpful in.attending to my parking. The ladies at the front desk were so gracious as well!  😃
Manager Response: Hello Roxy,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo and Todd were very helpful helping us park and were very accommodating! Very good service!! Super pleasant staff very helpful with check in. We got to the hotel a little bit before our check in time and the front desk put a rush on our room to help get it ready for us. 10 out of 10 would recommend. Very nice staff. You dont come across that kind of hospitality and kindness very much these days.
Manager Response: Hello Kennedy,   We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay!  We are also happy to hear that Leo, Todd, and the Front desk  were so accommodating. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Hotel during 9/21, and were very happy. It was clean and spacious. Leo was especially helpful with my parking needs due to me being disabled: he was courteous, and he helped to make my trip so much more enjoyable!
Manager Response: Hello Rebecca,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay!  We are also happy to hear Leo was so accommodating. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: This hotel is great. The grounds are lovely, the staff was super friendly and helpful and the location to Disneyland can't be beat. We also really enjoy having the two king bed option.. We will definitely come back at a future date.
Manager Response: Hello Kate,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review, we look forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I love the 50's/60's vibe. I stayed in a parkview room, which was clean, new carpets, cute, had a balcony, and was quiet. Mike the bellhop took care of me the whole trip! The customer service by everyone is excellent; they make sure you are happy and get what you need for a good stay :)
Manager Response: Hello Kelly,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and our staff! Our guest are our #1 priority! We hope you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Stayed for one night before going to Disneyland and everyone was so helpful. Justin at the the front desk and Mike the bellman were awesome!! The room was perfect for what we needed and had a great patio.
Manager Response: Hello Bridgit,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear our staff were so helpful! We look forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I love staying here because of Leo one of the bell men lot attendant. He has totally saved out trip twice now he is fantastic and make this place the bar is nice too. Our room was comfortable and we had a wonderful get away
Manager Response: Hello Sandra,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review! We are happy to hear our hotel worked out for you, and we are looking forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Bellman Mike sets the tone here for “Happy Place!” He is always so happy to greet guests, eager to assist big or small matters or engage in a friendly conversation. He always has  a friendly, genuine smile on his face. He made my stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I felt like I was transported back in time to the day of delivering superb customer service. Walking through the courtyard I love hearing the big band music at the pool and seeing families enjoying themselves poolside (reminded me of the 70’s, relaxing, carefree, innocence). There is a nice spot to sit and mingle next to a water fountain and fir pit. Just a wonderful vibe. Very family oriented. The decor is retro like Disneyland in the 60’s it’s great!  The pizza press is delicious and conveniently located next to lobby, after
Manager Response: Dear Debbiediego66,  Thank you for your feedback. Mike is truly a treasure to have with us on our team and will inform him of this sincere review regarding his customer service. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and that our proximity fit your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you next week, come say hi to our staff!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Clean and Close to Disneyland Resort
Summary: Wonderful stay. Clean rooms. Big beds. Friendly staff.  We have stayed at the hotel before and it was an excellent experience. The staff and grounds do not disappoint.  There is a full bar and quality pizza place on site as well.
Manager Response: Dear Lambshanks1027,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all your kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We had an amazing stay!!! The hotel is literally across the street from the park! We are use to going to Florida Disney and it taking forever to get back to our resort hotels. But that short walking distance was amazing!! The hotel staff was friendly. The campus was all beautiful. It all looked luxurious. The beds were out of this world comfortable. We just had such a pleasant stay. Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear caseyrock1,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Candy at the front is absolutely fabulous and helpful and makes us feel like family! Queen Candylina! We love her! Marissa also was so helpful! Housekeeping was wonderful and grounds were beautiful! See you again sooooon!!
Manager Response: Dear PrincessShellye,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear "Candi & Marissa" being extremely helpful and making you folks feel like family! We look forward to seeing you next time you visit!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Nice stay - close enough to walk
Summary: Stayed mid-Sep2021 - building six, second floor room.  Accommodations are very nice.  No complaints.  Two queen beds.  Housekeeping was right on time and did a nice job.   Todd did a great job of having his smile and service ready.  We were able to walk directly to the Parks each day.  Took us about 12 minutes each way.  Traffic lights made the walk safe and relatively quick.  The price to stay here is a little higher than farther away - but no waiting (and paying) for an Uber, nor for a bus.  No car rental required if you are here just for the Parks (we were). We did not eat at the on-site pizza place.  We ate in the Parks and at Downtown Disney for dinners. One nice thing would be some sort of breakfast availability - even if it were just a banana, a pre-packaged muffin, a
Manager Response: Dear SValleyHale,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff, especially "Todd" being ready to assist our guest! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We do provide a breakfast but unfortunately it's not complimentary but the coffee is from 6AM-10AM daily. We Hope to see you folks next time you are in the resort area.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel several times! And will continue to come back! Everyone I interacted with at the front desk was so pleasant. Everyone greeted you with a warm and welcoming smile! I had them hold my luggage upon arrival and when I wanted to run to Disneyland before getting on my return flight. The process was smooth and easy! As I was waiting for my ride Todd came over and asked if I needed anything. He helped load my suitcase in to the car. I will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Hello Erin,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit here! We look forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Very clean room. Comfy beds. Five minute walk or the parks. Highly recommend staying there. Guest services were super helpful and accommodating. The bellman named Mike helped get our luggage into the Uber, and waited for it out in front while we stayed inside. Great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear FarAwar36977520677,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We are thrilled to hear that "Mike" assisted you in a kindly manner. We hope to see you again!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, friendly staff, comfortable beds..
Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is a quick walks to the park and nothing beats a comfortable bed at the end of a long day. Todd is always so nice and helpful. This is a great place to stay. The close distance is what first drew us to the hotel but the friendly service is what brings us back.
Manager Response: Hello Laura,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so happy to hear our hotel worked out for you, and we hope you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We have stayed at The Anaheim Hotel several times now what originally brought us to the hotel was the price of the rooms and the location of Disneyland. What we quickly found out is that the staff is also great. Leo and Mike are always so friendly and helpful.

Summary: Our family stays  at The Anaheim Hotel when we visit Disneyland. We love the atmosphere!  Clean rooms, nice pool and a happening restaurant when Disney closes. Leo and Karen were great on our last visit - providing us with 5 Star service!

Summary: So close to Disney, yet quiet. Friendly staff, nice pool and spa facilities. Nice rooms and grounds.   Close to 7/11 and Starbucks too.   Could easily come back for a break or swim during the day then go back to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Ninaharding22,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I stayed this past July with my 2 small children and wife. There was a little mixup with our room upon check in, but the evening manager (was a lady can't remember name) was able to fix it fast and easy. The room was spacious and clean. The beds where comfortable. There is a pizza spot on site which the children loved. We had drinks by the large clean pool and the DJ was a plus. Melissa was delightful at check out. The best part of it all, it's only a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. Will return to property!
Manager Response: Dear 87isaacp,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Great location 5 mins walk from disney and amazing pool
Summary: highly recommend this place. the pool is great and large, the beds very comfortable. AC in the rooms works real well. And disney is just 5 mins walk away. you can to the disney park and then go back to the hotel and rest mid day and easily go back.  I also want to mention Leo  from the luggage/lobby services who helped a lot when my car battery died. Thank you Leo
Manager Response: Dear Kiteb0arder,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great value, easily met my expectations for the price paid for the room.  An older hotel but the grounds and room were clean, pool was very large and pool area was clean with lots of seating options.  You could also scan QR codes and order from The Pizza Press, could do this from pool area or in your room.   By far the best thing is proximity to the parks, very close and walkable, was nice to be able to return to the hotel easily in the early afternoon for some swimming and relaxation time before returning to the parks.   I've stayed in multiple hotels in the area and some I've liked a little more (they also cost a little more), but I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel and felt it was a good value.
Manager Response: Hello Benjamin,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our hotel and The Pizza Press! We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit the resort area!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great location with security, great deco decor.
Summary: We had a very enjoyable stay with a great location.  The staff was very friendly.  The room was nice size room with a patio.  Table and chairs provided.  Fridge included in the room.  No microwave in the room though, that would be nice for leftovers.
Manager Response: Hello Joan,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review! We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your visit,  we can send a microwave to your room if requested. We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: First time stay will be back
Summary: Staff was beyond helpful.  5 min walk to disneyland. Hotel tucked in off harbor so no traffic noise at night. Gated enterance and exit. securtiy guard on site. Great Pizza resturant on site. Big Big pool.  Big room sizes enought to fit 2 wheelchair scooters in and turn around. will stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Jeffrey,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review! We are thrilled to hear our hotel worked out for you and your family. We hope you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo was a wonderful help to me and my family. He’s also very friendly and easy to talk to if you ever need any help. Are flight home got delayed and he made us feel at home during are time in the lobby. Thanks for your help Leo.
Manager Response: Dear A1385DYgavins,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear the kind comments regarding "Leo" as he is a delight to have with part of our team. We hope to see you next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I have been staying at the Anaheim Hotel for 15 years. It has changed names and went through renovations, this hotel is awesome. Easy booking, easy check in. A huge Olympic size pool. Patios or balconies. They also have lawn games available. But the best part about this place is Leo! He is always out in the parking lot or by the front door and he is so friendly and helpful. He remembers my family even if we don’t come back for months. We just stayed here August 27th - August 30th 2021 and Leo saw me with my cane, we started talking and within 15 min he had a scooter delivered to the hotel and it was only $48. Best money I ever spent. Leo is definitely one of the reasons I keep returning to this hotel. If you stay here make sure you seek out Leo and tell him the orange charger
Manager Response: Dear Gerilyn58,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. Leo truly is a treasure to have with us and will certainly let him know you folks said "hi". We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The staff was really helpful. Leo was great and helped us swap rooms as we wound up having people sneak a dog into true room next to us and they were up really late being loud. They found us a better room and we’re really great about it. They also do Disney movie night at the pool which is cute.
Manager Response: Dear crystalanntate,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our staff was able to accommodate you with a better room due to the noise issues. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Just had to hop on here and sayyyy the attendant named Leo is here every time we’ve ever come and again he continues to impress us! Goes out of his way to aid us in all our requests and is such a fun personality to be around! Way to go Leo! Starts our Disney magic at the beginning of our trip!
Manager Response: Dear laurengH4519XA,  Thank you for your feedback. We our thrilled to hear that "Leo" helped you with all your request needed. We hope to see you next time.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: It has been a while since I have been this happy with a hotel stay.  The rooms were clean. Grounds were clean. Lobby clean.  The balconies are large, patios for 1st floor were huge. They has various activities on the grounds. A DJ at the pool. But honestly, the best part was the staff.  The staff was prompt, nice, family type feel. Smiles, eye contact. It was absoultely refreshing.
Manager Response: Dear MidniteL,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled about all the kind comments regarding our hotel and especially our staff as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: You will be takin care of in the best way if choosing to stay here.
Summary: Phenomenal. We had such a great experience with Candi the first time, and came back to the area a week later, we decided to try the Howard Johnson for our Toddler who likes slides and after a horrible experaince hotel and customer service wise we went right back to the Anaheim hotel and was helped by Candi. She’s the best of the best and like the say if you come back, it’s meant to be. We now have a forever hotel, it’s in a great location, the rooms are great and the staff is awesome. We will be back and will spread the word to our family and friends about this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear bethanylyngr,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff, especially "Candi". We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Great Pool and So Close to Disney!
Summary: I stayed at TAH with my 11 year old daughter for her first trip to Disney. We stayed 4 nights. We absolutely loved the huge pool and enjoyed watching the DL fireworks show from it with other hotel guests. The walk for us each morning was 8-10 minutes to the gates and I have to say that was the best part and number 1 reason for booking there. Upon check in, I requested an “updated” room and we were given 601 (ground level). The bedroom area was nice, updated and had a great little walk out patio that gave us a view of the back of Guardians of the Galaxy at DCA. The bathroom didn’t seem updated at all, but the water was hot quick and that’s all we really needed. We didn’t get a chance to check out Pizza Press but heard other guests talking about how good it was. We also knew ahead
Manager Response: Hello Courtneymcg22,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review, We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time here, We hope you stay with us again the next time you visit the Disneyland resort area!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo was great respectful in full of life he was very fast with all services that we needed. The love was felt from Leo everyone go to Leo he serves you the best we loved him it was a good experience for us
Manager Response: Dear deltricef2021,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding "Leo". We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This was our 2nd stay here. It's an easy walk to Disneyland. We had a ground floor room with a small fenced in patio. They have a pizza restaurant The Pizza Press.Pizza and salad were really good. The gift shop was closed during our stay.There is a Seven Elevin and Walgreens a 10 minute walk away. Staff were friendly and professional.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Carl,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review! We are so pleased to hear our hotel worked out for you and we are looking forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Proximity to Disneyland resort was awesome, we were able to walk home mid day, check in &  take a break , then walk back to the park to enjoy some more fun.The pool with pool toys and movie night was awesome. Frank Sinatra playing in the background was perfect. The overall vibe was great. We’ll be back soon!
Manager Response: Hello ManicMCIE,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review and we are looking forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great Mid-Century Modern hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: A favorite place to stay when we visit Disneyland.  Rooms are spacious and clean, quieter than most of the other hotels on Harbor. Hotel decor is great mid-century modern style, and it is only a short walk to the parks.  Hotel staff are friendly and helpful, and in particular Mike (bellman) made sure we were well taken care of as we were about to leave for the airport.
Manager Response: Hello J G,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel. We hope you come and stay with us again.  In Hospitality,   The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: The anaheim hotel is the best location for the harbor entrance for the Disney parks. This was the first time my hubby and I stayed at the hotel and let me tell yall the staff and just the vibes you get from walking into the hotel was perfect. Mind you there is a full bar and pizza joint in the hotel. What sold me was the balcony in the room. We went to Disney the next day and we checked out on this day we just had to pay $20 to park all day. We didn't have to move our car at all . The anaheim gardenwalk was next to us as well. My hunny and I will be staying here everytime we go to Disney which is a lot lol . Or just anything in the Anaheim area. Everything about the hotel was great!!
Manager Response: Hello Kachoww97,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review, and we thank you for all the wonderful comments. We are pleased to hear our hotel worked out for you, and we hope you come back and stay with us again the next time you visit Disneyland!    In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Perfect Place to stay for our visit to Disneyland (short walk to the park!)
Summary: We had two rooms for a total of 5 people and it was just perfect. Staff at the hotel were able to arrange connected rooms. One member of our party had a broken foot so it was a relief to have staff members help us right away. We were lucky enough to get a scooter delivered to the hotel just before we entered the park. All went well. Leo was super helpful and even double checked to make sure the scooter was working properly and would keep a charge to last the whole day. Front desk staff was friendly and helpful as well. Overall, I highly recommend this hotel and will be returning.
Manager Response: Dear BrooklynLamb,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear our staff was friendly and helpful! We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Best hotel for the price hands down it was so close to Disneyland as well it was only about a 10 min walk to the park the hotel looks refreshed and up to date I really enjoyed the double door access to my balcony
Manager Response: Dear Alan_hdz30,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We appreciate all the kind comments. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Nice hotel. Great pool. Short walk to Disney.
Summary: Hotel is newly updated. We had the room with 2 queen beds with 3 adults. The room was a bit small, specifically the bathroom. There is just enough room to turn around in the bathroom. There was a very nice, large patio and it had a lime tree. The AC is another bit of a downfall. It’s located on the floor right next to the bed so the air blows into the side of the bed rather than into the room. The pool is great. Big and they have rafts. There is food and drink service poolside as well. The walk to Disney is about 1.5 blocks. Very convenient. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Melinda,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great spot to stay for a Disney visit!
Summary: Love the hotel and can’t complain for a 3 star. Also nice that they have long sized beds and gave us connecting rooms for my family. Parking was the only drawback, but other than that a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Gee_sol,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. We hope to see you again!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel for a night to do both Disney parks and this hotel was very centrally located. Walking distance from the park, which was very convenient. Just wanted to personally write about Candi the front desk receptionist, who totally made our stay 100 times better. She is super sweet and helpful and her hospitality would be the reason why we would come back.
Manager Response: Dear 266briannae,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs.! Great to hear Candi was accommodating. We hope to see you folks next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: My stay was generally positive, as this hotel has a great retro theme and a stellar location.  It was wonderful to be collapsing in my bed less than fifteen minutes after leaving the Disney parks!  The rooms were cute and clean, the beds were comfortable, and the grounds were well-maintained with different family-style games set up in the green areas.  We didn't spend much time at the hotel as we were at the parks all day, but I wish we'd set aside a day for relaxing here because I think we would have enjoyed it.  Overall, it's a great hotel with a wonderful, relaxing vibe. Some small issues to note: With the Pizza Press so accessible and the trash cans having small, circular openings we did frequently see pizza boxes piled up around the cans.  They have a pizza-to-room ordering
Manager Response: Hello Maggie!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here and that our location works out for you. We have noted the inconveniences you listed and we are looking into them. Our top priority here is our guest experience.  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I visited on 8-4-21 and Leo in parking was very kind and helpful. I went to Disneyland and parked at the hotel. Leo made me feel welcome and was very knowledgeable answering my questions about parking. I will definitely return and appreciate being made to feel welcome.
Manager Response: Hello J5723RNcathyl,  We thank you for your review, and we're happy to hear our parking worked out for you! We will let "Leo" know his help was appreciated!   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We greatly appreciated the help we received from Leo in parking today. We visited Disneyland and parked at the hotel. He was kind, considerate and knowledgeable. We sincerely appreciated his help and will park here again. It is a close walk to the Harbor entrance and very convenient.
Manager Response: Hello  chrisbL9100SR!  We thank you for your review, and we're happy to hear our parking worked out for you!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My stay started out rough. The park view room I paid for rm(524) had a big tree in front of the balcony. So I asked to be moved and they put me next door in rm526. This had a little better view, but had no soap in the room. I had to flag down one of the house keepers for soap and shampoo and things. The beds weren't the most comfortable that I've sleep in.  The good things, great location, wonderful pool, the bar in the lobby is very nice to have. The pizza press was great. Leo theBell Hop was very kind and helpful to my wife who has bad knees and a bad back. So appreciative of all his help and kindness. I'd be willing to give the hotel  another shot. Thank you Traveler Malcolm Stanford stayed 7/29-7/31
Manager Response: Hello Macx4007, We thank you for taking the time to give your review.  We're sorry to hear your stay started rough, but happy to hear the issues were resolved. We are pleased to hear "Leo" was such a big help! We hope you come back and stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo was so sincere and very hospitable to our family. He walked us to the room, brought our luggage and brought all the sunshine! Will be coming back again for sure. The pool was great, nice how we could watch the Disney fireworks from night pool.
Manager Response: Hello SamanthafA9339QO,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review, We will let Leo know his help was appreciated, and we thank you for the kind words, he is a great employee! We look forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We live in So. California, and over the years have stayed in 7 different hotels on Harbor Blvd within walking distance to the Disneyland entrance. The Anaheim Hotel is the best one, by far, and we will definitely be coming back! Here are most the important points-  1.    SPACE = PEACE = PRIVACY  The Anaheim Hotel is on a HUGE lot, and the room wings are spread out over the property in between grass lawns. This makes for an extremely quiet property, and when you’ve spent 12+ hours being bumped and jostled at an amusement park, it’s nice to have some quiet.  2.   POOL  The Pool is Enormous!!!!  There is a DJ at the pool during the day, and they show a movie at night on Weekends  A Waitress will serve drinks and Food from the Pizza place on site.  (In fact, you can’t bring outside
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to give your review, and we are so pleased to hear all your wonderful feedback! We look forward to having you stay with us again!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Loved the stay, super close walk to both parks. All the amenities were available.  Pool was huge, and they played movies in the evening.  Definitely will be coming back with my family. Wasn't cheap, but worth it.
Manager Response: Dear jbC1379ET,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We look forward hosting you folks next time!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great customer service by Candi…my family and myself felt great with the customer service and ended reserving another  night.  Room with patio, next to the pool, and great pizza👍🏽… Candi sure made it better because it starts at the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Connector35392869579,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear Candi was accommodating for you and your family! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: On Sunday, 7 25 21, I checked in at 3 pm and was told by a male desk clerk that I had to wait until 4 pm.  It was a hot day and my kids were acting like brats.  I had been driving for over 6 hours to get to the hotel and spent 5 hours at Disneyland in the hot sun eating high calorie food at the park.  We all needed a shower to cool off and a place to rest.  The last thing I wanted to hear was that there was no room available until 4 pm.    Out of no where, the on-duty manager, Candy stepped in and said that a room was available for check-in.  She saved the day.   This is exactly what I had expected from a hotel like this.  They were there when I needed them.  Candy (and yes, I confirmed that was her real name) even asked where I was parked so she could place me in a room near my
Manager Response: Dear Kit95014,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. Candi is a treasure to have with us and we are thrilled to hear she was accommodating. We look forward to seeing you next month!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great location. Close to Disneyland main gate. The online check in made it quick and easy to check in. The staff was very friendly. I could tell that many of the guests were showering about an hour after the park closed by the lack of water pressure in the shower. Aside from that, we had a great experience and will return again.
Manager Response: Hello Disneylandtrip2021,   We thank you for taking the time to give your review. Thank you for the feed back, and we will look into the water pressure. We are looking forward to having you stay with us again! In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Leo is an amazing employee!! He was extremely helpful with anything we needed and did his very best to make sure we were happy and made everything so easy for us. I wish more people had his wonderful attitude, very friendly!!
Manager Response: Hello Gabrielle,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review, we are so please to hear that "Leo" was so helpful. He is a gem! In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: LEO is AMAZING. He went above and beyond to help us with my wheel chair and was so nice to our granddaughter. We will definetly come back to the Anaheim Hotel because of LEO. I hope LEO is reconized for his outstanding customer service.
Manager Response: Hello donnap699,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are pleased to hear that "Leo" was so helpful! We will let him know. We are looking forward to having you stay with us again. In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: I have wanted to stay here for awhile - I love the mid century decor and it looked so cute online. You can’t beat the proximity to the parks, but our stay was disappointing. Every interaction with the front desk, both in person and over the phone, was unfriendly. They wanted to charge us $100 to check into our room an hour early. Our room smelled old, the bathroom was tiny, and the room was so so noisy. Without a sound machine, we wouldn’t have been able to sleep through the night. The pool was great, the location is perfect, and the pizza place was a bonus. I had my hopes up, but we’ve had much better experiences at other hotels on Harbor Blvd.
Manager Response: Hello Carschoe, We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your time here. We are looking into all of your inconveniences. Our number 1 priority is our guest, and we hope you come back and give us another try. In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Having visited the property for events in the past I decided to book for a trip with my grandsons.  It did not disappoint.  The pool was awesome, the games around the property, easy access to pizza press, amazing staff, comfy room and probity to Disney made it a sure choice for future trips.  Shout out to Mike the bellman who helped us end our visit on a high note chatting with the boys while we waited for Uber.
Manager Response: Hello Williamsons,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time here, and we are looking forward to having you stay with us again! We will let "Mike" know that his help was appreciated.   In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Clean, big pool, close to the parks.
Summary: Walking distance to the parks. Room and grounds kept very clean.  The pool is very large and floats are provided by the Hotel.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  Only one suitcase stand is provided and just a few hangers.  Only one hook behind the bathroom door to hang towels.  No microwave was provided in the room.  Iron, ironing board, hair dryer and safe all provided in the room.  Coffee and coffee maker in room as well.  Good for families.  Additional charge for parking.
Manager Response: Dear AanikaCP,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding your stay. We have microwaves available upon request for an additional charge. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Fun Family Place, Close to Disney
Summary: The room was average size, comfy bed. The sparkling pool was HUGE and they brought out float toys for the kids to play with. Saturday afternoon they have a DJ it was super fun. The perks of having an on site restaurant that is open late is a plus. THe staff was really friendly, and the walk to Disney was quick and easy! Would definitely recommend.. although maybe If I don't, i can get cheaper rates hahah JK!!!
Manager Response: Dear MissJuJuBee,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We hope to see you again!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Good location easy walk to Disneyland and lots of nearby restaurants.  Amazing large pool that even has float toys for guests to use.    Friendly staff.  Big clean rooms with nice size balconies.  We will stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Bethany550,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our staff being friendly! We look forward to seeing you again.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Pros:  Nice large room, especially liked the patio on the first floor.  Easy walk to Disneyland resort without leaving the 'Disney Bubble'.  Cross directly from Disney property to this hotel.  TV large and worked well.  Great coffee provided at no charge from the bar in the morning. Pizza press has solid food, but order directly from their website if picking up (the QR code order system in the room charged us extra, I think because they will deliver straight to your room).  Very easy parking compared to many locations on Harbor that are valet only, and can leave the car anytime on check-in day.  The pool was massive, and they offered movies there in the evening.  Great fireworks view from the pool area.  Lots of nice outdoor spaces to relax and play.  Much more of a resort feel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback from your stay with us! I will be sharing your comments and concerns along with my Executive Team to ensure the Cons are addressed and the Pros are shared with our team. We look forward to hosting you in the near future!  Best, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: The best hotel with the best staff.
Summary: The hotel is close to the park and clean! They have a great bar and pizza place attached to the hotel. And Leo is the absolute best. He went up and beyond to help us! The Anaheim Hotel is our go to hotel for Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hello K1356LGerinh,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed The Pizza Press, and that Leo was so helpful. He is great! We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: When we arrived we had a few problems with our room. The Problems were fixed quickly. Candy at the front desk made our trip. She went above and beyond to help with any problems we had. She is the reason we would return.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments in regards to your stay. We will let Candi know of her impact and can't wait to welcome you back again soon!  Best, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: We wanted to love this hotel, but were disappointed. There are better nearby choices.
Summary: First the good. The hotel has a wonderful location for your Disneyland vacation. Easy walking distance to the park. The lobby is also nice and the front desk folks are nice too. However, the hotel lacks were it counts: the room.  1. When we walked in the room it smelled musty and moldy.  2. The air conditioner ran 24 hours a day but never fully cooled the room. It was not unbearable, but we woke up several times hot.  3. Our shower did not drain. I asked them to fix it, and they came, but it was the same after. I was standing in two inches of yucky water with every shower.  4. We forgot that they do not clean rooms now. We ran out of towels and asked for more. It was 10:30 at night and we stayed up waiting for towels that never arrived. They never came.  5. Resort fees. Get
Manager Response: Hello HappyDonor,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We deeply apologize if your recent stay wasn't up to par. We will look into all your issues during your stay to ensure our guest experience is first class. We hope you come and stay with us again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, rooms are lackluster
Summary: First, the pros. The lobby is nice and I love the pizza restaurant next door. The close proximity to Disneyland is also nice. Now, the cons. The room smelled like cigarette smoke which was very off putting, our drain was clogged which was quite disgusting considering the hair was NOT ours, and the walls were crazy thin so we heard everything our neighbors were doing. The photos of the space look nice, but once you're actually in your personal space, it's a completely different experience. It feels quite misleading. I was very disappointed and we will not be staying at this hotel again. Would much rather pay extra for a better experience that doesn't leave me standing ankle deep in bath water.
Manager Response: Hello KassandraW17,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review.  We are pleased to here you enjoyed The Pizza Press. We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. We are addressing all these issues. We hope you stay with us again.  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We stayed 3 nights. The good: the location…easy walk to Disneyland; Nice lobby; free good coffee in lobby each morning; big, clean, lovely pool.  The pizza restaurant is decent and reasonable.  The bad: we stayed in one of the older rooms, which were $10 a night cheaper…but the bathroom was awful..shower/tub faucet was loose and very difficult to work, the drain was very slow and we ended up standing in ankle deep water as we showered; No maid service and when we ran out of towels it took three requests before they came; Very Loud music plays constantly at the pool, making it hard to relax, read or talk.
Manager Response: Hello OregonMomoffive!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review and feedback. We are pleased to hear that you love our location! We apologize for the inconveniences regarding the bathroom, we will look into all your issues during your stay to ensure our guest experience is first class. We hope you come back again.  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Matt the bartender was absolutely amazing, his service is outstanding. . Going above and beyond... Thank you. We had to wait for our room for a long time but he made our wait fantastic with his mai tai's and great attitude. The pool was perfect and refreshing.
Manager Response: Hello Lisa! Thank you for taking the time to give your review.  We are pleased to here that "Matt the bartender" took such good care of you, he is an asset here. We apologize you had to wait a long time for your room, we are working on getting rooms ready earlier.  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: Just a quick walk to Disneyland, under 15 minutes from the hotel room to the ticket gate. Many activities for families, lawn games like bag toss and a big pool with a DJ. Very clean as well, both the rooms and the public spaces.
Manager Response: Hello billium216!  We thank you for taking the time to give your review. We look forward to having you stay with us again! In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, closeness to Disneyland, clean rooms
Summary: Leo,  Matt, Abel, the morning gal (sorry, we forgot her name), even maintenance workers - all were extremely helpful and welcoming.  Our room was very simple, a little small and we wished we had reserved a park view room.  The swimming pool was large, nice and deep in one end, old school style, with retro music playing.  We really enjoyed the pool.  Beds were comfortable enough, not plush but better than some other hotel beds.  Drinks in the bar were well made, with a nice selection.  The attached Pizza restaurant was ok, wish the menu was a little more diverse.  Staffing seemed to be extremely short, unfortunately.  With this trip coming on the end of the Covid crisis, I guess that could be expected.  We were told when we checked in that there would be no housekeeping daily
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer,  We thank you for taking the time to give your review.  Thank you for your kind words regarding Leo, Matt, and Abel, they are gems here at The Anaheim Hotel! Thank you for your feed back regarding The Pizza Press, we will assess the situation. We look forward to hosting you again. See you next time!  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and GREAT service!!
Summary: Overall, great experience. Super close to Disneyland. We walked to and from each day. Our room was a little outdated, but the floor plan and two king beds in the room made up for it. The service was GREAT and we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello G2776LQerikf!  We thank you for choosing our hotel, and we thank you for taking the time to give your review. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  In Hospitality,  The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary Heading: Great Service at the front desk from Candi!
Summary: Best place to stay when visiting Disneyland, any time of the year.  Especially in the summer, they have a great pool with a spa and a DJ in the afternoon.      Parking is great, the walk is about 10 minutes across the street from Disneyland. I love this place!
Manager Response: Thank you Mike for submitting a review about your experience. We look forward to hosting you again for many visits to come. See you next time!  -The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services

Summary Heading: Very nice property! The pool vibe and all the greenery is amazing.
Summary: It is very enjoyable to walk around the property and the pool vibe reminds me of Palm Springs.  I am obsessed.  The bar and restaurant are VERY NICE as well.    They have a very nice family game area outdoors.  Also a great spot to bring food and eat outdoors.
Manager Response: Thank you Toni for taking the time to share! We take great pride in the environment our property has to offer and love to hear you were able to enjoy it. We appreciate you staying with us and hope to welcome you back here soon!  In Hospitality, The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: We have been long time customers of the hotel as a parking spot for Disneyland. Even then the customer service was amazing. Now we have stayed here and we must say, they did not disappoint. Rachel checked us in quick and got us a room upgrade for no reason at all. The rooms are clean and big and the bathroom was perfect for 3 people. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Lando H,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that "Rachel" was able to accommodate a room upgrade! We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: What a wonderful hotel! The mid-century modern theming is great; the property is lovely and the rooms are clean and comfortable. Loved having my own little balcony to enjoy coffee in the mornings. The lobby bar and restaurant was very good, and the location so nearby the entrance to Disneyland/DCA is a huge plus. Will definitely stay here again for my next Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Hello ladykylierenee,  Thank you for taking the time give us your review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time here, and we are looking forward to your return!

Summary: Another reason to stay here is because of the staff, we love Leo at the front he is always ready and willing to help, Michael in reservations went above and beyond to help make sure my reservations for our kids first Disney trip went off without a hitch.   If you are planning a Disney trip I highly recommend this hotel, it’s SO close. We have tried to save in budget and stay at hotels further away but ended up ubering and the cost ends up about the same. The hotel has the pizza press attached to it and the food was really quick and tasty! They have a big pool and they had a dj on the weekend! The room was clean and we will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Hello 546berric,  We thank you for choosing our Hotel for your trip! We are so pleased to hear that "Michael" in our Reservations department took such good care of you, he is a true asset to our team. We look forward to you next stay here.

Summary Heading: Best location for easy access to Disney!
Summary: Overall it's a great place to stay. The rooms are clean. The pool was big with great music in the background. And you can't beat the distance to Disneyland. One star knocked off for horrible water pressure in the shower and a slow draining tub. Other than that great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you 283shaziaa for sharing your experience with us! We appreciate the feedback and will address the concerns with our Engineering team! We hope to see you again very soon!  -The Anaheim Hotel Guest Services Team

Summary: My family and I don’t live too far from the area of Disney, but decided that spending all day at parks that drive seemed nearly impossible. So we chose to stay at this hotel. The property was so clean. The staff were amazing. We were greeted at the front by two gentlemen and sadly I didn’t catch their names. They were very kind. We did check-in online and it was easy. The front desk Marissa even got us in earlier than 4pm. She was so nice and even recommended us to try a restaurant located in the Garden Walk and it was AMAZING. So shout-out to her for helping us out. Housekeeping is not available, but that’s okay. We only stayed one night. The ONLY reason I gave this hotel a 4 star, the Pizza Press was amazing. Just wished their staff were a bit friendly. Overall, rooms were
Manager Response: Dear azaleamenz,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Our team is thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear that our new team member "Marissa" was able to accommodate and early check in and have a great recommendation for you! We look forward to seeing you again!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We stayed 3 nights in a two king bed room. The hotel has great style and a wonderful pool! The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. We had a double sink which was helpful for our family.  There was some noise from the room nextdoor coming from under the adjoining door (I’m a very light sleeper).  Also, no daily housekeeping because of COVID but it wasn’t too much of an inconvenience. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear sandbar7,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our two king bedroom was able to accommodate you and your family! We apologize about the noise issue, please inform our staff so our team can look into any issues. We hope to see you next time you visit the resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with great mid century modern décor
Summary: The pool is really large and clean! The music is relaxing and adds to the mid century modern feel of the property. The rooms were clean and while minimally decorated were tastefully done. I enjoyed being by the pool hearing the music, as it was quite relaxing!
Manager Response: Dear scZ1585SZ,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our Olympic size pool and music. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Yes the hotel is older, but it is clean, and ACROSS the street from the enterance to the park. When your leaving disney and you are so so tired, you can see it from the exit! We live only 20 miles away, but because family was visiting and staying by the park, we wanted to maximize our visit. And we could come over at lunch, take a nap and walk back. There is a good pizza place and bar on the property. The rooms are a little small, and the bathroom is also, but they have outdoor space, and very clean,
Manager Response: Dear ckohlmier,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding your stay and hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Our trip from the beginning to end was amazing, Leo and the security guard (I forgot his name) welcomed us in and were so kind and friendly. Leo went above and beyond his position with trying to make this into the best Disneyland trip for us. Austin at the front desk was awesome and warm and welcoming, very good with making sure we were well taken care of. The only issue was our room door was very hard to close and we almost had to slam it to fully close it. Other than that we had an excellent stay and look forward to next time.
Manager Response: Dear Vanessaoro44,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear "Leo & Austin" were welcoming and friendly. Our team will look into the door issue to ensure our guest satisfaction. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I mainly chose this hotel for the walking distance to Disneyland. However, I honestly felt I made the wrong decision especially for the cost of the room. The (executive) room is pretty dated. It feels dirty except for the new looking double sink. The bathroom caulking was pretty bad which made the bathroom very dirty looking. There are some tiles in the bathroom that also appears to have stress cracks. The toilet seat wasn’t fully secure to the toilet itself, so whenever you sit on it, you can feel it moving. It didn’t feel clean, and it doesn’t give a clean feeling even after showering.  They do have a pretty nice looking tv but not much channels, but who has the energy to watch tv after a long day of Disney, so that didn’t bother me too much.   The bed is pretty comfortable
Manager Response: Dear Daniel W,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize if your recent stay wasn't up to par. Our team us currently still planning to remodel our executive room types hopefully in the near future. We will look into all your issues during your stay to ensure our guest experience is first class. Truly we are grateful to have been your host during your trip, we hope you will consider us in the future.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Hotel 5/21 and we checked out on 5/24. The Pool is huge and there is a DJ playing music Saturday 10-6 pm  & Sunday 10-5pm. One of my favorite things was the pool side service for the exact same price as at the bar, Rachel is just the sweetheart who is always there when you need her.  Another Highlight of my trip was LEO... He was just a delight when we pulled in to go check in. Leo was super friendly and extremely helpful.. I was a little stressed because it was my first trip without my husband but Leo to care of everything. We woke up each morning looking for him because he was such a delight. I think I might just book a trip just so I can go see Leo again..
Manager Response: Dear Michelle32409,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed all the amenities we have to offer at The Anaheim Hotel. we are thrilled to hear Rachel and Leo were kind and helpful. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Candi at the front was such a huge help!!! She helped us get parking for our brother and we weren’t even guests! She went so above and beyond! We have stayed at the Anaheim Hotel for many years and have always been happy. They have made improvements to the property in recent years, with upgrade and activities, making it even more family friendly. We had to get a larger room elsewhere for this visit, but we love the Pizza Press and had to eat there and decided to ask the front desk for some help with our parking situation, as we had hoped, Candi the front desk pulled through big time! Thanks so much for the help!
Manager Response: Dear Luvanika,  We are delighted you chose The Anaheim Hotel for your visit, and we are pleased to know our associates, particularly "Candi", made your stay memorable. We appreciate the acknowledgment of her dedication, and we will surely share your compliments with her. It is great to see everything we have to offer left you with a remarkable impression of our hotel. We look forward to having you as our guest again whenever you return to the area.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: My daughter and I were frequent visitors of the Anaheim Hotel prior to covid and always had wonderful trips, clean rooms, cozy beds etc  We finally made it back and was so pleased to be remembered by Leo and Kandi who both took wonderful care of us.  I have always been pleased with their incredibly helpful and friendly staff. Cannot wait to go back
Manager Response: Dear JMM418,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to always here from our regulars! great that Candi & Leo were able to assist you with all your needs. We look forward to having you back with us!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We stayed for our first visit back to our happy place!! Hotel was nice. I loved that it’s a short walk with a great price!! Only down fall is we arrived around 11:30pm and check in took around 20 minutes!! No one was at the counter, with two small children it was pretty annoying!
Manager Response: Dear Dimplez_92,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. We deeply apologize for the inconvenience of our staff not being at the front for the duration that you were waiting to check in. Our team has looked into the issue to ensure it doesn't happen again. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Leo was absolutely amazing! He went above and beyond to help us during our visit at the Anaheim Hotel. His customer service and positive attitude did not go unnoticed! We will definitely be back because of Leo!
Manager Response: Dear Brittany B,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear how amazing "Leo" Truly is! We are thrilled he assisted you with the utmost customer service! We look forward to seeing you in the future!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Have stayed at a few hotels near Disney and this is by far the best! It's literally a block away from the theme park entrance and so convenient! Room was clean, staff was friendly and helpful, and there's even a pool and gym if you find the time! For the location you can't beat the price, we will definitely will be back.
Manager Response: Dear sheswasnderlust,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! We are thrilled to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: It has it's pluses and minuses
Summary: Pluses - this is a clean hotel that is moderately priced. It's the next best thing to staying at Disneyland.  So convenient. Service was very good. The pizza restaurant is very, very good.  I will eat there again. Minuses - the beds are really bad.  You can tell they haven't been changed out in some time.  As a frequent traveller, I'm used to different kinds of beds.  They really need new beds in this place. After walking around Disneyland all day, being in a comfy bed is everything. The beds in our room were so broken down that you sank into them. Not good.
Manager Response: Dear bampitt,  Thank you for choosing The Anaheim Hotel for your stay. We appreciate your feedback. Please accept our sincerest apologies for not living up to your expectations, or ours as a matter of fact. We take our reviews seriously and will look into where we may have gone wrong in your case. Thank you again for your candid feedback.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Nice place to stay at, if check out time can be even later that would be great. Overall a nice place to stay at. Daily cleaning stuff (shampoo, body wash, etc) should be more, and ease to get. Phone to help desk is not available not connecting, have to use personal cell to get to the help desk, which is bad.
Manager Response: Dear keeekeeelala,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about any inconveniences that may have happened throughout your stay. Our team will look over your feedback to make the necessary changes. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Good budget hotel close walking distance to Disneyland.  The large heated pool and hot tub were great.  The standard room and bathroom seem a bit cramped but worked.  The patio is a nice touch and large on the bottom floor rooms, although we had no use for it.  The mini fridge is priceless if you have perishables and don’t want to worry about keeping a cooler going.  The only downside is no breakfast included and nothing in too close of walking distance, which REALLY made a Disneyland morning a bit more hectic than it needed to be, especially if you want to get to the park early.   The pizza place supposedly has breakfast options but didn’t open until 9am the day we headed to the park which was too late and then opened up at 11am on Saturday which was also too late for us.  So
Manager Response: Dear Cody B,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding "The Anaheim Hotel". We deeply apologize if our breakfast wasn't open earlier. Our Pizza Press team had recently started doing breakfast which should be opening up at 8AM everyday moving forward. We hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great proximity to the parks with a great price. Love being able to just walk across the street and head into the parks. Attached to the Pizza Press restaurant, which is very convenient for food both before and after a day at the parks. Staff is extremely friendly and accommodating, especially Leo ... he truly loves his job. I have stayed here many times over the past few years and always had a great experience. I will continue to go back for future trips.
Manager Response: Dear 0719Hijaimes,  Thank you for letting us know The Anaheim Hotel was perfect for your visit.
