Our hotel is ideally located for fun-loving family vacations with all the excitement and entertainment the heart of Anaheim Resort. We are pleased you had a memorable stay and that our exceptional amenities exceeded your expectations. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you all again any time your travels bring you to Anaheim.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: What a wonderful experience we had at The Anaheim Hotel. From the ease of early check-in to allowing us to have a late check-out, we truly enjoyed our stay at this outstanding establishment. So close to the entrance of Disneyland is a added benefit. And the pool is warm and huge! Our rooms were comfortable and very clean which is especially important. Great on-site restaurant and the large patios are additional perks. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to those who are not expecting a luxury experience but one that is great for those of us who appreciate a good value, great location and outstanding staff.
Manager Response: Dear TravelfOrFun2,  We are flattered by your very kind review of The Anaheim Hotel. Our team members are a perfect example of the passionate and dedicated spirit of service that we value. We are delighted that our caring hospitality really stood out. We will be sure to share your compliments with each of the associates you mentioned in your lovely review. Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I’m a regular customer of the Anaheim Hotel and can’t recommend it enough. Just returned from a 3 day stay to visit Disneyland and have already booked again for September. Fabulous service, great rooms and totally walkable to Disneyland. We love ordering pizza and chilling by the pool after our Disney adventures. They even let us have a 1pm late checkout.  So great.
Manager Response: Dear 347laurenv,  Thank you for your feedback. Always great to hear from our regulars! We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay right across the street from Disneyland! Great staff! Customer service is superb!
Summary: Great place to stay! Nice rooms with awesome large patios!! They Adds so much more space to the room! The large Patio adds a great play space for the kids. BUT!!! what makes this stay great is the staff! As a person who has been in customer service management for 20 years! This place is superb! Candy is who I would love to commend, she is so awesome! She was such a sweet professional employee, checked us in with no problems and made sure we were 100 percent comfortable. The Anaheim hotel is lucky to have her on the team. As a company manager myself, I may have to steal her away from you guys. Thank you candy for all you have done to make our stay phenomenal! I think I found our new Disney trip hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Freddie R,  We are delighted you chose The Anaheim Hotel for your visit, and we are pleased to know our associates, particularly "Candi", made your stay memorable. We appreciate the acknowledgment of her dedication, and we will surely share your compliments with her. It is great to see everything we have to offer left you with a remarkable impression of our hotel. We look forward to having you as our guest again whenever you return to the area.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This hotel was a great quick getaway for us. We had been traveling for a while and we’re going to to to Disneyland the next day so we wanted something convenient. Not only was it nice, clean, great big pool and opened Jacuzzi but the service was great. Kandy at the reception area was amazing. She was multi tasking, taking care of everything and everyone’s needs and still remained pleasant and professional. She deserves to be recognized. It was a pleasure staying there.
Manager Response: Dear dg021799,  We greatly appreciate your feedback. Great to hear you folks enjoyed all the amenities we have to offer and that "Candi" was amazing in assisting you folks! We Will certainly inform her of her efforts. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay if the price is right
Summary: Just got back from a night at The Anaheim Hotel. The hotel has a great look and is very clean. The ambiance is nice and it’s a short walk over to Disneyland. The staff wasn’t anything extraordinary. Both people I dealt with at the front desk weren’t very friendly. Not rude, just not friendly. Got the vibe I was bothering them. We paid for a park view room, I wouldn’t exactly call it a park view. If you leaned over the balcony rail you could see the backside of Guardians of the Galaxy. Perhaps a good view of fireworks if they had them. Wasn’t what i expected when I picked the room type based on the photo. The rooms are nice with a really big TV. The pillows are AWFUL. Seriously terrible. Bring your own pillows if possible. I might consider staying here again if the price was
Manager Response: Dear andaid22-80,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We deeply apologize if our team failed your expectations and I can assure you this is not a normal thing, as our team strives to provide a first class hospitality experience. Our team will look into your feedback to try to enhance our guest stay moving forward. We are truly grateful to have been your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The most amazing hotel I have stayed in in the orange county area. All the staff we very friendly. The maid service was amazing as well. In this scary time during the Covid-19 pandemic its nice to feel welcomed. I'm saving the best for last Candi who works at the front desk was sooooo sweet and very professional. every time I walk through the office she is always asking me if everything is ok or if I need anything. She is defiantly a keeper. Thank you to all the staff at The Anaheim Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear G1297TBmelissao,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Candi is truly a treasure to have with us! We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Anaheim Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great location, clean rooms, and wonderful staff. I wish I had stayed longer so that I could have time to enjoy the other amenities like the pool area or the veranda. Walking distance from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Anikalvarado,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear you enjoyed our hotels close proximity. We hope to see you next time you visit the Anaheim Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I loved the mid century vibe of this hotel. The lobby was super cute and fun. I wish I had taken pictures of it. The grounds were beautiful and well maintained. We were able to check in four hours early which was amazing and we were so thankful! The walk to Disneyland entrance was quick which is always nice.  We had late check out which was awesome!  The room itself was adequate. The bed was comfy, the linens clean. Definitely enough drawers to unpack if you are that type of traveler. There was a nice little balcony which we did not utilize.   The bathroom was tight! Especially for two people to get ready at the same time. The bathroom also had a scale which we found quite odd but actually came in handy when weighing our suitcases full of souvenirs to bring home.   We had an
Manager Response: Dear Shannon B,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate your kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel and its proximity. It sounds like you booked our Deluxe Queen room, I would highly recommend trying out our Executive rooms next time. Our Executive rooms are lager with 2 vanities which is fantastic if needing to share bathroom space. We deeply apologize about the inconveniences that may hvae happened and will be looking to make the necessary changes moving forward. We hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The aesthetic of the hotel is adorable. Super cute 1950’s esque decor in the lobby and pool area. Jacuzzi is amazing and to top it off, the front desk customer service and staff (housekeeping included) are superb. Candy, at the front desk, was more than sweet (no pun intended) and made sure to try and accommodate all of our needs during check in. Literally had me to the point of tears it overwhelmed how much she went above and beyond. I can’t wait for future stays. Thank you Candy & Staff at The Anaheim Hotel!
Manager Response: Dear dezziprado,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all your kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel and Candi who is a treasure to as part of our team. Truly we are grateful to have been your host and look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Unfortunately, hotel staff here are just way too out of touch with what is going on in their own hotel.  We have stayed here multiple times and the past 2 times have just been terrible.  The desk manager Roger is pretty much worthless. Who does next to nothing to resolve anything, and also the caliber of people who choose to stay here.  This combination has made this hotel a place we just will not visit any more.  It is just an unsafe, unclean, and riotous place.  There are people staying here who just do not realize that there are other guests here and they choose to smoke, shout, swear, threaten other guests, leave disgusting messes and food all around (and in) the pool and even shoot meth on the balconies (I have photos).  When the issue is reported to the desk manager,
Manager Response: Dear Slamgwhit,  Thank you for your feedback. Our deepest apologies regarding your past couple stays. We understand the frustration with issues with troublesome guest at times and try to rectify any issues as soon and as best we can. We recommend never handling an issue yourself and inform our staff so we may address the issue right away. Our staff doesn't restock guest rooms due to covid and try to inform our guest that we can always send more toiletries, towels, etc. over as requested. We have security on property for about 16 hours a day to monitor as best they can. We greatly appreciate your feedback once again and our team will use this to enhance our guest experience and to take care of any shortcomings. We thank you for your patience and apologize for the issues during this pandemic. We are truly grateful to have been your host during you trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel 5 times total in the last couple of years; 3 times before Covid, twice during.  The 3 visits pre-Covid were fine.  No issues whatsoever.  The 2 during, however, are a completely different story.  I do realize that lack of staffing could be the reason for this but it is still worth noting.  During our stay in Feb 2021, we had some neighbors that were up until dawn partying on their balcony.  They were smoking and shooting up.  While we couldn't see them due to the barrier between our balconies, we could smell the smoke and heard them talk about putting needles in their arms.  We called security who were very slow to respond.  They eventually (after a good hour) quieted down but no police were called for the drug use.  During our most recent stay end
Manager Response: Dear Lyndswhit,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about your recent stays with us. We understand how frustrating it is to have troublesome neighbors, unfortunately we can't always call the cops unless our team sees something happening which we all try our best to ensure the safety of our staff and guest. Our team went to check the pool on your behalf and unfortunately, we were unable to locate anything out of the ordinary which might've given that guest time to address their own faults. Our team thanks you for all your feedback, which will help us enhance our guest experience and take the necessary precautions to having troublesome issues like this in our pool area. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip to the Disney Resort and hope you will consider us next time you visit the area.  Kindest Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: THE BEST GIRLS TRIP WE HAVE HAD
Summary: Nothing but good things to say! The room was so cute with an amazing view . The first night we had excellent service from the front help at the door he was so sweet and I wish we could remember his name! The next day we went to the pool and they had a DJ?! That was a nice surprise , felt like a mini Vegas lol OMG ALSO There was also another sweet heart his name is Leo and he was top tier with helping us load our car for the end of our trip. So hopefully you get him when you need help ! 7 stars if I could ,cant wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear maryahbabe,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear you enjoyed our weekend pool experiece, Leo is a great asset and are always thrilled when hes around. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay. The morning front desk staff was extremely helpful and friendly. The hotel has a very large pool and the provide lots of fun pool floats. Many rooms had a balcony or an outdoor porch area. The hotel is an easy walk to Disneyland. The downsides were a small bathroom, no complimentary breakfast and they charge for parking, otherwise I would give it 5 stars.
Manager Response: Dear 349jodier,  Thank you for your feedback, We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotels close proximity to Downtown Disney. I would reccomend checking out our "Executive" rooms that have dual vanities for more bathroom space, only downside is now balcony or patio but well worth a try.We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We travel a lot down to SoCal from the Bay Area and have had some really great experiences here.  When Covid first happened, we travelled to the Anaheim Hotel a couple of times and everything was awesome.  We felt safe and were still able to enjoy and relax during our time.  The first time we started to have issues, we were unfortunately placed right next to another family in a hotel that was pretty much completely empty with only 5 cars in the parking lot.  I understand keeping people in the same building with limited cleaning staffs etc, but the family next to us ended up having a party all night and smoking right outside our room.  We were leaving the next day so there wasn't any point in asking to move.  The second and last experience was at the end of February.  When I went
Manager Response: Dear Ivitsa,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize if your recent stay wasn't up to par. We're sorry to hear your neighbors weren't the best, we do have secutiy on property if any issues occur and hope you inform our staff so we may address the issue right away. At times we don't have certain room types available due to minor remoldeling or because we dont service rooms for about 24 hours after it has been vacated, we apologize for the inconvenience during this pandemic. Our team will go over your feedback to ensure the necessary changes to enhance our guest experience, we hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We took advantage of the public parking that the Anaheim hotel offers for Downtown Disney. Leo was outside tending to the parking guests. Leo was so friendly and informative. He went above and beyond for us and helped us find a parking spot. We will be back to stay the night there soon.
Manager Response: Dear Rbyn81,  Thank you for your feedback! Great to hear you enjoyed our public parking for Downtown Disney. We Appreciate the kind comments regarding "Leo", he is an asset to our team. We look Forward to seeing you soon!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: A Nice Stay at the Anaheim Hotel!
Summary: Going back and forth on where to stay in Anaheim, and reading reviews of the Anaheim Hotel, plus their great prices and choice of accommodations lead our choice to book here. We were staying for a family wedding which was 15 minutes from the hotel at the Vintage Rose. This is one of the few hotels that offer King beds, and there were four of us, so it worked out great. We reserved an Executive two king bed room. We were given Room 201 which was on the ground floor, and easy to walk to from the parking lot. Walking in there is the bathroom directly to the right, which was quite large with a large, long vanity (Executive room only offers this, that's why we chose it because there were four of us), with two sinks on each end. A separate door to enter the toilet/shower/bathtub
Manager Response: Dear tkmyadvice2, We greatly appreciate your detailed feedback! We deeply apologize about the AC issue and will certainly have our team look into this. Our team greatly appreciates all the kind comments regarding our hotel and Pizza Press attached. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort! Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I have come to the Anaheim hotel several times just to write! It’s wonderful now that downtown Disney is open and serving food, and outdoor dining, because I can also go over there although pizza press is a wonderful restaurant which I highly recommend. It’s location is great the rooms are very well-kept and spacious. It gives me a kind of break from my normal life, In the proximity of being able to go over and see what is available and on offer at downtown Disney was one of the reasons I picked it for this time. I did not know what to expect due to Covid regarding how many people we’re going to be there etc. so being able to base out of the Anaheim and right and then go over and take a break at downtown Disney was the ideal writing retreat for me! Just like the spacious rooms
Manager Response: Dear Karey P, Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Two stays, now converted to loyal customers!
Summary: This hotel is right on Harbor Blvd, directly across from Disneyland and nearby several restaurants--great location.  First time, concierge were very friendly in accommodating my check in time.  The lobby was extraordinarily clean and cozy.  Hand sanitizers were placed at several spaces (lobby, pool, hallways).  My way to my room passed by a spacious outdoor pool and wonderful garden area with ample space.  Upon arrival into my room, it was immaculate--double sinks, well lit room and an outside patio space!      The staff ensured my stay was top knotch.  There's even a Pizza restaurant on site.  Many concerns people typically find at any hotel were not an issue.  The water ran hot instantaneously, the towels were soft, and ultra clean as were the linens too.   Everything you
Manager Response: Dear G814CWgeorges,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding your recent stay! We are thrilled to hear our staff ensured a top knotch stay! we hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Pleasant stay at the Hotel. Cody, from the front desk was very helpful and courteous. We always enjoy our stay here. Very comfortable and clean. Even with the last minute booking and arriving very late it was very good.
Manager Response: Dear Letsgolarry,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that "Cody" was helpful and curteous as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Small trip to check out the area
Summary: Second floor in the back parking lot area is where we stayed at. The whole checking in process was very smooth, staff was great, everywhere we walked/checked out was clean. Only thing I wish was changed for next time is increased water pressure for the shower (may have just been out room)
Manager Response: Dear Q955CTcharlesg,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. Our team will look into the water pressure to enhance our guest experience. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great easy location to get to downtown disney. We had 2 rooms. Both very clean. Love having the option of 2 king beds. Large pool for social distancing. The jacuzzi is small. Lawn games available to check out. Super family friendly, clean, I will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear KatyF710,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity to Downtown Disney fit your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Leo was the first person in the front and he gave absolutely Phenomenal customer service even helped us find our room. Kuddles to Leo. Thank you again you’ve out done yourself. And thank you for making us feel welcome
Manager Response: Dear araselyl2020,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled Leo assisted you from the beginning to end during your stay! We hope to see you next time you visit the Anaheim resort.  Kind Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The staff were great. Leo and rest of the staff went out of their way, for sure. The olympic sized pool was awesome during the heat wave with orca pool floats provided. The night time movie at the pool was an unexpected surprise to entertain (and calm down) the kids in the pool.  Rooms were big - AC worked great - pizza and snacks at the pool with servers coming around frequently to take orders. We don't drink, but lots of folks around the pool were enjoying a beer and relaxing. Perfect quick getaway. Downtown Disney is right across the street! We'll probably take the trip down again just to hang out down there!
Manager Response: Dear brianmV5453FP,  Thank you for your feedback! Great to hear Leo assisted you! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our amenities for The Anaheim hotel. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We live in Orange County,California and was looking for a great hotel to go stay and swim and get away and have some summer fun! And we found just the hotel to do that with, When we arrived we were greeted with THE BEST FRONT DESK RECEPTIONIST I HAVE EVER HAD! HER NAME WAS KENDALL AND FROM THE START OF OUR STAY TO THE END OF OUT STAY SHE IS WHAT MADE OUR STAY THE BEST WE COULD OF ASKED FOR AND TO BE HONEST KENDALL IS THE MAIN REASON WE WILL BE COMING BACK AGAIN! BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I COULD ASK FOR!  Their pool was just HUGE! They offer pool floaties and a DJ on weekends! Later that night they played a movie on a big screen for the kids to in the pool area so you could swim or sit in hot tub and watch a movie! They BBQ by the pool and you could get hamburgers and hotdogs for
Manager Response: Dear 861briannaf,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear Kendall assisted you with her outstanding customer service, she is truly a treasure to have! Great to hear you enjoyed all the amenities The Anaheim Hotel has to offer! We hope to see you again during the summer!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We've stayed at this hotel several times & would stay here again Great location &  huge pool. Book a room with a patio, the extra space was nice to have.  There is a restaurant  at the hotel offering pizza & salads, very convenient.  Some rooms need serious remodeling. but the beds were comfortable. We were out and about most of the time, so didnt fuss over the room.
Manager Response: Dear Ivista,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotels amenities. Our team is still finishing some touch ups around the property to enhance our guest experience. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Love this place! Usually we don't enjoy the facilities because we're at the park but Disneyland is close right now and we got to really enjoy the pool this time and lovely Jacuzzi. It's such a wonderful atmosphere! Highly recommend! The staff is so friendly and the restaurant is amazing as well! Definitely recommend staying there and enjoying the place without Disneyland. Clean and great customer Service.
Manager Response: Dear MamaMcCarthy,  We greatly appreciate your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed our hotels amenities that we have to offer. We hope to see you again, next time you visit The Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: A great hotel, located across the street from the Disneyland main entrance area.  The  updated room was very clean, nice bed and clean bathroom.  The pool and  hot tub area was great after a long day at the park.  The location of the hotel also provides easy access to the various restaurants and shops. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I great choice.
Manager Response: Dear CNDTravel,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. Great that our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times over the years while visiting Disneyland and we will continue to stay here. The staff is really friendly, helpful and hard working.   The connecting restaurant, the Pizza Press is a awesome place to eat. They are open late which is nice after the long days at Disney. It is clean, reasonably priced and again the staff is friendly, helpful and hard working.   Currently the hotel is doing a few renovations which are always nice to see. And I believe most of the room have been up dated. The room we had was newly renovated which was very nice for the price point. The rooms are clean with modern furniture.   The pool and hot tub are incredible as well. Pretty cool to watch the fireworks from the hot tub after a hard day of Disneyland.   Our
Manager Response: Dear 815brentu,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regardinglur hotel and staff as we strive to provide a first class hospitlaity experience! We look forward seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We planned to drive and bring our camper but had car trouble last minute. We booked airfare and hotel stay. It was convenient to Disneyland and was clean and pleasant to stay at. The water pressure and temperature is temperamental but otherwise was a nice room. Beds were pretty comfy but pillows were really small. Not huge issues but are simple fixes
Manager Response: Dear KRadach002,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about the issue you may have had with your camper. Great to hear you enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you next time.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Really cool mid century modern with GREAT location!
Summary: This hotel  was remodeled in the mid century modern style and it has a really cool bar and lobby.  The rooms  are clean and nice and the pool is huge.  The pizza restaurant adjacent is really good as well.  It was faster to walk to Disney than take any kind of transportation.  Restaurants and shops are all up and down the street.
Manager Response: Dear N9879DZrebeccab,  Thank you for your feebdack. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel as we strive to prvide a first class hospitality experience! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We went to Disneyland with 2 small children ages 3 and 4.  The proximity to the park made the park experience so easy. After an exhausting day in the park, we were in our rooms and settling in when most people were just getting to their cars. All of the staff were kind and helpful. Bellstaff was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear osanable,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are extremely pleased that our location and staff provided such a pleasant experience and made each day easier! We hope to see you again in the future!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Weekend trip (4 nights) - this has to have been one of the better stays we have had in the many trips made to the Disneyland area.  From the room, staff, the overall cleanliness of the place - everything was perfect.  Room was very clean, had a good size fridge and the beds were very comfortable.  Staff - they have to be some of the friendliest I've come across.  I don't think there was a single hotel staff member that didn't give us a nice greeting of some sort, and everyone was very helpful.  The hotel has a nice gift shop, and the Pizza Press is a great place to eat - a  must go every time we head to Disneyland.  Only downside to the room (very minor), is that there was no microwave.   Overall - If you are looking for somewhere that is inexpensive (but doesn't feel that way)
Manager Response: Dear 399timo,  Thank you kindly for letting us know about your recent stay! We are incredibly pleased that our facilities and staff left such a positive impression! We do offer microwaves upon request, please be aware that they have a (1) one time charge of $15 + tax for the stay. We greatly appreciate your kind words and we hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Steps from Disneyland and excellent 'family bedroom' setup
Summary: We enjoyed 3 nights here to visit Disneyland. Excellent location, clean and comfortable rooms and grounds. Highly recommend and would return again. Highlights; 1. Extremely easy, short walk to Disneyland (don't drive there, it takes longer to drive and park than to does walk the 5-10 minutes from the hotel) 2. Excellent size & set up in the 'family suite', large space with kids bunkbeds round a wall/corner in the room. Perfect for young kids.  3. Friendly, experienced staff, from Leo who gave a warm welcome & help with our bags to the various team members who were about and very friendly and quick to help.
Manager Response: Dear MrsArnold,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding your recent stay! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We traveled from Tucson, AZ and arrived in a charter bus with a high school group. Upon arrival we were greeted by the bellhop, Leo, who was extremely patient, friendly, and helpful. We stored our luggage and checked into our rooms later that day, the hotel staff was friendly and organized and made our stay very comfortable. Rooms were clean and the location to Disney was a plus! We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Rachface0512,  Thank you for your feedback.Great to hear "Leo" was helpful and friendly. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Hotel with my two small children and wife in January 2020 for a Disneyland trip. I have stayed at numerous hotels near the Disneyland property over the past few years and have had a mixed bag of experience.   Upon our arrival, the staff was very helpful and were able to let us check in early. The rooms were much larger than I expected, which was perfect because we had a stroller, cooler and 4 people staying inside. The room had a fenced in patio area which was a nice touch and even gave us a view of the fireworks from our room. The beds were nice and I have no complaints. The bathroom was a little outdated but in reality, I'll take that trade off anyday.  The pool is absolutely massive and also has a hot tub. This was an incredible touch because you could
Manager Response: Dear Experience735307,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are absolutely delighted that everything exceeded your expectations and improved your experience! We cannot thank you enough for all the kind words and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Wonderful grounds surrounding the Olympic size pool, with nice hot tub. Good linens on bed, lots of hot water with strong water pressure. Rooms need more outlets and it may not have the most updated features, but the value for this very charming property is going to have me returning. We called hotel, to find a hidden gem, 2 king beds, which also come with a large 2 sink vanity, which was some nice extra room for getting ready in the morning. Our room was solid, never heard a peep from any other guests.
Manager Response: Dear KDecaro,  Thank you so much for your kind words! We are truly delighted that you enjoyed the grounds and that our Executive style rooms met your expectations! We look forward to seeing you again during your next visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great location. Great staff and food. Be aware.
Summary: The location is second to none. The staff, lobby, and restaurant is extremely clean. The Anaheim Hotel is a motel. The drywall, doors, and electrical are outdated. The price is right for the location.
Manager Response: Dear TaylorGoldenR,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We are elated that our staff and facilities improved your experience! We've reached out to confirm some additional details regarding your feedback for improvement. We hope you consider us again in the future!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed here late February 2020.  The location was amazing. 5 minute walk to Disneyland and near 7/11 and basic food chains.  Staff were extremely friendly and nice to deal with. The rooms were a decent size, except there was quite a musty smell. We couldn’t move the shower head as the pole was detached from the wall. Beds were very comfortable and room was cleaned daily. There was also a souvenir shop in the hotel. The walls were quite thin and we could here the people in the next room and above us. But would stay here again due to location.
Manager Response: Dear aliciataylor,  We greatly appreciate your feedback! We are extremely pleased that our staff and location exceeded your expectations! We appreciate the additional details regarding the room amenities and will have the appropriate departments address them. We hope to see you again during your next visit to the Anaheim Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: This property is a large, two-story motel with several wings and a large pool (great viewing of the evening fireworks from there.) Our family had two standard rooms that were clean and comfortable. Desk staff and the concierge were helpful, especially with storing luggage on getaway day while we went to California Adventure. The bar in the lounge area was fantastic. Both bartenders were helpful and made great drinks. The bar food menu was solid. We used it for mid-afternoon snacks before going to Downtown Disney on the the evening of our arrival, and for a late afternoon dinner two nights later.  The adjacent restaurant was adequate for breakfast, one morning cooked and then pastries and coffee on our "early in" day at Disneyland.  I cannot stress how convenient the location is
Manager Response: Dear traveltype8,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear our staff and concierge was helpful throughout your stay. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Truly we are grateful to have been your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Great for Single Female on Business Trip
Summary: I felt very happy and safe at the hotel. The staff were very helpful and I appreciated their going out of their way to make my stay great. I stayed at the hotel for a conference and was very happy that the hotel was located in the middle of the conference center and Disneyland. I was able to head to Disney early in the morning and still make it to my conference on time. This way I could get my "Fast Passes" for later in the day. I really never waited in line!
Manager Response: Dear KatieSchaits,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We hope to see you net time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Comfortable beds, super clean, very quiet and peaceful, across the street from the parks at a manageable cost. ultra friendly staff, in room fridge but no microwave. Very close to Denny's for quiet pre or post Disney food.
Manager Response: Dear Go781735,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We do provide a microwave upon request for an additional one time cost of $15 pus tax for your whole stay. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host and hope you will consider us again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This is such a great property!  The staff of The Anaheim hotel makes you feel welcome the moment you drive up.  Your greeted by the Valet service, Leo and his staff and as you walk in, welcomed by the bartenders at the counter, Sarah, Sabrina, Joseph, all are so wonderful.  Rooms are clean, property lovely with the lush vegetation and you can't beat the price being across from Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Cindy M,  Thank you for your feedback.We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The lobby is obviously renovated but my room not so much. I reserved what was described as a “Deluxe” Fireworks View Room but I’m puzzled about exactly what is deluxe. The bathroom was shabby and the fireworks were hard to see through the trees. Maybe they have better renovated rooms somewhere in the complex? Outdoor exterior doors opening to a concrete walkway. Pizza place in the building is good.
Manager Response: Dear MiniCoopers1972,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize if we didn't exceed your expectations during your stay, we are currently renovating some more of our rooms to enhance our guest experience. We are truly grateful to have been your host and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Had a nice stay, helpful staff
Summary: We stayed at The Anaheim hotel this week and had a nice stay. We were able to book an adjoining room with the family we were staying with and get king size beds which we really wanted.   One of the staff, Leo, was especially helpful and made our departure day super smooth with managing our luggage for us.   Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Silverflail,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay! We are extremely pleased that we were able to accommodate your requests and that Leo provided such exceptional service! We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Nicely revamped old hotel. Lobby is large and comfortable with a bar. The beds were comfortable and we all slept well. Unfortunately, we had a slow shower drain that they were unable to clear the entire three days we were there, so maintenance is lousy. But hotel is an easy walk to Disneyland Resort entrance. They have a pool and a jacuzzi that we didn’t have time to try out, but looked lovely.  My biggest beef is that they charge for parking but that information is hidden when booking online. Tsk tsk. I don’t like surprises like that. $18/day could have been just added to the room charge rather than being sneaky about it. I expected the “resort fee” since all the hotels around the resort charge it, but not a fee to park at a hotel that I’m staying at.
Manager Response: Dear jsr4261,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. We deeply apologize about the inconvenience with the shower drain, our team will look into this to ensure its not a lingering issue. Our parking is posted on our direct hotel website and unfortunately some third party companies do have them just hidden in the fine print at times. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your stay and hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: very clean. some updates have been done but is starting to show its age. only wished they had a continental breakfast, would have been very convenient for those early morning trips to Disneyland. All the staff are very friendly and helpful. Location is great if you are going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Wander685259,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. Our team continues to make changes/renovation here and there for our hotel to continue to enhance our guest experience. We do provide a full service breakfast restaurant for additional charge located inside The Pizza Pres from 6AN-10AM. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Close to the Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: I stay at the Anaheim Hotel every year for the Pacific Design Show in February.  The hotel is very clean, great staff and close to the convention center and Disney Parks.  Its a great value compared to the other hotels in the area.  Plenty of the rooms have private patios or balconies. Rooms are spacious and the attached Pizza Press has great breakfast in the morning and pizza for lunch and dinner.  Great experience over all.
Manager Response: Dear jtreible91,  Thank you for your feedback. It's always great to hear from our returning guest! We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Very clean, great location and very nice staff. Especially Leo who help load bags and guitars in and out of hotel with our driver. Thank you for a great stay! We would definitely stay here again. It is close to stores and coffee and restaurants. We did not get any pool time but they have a nice pool and outside area.
Manager Response: Dear ssuitcase,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience! We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The best part of our stay was meeting Leo! He is so friendly and outgoing and always speaks to you by name! Does his job well and appears to enjoy what he does! The hotel lobby and bar area are very nice. It smells so good when you walk in. The hotel is an easy walk to Disneyland and many restaurants are within walking distance as well. The rooms are a bit dated, but adequate for our short visit. Housekeeping could  have done a bit better job servicing our room. The furniture did not appear to have been dusted during our stay.
Manager Response: Dear A6568OElindag,  Thank you for your feedback.We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great hotel, pizza press great food and prices. Hotel clean. Staff is very friendly. Greeted by Leo, great character funny and gives an amazing customer experience, management very attentive and best priced for such a close proximity
Manager Response: Dear buddhaluv,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This hotel is in great proximity to Disneyland. Also only half a block away from the Garden Walk and many good restaurants. The rooms are a bit dated but very clean. The housekeeping safe are great! All of the staff at the hotel are very friendly. The restaurant on site is mediocre at best.
Manager Response: Dear Bruns02,  We greatly appreciate the feedback regarding your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel. We look forward to improving our facilities and service to ensure your next stay is an even better experience!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Great hotel, conveniently located, clean, modern. Cody and Sean are the best, very accommodating, caring and professional! They not only parked my car, they also cleaned it. Amazing, awesome, welcoming!
Manager Response: Dear galinasapo,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear such kind comments regarding "Sean & Cody", they are truly a treasure to have with us at The Anaheim Hotel. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The location is awesome for Disney. Pizza joint on site. Large pool. Good size room but I imagine they are all different. Espresso, boba tea and tacos on the way to Disney less than half a block away. We could see Disney fireworks from the room!  The bell man Leo was awesome. Five stars. Super helpful, great customer service.  Front desk Ivan was awesome. Five stars.  Housekeeping staff were awesome. Five stars.   Downside... hotel is quite loud. We could hear pretty much everyone and everything. Might next a problem with young kids but mine were fine. Maybe a second floor room would help. This is my second stay and I was on the ground floor both times. I’ll stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear SandraBTravels,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We are elated that our staff provided such a fantastic experience for your party and that our location and facilities improved it further! We look forward to seeing you again and recommend the second floor if you're looking for a more private stay.  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Good Enough for a place to rest
Summary: We booked the Anaheim Hotel through a package deal, hotel and tickets to Disneyland. It was within walking distance and the decor looked retro- but modern. The hotel staff was very helpful, courteous and knowledgeable. They were very nice in holding our luggage while we played all day. It was easy to get to, clean and did the job for what we needed. I was disappointed that they didn't have a breakfast or a microwave, but that was my fault for not researching that first. The beds were very comfortable and the room was clean. They had awesome Tropicana Brand shampoo, conditioner and body wash. We did not use the pool or hot tub, but it was very big and looked like a nice place. It also had a washer and dryer for coin use. The AC/Heater unit was right next to the bed, so I had to
Manager Response: Dear Heatherlisa3032,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We are thrilled to hear our staff was helpful and courteous! Our hotel does have a breakfast option from 6AM-10AM located in The Pizza Press for an additional charge and our microwaves are available upon request. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Although the entrance / reception / bar areas have been revamped, the rooms are tired, Dated and shabby. That said, the bed is comfortable  My poor rating comes from the inability of the staff to fix a fundamental issue we had with the shower, which I reported on day 1 of a 3 night stay. The water ran very hot and very cold When I say very hot, it’s scalding - moms be aware ! This will hurt your kids if they are in the shower!  I asked on two other occasions to fix the issue. This was ignored, although the desk staff / concierge stated it had been fixed  No offer to move us either This hotel clearly caters for the quick tourist $ and does not care for service or quality Avoid is my advice
Manager Response: Dear BluffaloPhil,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize if we didn't exceed your expectations throughout your stay. Our team will go over your feedback to make the necessary adjustments to enhance our guest experience. We would love another opportunity to accommodate you and your family next time you visit the Disney Resort. Please reach out our staff at your earliest convenience at the hotel so we may further assist you at (714)772-5900. We hope to hear from you.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Close to DL entrance.  Quiet at nite.   Ac/heat unit worked great and was very quiet. No microwave.  Rooms out of date.  Shower flow lousy.    Room was clean.    Paid extra for “park view”, don’t bother.  Only saw fireworks one nite and had to stand on the far corner of the balcony to see them.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy P,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We do have microwaves available upon request. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your stay and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Amazing, friendly and helpful staff, clean rooms, super cozy beds- and of course great prices, especially for proximity to Garden walk and Disneyland. Didn’t get to use the pool this trip, but it looks great for when weather permits. Special thanks to Kendall
Manager Response: Dear JMM418,  We greatly appreciate your kind words for our staff and amenities! We are elated that Kendall went above and beyond to improve your experience! We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: For $25, and a 5 minute walk to the Disney parks, public parking is a steal! And the lot is much smaller and easy to navigate. Huge shoutout to Cody and Celene in parking, who went far above and beyond to make our day a little more magical!
Manager Response: Dear david00david00,  Thank you for your feedback, We are thrilled to hear Cody and Celene went above and beyond to make your day a little more magical, they are truly a treasure to have with our staff!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Took a quick trip to Disneyland and stayed at the Anaheim Hotel.  It was a very nice experience.  Great hotel with wonderful staff!! I will definitely stay there again.  Short walk to the park.  Nice clean room.
Manager Response: Dear blackh0rnet,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay! We are truly grateful for the kind words about our staff, location and amenities! We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: The anaheim hotel at disneyland rocks!
Summary: We love the Anaheim Hotel across the street from Disneyland. Super fast walk and the staff is great. We love saying hi to Leo every time we come. Rooms are clean and ready early most visits. We also collect free nights there after so many visits.   Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Kadie12345,  Thank you for your feedback! We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and that Leo provides such excellent service! We are happy to hear that you're able to take advantage of our free membership benefits, including the free nights! We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Leo is always so amazing and so is Sabrina at the bar! We had a great stay! Clean rooms, easy walk to the park and the Pizza Press is a plus! We stay here at least a couple times a year and will continue to do so.
Manager Response: Dear arlener897,  Thank you so much for the kind words! We love our staff and agree that Leo and Sabrina are fantastic! We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel is midrange on price. They give 15% discount if you are a Disneyland Annual Passholder. It’s truly walkable to the parks. I like the cool 50’s vibe and fun pool! They do charge for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Katie A,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Disney Theme Parks.
Summary: You are greeted by a pleasant staff.  The rooms are clean and spacious. The pool is amazing with a hot tub. Withing walking distance to Disneyland. We love coming here. There are great places to eat in easy walking range.  The Pizza place onsite is great.
Manager Response: Dear Suzannemoss69,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our staff was pleasant. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Older hotel but very clean.  Beds were comfy, lots of towels.  Coffee pot in room, hair dryer, fridge.  Less than 10 mins walk to Disney. Lots of food options,  subway,  denny's,  IHOP,  McDonald's,  7 11 .  Super friendly staff.  Could not hear our neighbors. Would recommend  Fyi Lyft for 4 adults from lax to this hotel 45$$
Manager Response: Dear Ashley D,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Great Location and Very Friendly Staff
Summary: Location was great which is what we were looking for.  Staff were all very friendly.  Grounds kept very nice and clean.  Rooms were a bit underwhelming compared to the rest of the property.  However, we didn't spend much time in our room.  Nice size room with 2 King Beds.  Very hard to find a hotel with 2 King Beds.
Manager Response: Dear Earle G,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We are extremely pleased that our staff and facilities provided such a great experience! We hope you consider us again in the future.  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: My boyfriend and I are pretty much regulars at this hotel, we come about once a month if we can! It’s a quick walk to the park, perfect for those long days at the park. In the summer their HUGE pool is so relaxing and not over packed. Over time we’ve gotten to know some of the awesome staff. Everyone we come into contact with is very accommodating but there are a few we’ve gotten to know a little better. Leo is always there to greet us with a smile and even makes sure my boyfriend’s car is well taken care of (his car is his baby). He was the first one to remember us when we started coming more often. The concierges Candi and Kendal are very sweet. I know Candi worked with my boyfriend this last anniversary to make it extra special and even added a touching personal note that
Manager Response: Dear Shelgonzalez,  Thank you so much for your kind words! We love our staff and I agree that Sabrina, Leo, Candi and Kendall are wonderful and we are so pleased that provide such a great experience during your frequent stays! We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Decent hotel close walk to Disney
Summary: We enjoyed the accommodations. Had a nice large room with two queen beds. Had big bathroom with two sinks, separate room with a door for shower and toilet. But my daughter’s family got a room there and her bathroom had only 1 sink. There was no other room for the commode and shower. Very small. So ask for the larger version of these two bed rooms.   We loved the fruited ice water in the lobby. Staff was friendly and helpful. The attached pizza restaurant was tasty and convenient. Hint, order a burrito to go from them in the morning!  An important distinction about this hotel is that the reservation was cancelable and many others nearby were not.  Cheers
Manager Response: Dear 4score1957,  We greatly appreciate the feedback regarding your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are pleased that our staff and amenities left a positive impression! Our property does offer a few different styles of rooms that can be booked, including rooms with separate vanity areas or even king size beds. Our team strives to meet all of our guest requests and I hope you choose us again so that we might improve your next experience further!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: We enjoyed our stay overall. Reception staff were great, and big thumbs up for clean comprehensive laundry facilities. The room did what it needed to however shower plumbing was a bit inconsistent. If you want to base yourself near Disney this is certainly a good option. The on-site Pizza Press is overrated in my opinion but it’s ok for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear jane4546,  Thank you for your feedback! I apologize for the concern with the shower and appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are pleased that our staff, amenities and location provided a positive experience for your party! We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: My original review, posted October 2018, after a very awful experience with this hotel on our honeymoon dealt with awful management and an unfortunate situation where an item was missing from our room and neglected to be addressed by multiple members of the management team.  This company did reach out to me after my review in hopes of earning our trust again as customers and while I was extremely wary to re-try our hand at this hotel we decided to ultimately give them another chance.   We were pleasantly surprised by the new management team, we decided to keep our do not disturb sign up on the door - just in case, but did have a wonderful experience with the desk attendants during our stay. One woman in particular was extremely sweet and smiling as she assisted us with parking
Manager Response: Dear Jessica S,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your recent stay! We are extremely grateful for the second opportunity to have you stay with us and truly pleased you enjoyed it so much! We look forward to seeing you again in the future and we greatly appreciate your kind words!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: I booked this hotel through a discount hotel site ,pictures made it look quite nice .The room we were given must have been one of the oldest,on entering it had an old carpet  smell to it with dust covered screens,my allergies kicked in straight away and I found myself having to leave the room for any relief .We rang reception and explained the situation asking for another room .We were shown 3 rooms one with a balcony so I went with it ,I was able to keep the sliding door open at night for fresh air which helped me greatly.Only coffee machine in room no kettle for tea bags ,bathroom was shower over bath ,toilet and vanity very tight space .Bed was good and this room was 100 % on first .Good location to Disneyland easy walk ,good Pizza place in hotel .
Manager Response: Dear JoanneQ163,  Thank you so much for your feedback! I apologize for the challenges you encountered with your first room, our staff strives to provide the best experience possible so we will have our team address the concerns with cleanliness. I am pleased that our beds and location improved your experience. I hope you consider us again in the future, I've contacted you to provide a discounted rate!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Great hotel!!!  Everyone was so nice!  CODY WAS THE ABSOLUTE BEST!!!  We appreciate him. He was very kind & recommended some nice things for us to do.  Thank you!!! My niece & her family stayed at this wonderful hotel. So close to Disney Land.  They loved that.  We had a pizza party with them in their room. The Pizza shop at the hotel was amazing.  The pool area was beautiful & we were able to watch the Fireworks from Disney Land. Truly an amazing experience. Will be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear deboras706,  We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding our hotel and staff. Great to hear "Cody" was the best, he truly is a treasure to have with our staff. We hope to see you next time in the future.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Everything about this hotel was great!
Summary: Rooms where clean and staff very helpful. Very close to the Disneyland resort and easy access. Cody in the parking lot was great at assisting us get situated when first arriving!  We would definitely recommend this place
Manager Response: Dear Landycakes96,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We are thrilled to hear "Cody" assisted you upon your arrival. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I'd like to give a shout out to Cody and Shawn. Everytime we are there they make us feel so welcomed. They are super helpful and make your 1st contact with the hotel awesome. Kudos to the front end staff.
Manager Response: Dear Greenbiker22,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding our staff members "Cody & Shawn". We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We arrived at the Anaheim Hotel on January 13 and we were pleasantly surprised.  The 60's vibe was great!  The lobby was clean and bright and we loved the aesthetic.  Our room was spacious and the patio was delightful.  The employees were warm and friendly and Leo, the gentlemen who greeted us and saw us off when we left was a hoot!  We enjoyed to proximity to Disneyland (less than a 10 minute walk) and enjoyed the comfortable beds and quiet room.  The downside was the bathroom.  The bathrooms need to be updated.  It looks like they ran out of money and just slapped some paint on the old bathroom.  The tiles were old and worn looking and our tub had some weird epoxy on the tub that appeared to be peeling off.    Other than the bathroom, we really enjoyed our stay there.
Manager Response: Dear KirstenP84020,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Our team will look into the bathroom concerns that you mentioned to see if we can make any improvements. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We visited from dec. 25th -jan 1st (cold and scattered showers). The first three days we were having issues with hot/cold water spurts while showering. We notified front office about it after the first day and sent a maintenance guy, guy went in and checked and said that they were having issues with hot and cold water mixing in some lines but did nothing, second day notified again and they came to check the water but did nothing, third day we called and were fed up with it. Hotels are used to sleep and shower and it wasn't holding it's purpose. We just wanted a hot shower at the end of the day after walking so much. Third day comes and I was done with it. Called about midnight and told them that our water from shower was getting worse and cold water was shooting out more than
Manager Response: Dear J9020NMbrendar,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay! I apologize for the challenges with your shower and the time it took to resolve it, but we are extremely pleased that our staff improved your experience! We hope you consider us again for your next visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Nice hotel.  A solid alternative to Disneyland based hotels
Summary: My wife and I stayed at The Anaheim Hotel for one night as we visited Disneyland for two days.  Location-wise, the hotel sits very close (maybe a 5 to 7 minute walk) to the gates of Disneyland.  It is also close to the 5 Freeway.  It is off of Harbor Drive (which can get busy at times), which has a nice selection of restaurants and such.  The hotel itself worked for us.  Many may consider it basic, but it had a nice bed, good shower, plenty of storage, etc.  It wasn't too noisy.  The staff on-site were very helpful.  Even though we only stayed one night, the rate we paid allowed us to park over the two days we visited the park.  We would stay again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear 1Nikki_Black,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We are excited that our staff and property met your needs. We look forward to seeing you again and providing an even better experience!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: We recently spent 5 nights at the hotel while visiting Disneyland and California Adventure. The hotel rooms are clean and equipped with the basics. There is a Pizza Press restaurant attached to the hotel which didn’t really serve our needs over the days we were there as the menu is so limited. The best things about this hotel are the friendly staff and that it is walking distance to Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Twickes,  We greatly appreciate the feedback regarding your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! In addition to their standard options, our Pizza Press does offer a full breakfast menu each morning from 6am-10am. We are pleased to hear that our staff and location improved your visit and we hope to see you again!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Disney Tribe of 17 goes on New Years Eve vacation
Summary: The staff at The Anaheim is wonderful, extremely helpful and very friendly. I love this location for it's proximity to Disneyland, the very short walk at the end of an extremely long day in the park is fantastic. The rooms and hotel grounds are always clean. Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear BMR25,   We are extremely pleased that our staff, location and amenities provided such a great experience to ring in the new year! We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Great location and great pool! Could use some room updates but the pizza and pool make up for it. Short walk to Disney and very friendly staff. The gift shop is super convenient. I do wish it had it's own shuttle service, and or bus stop but can't beat the accommodations for the price!
Manager Response: Dear AshleyKing2020,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We are truly excited that our staff and amenities provided a great experience for your party! We hope you visit us again during your next trip!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Cute, clean, hip. Walking distance to Disneyland. Great pool, nice pizza place next door that was open late. I was so glad to find this place. I love that this is an old hotel that has been spiffed up. It has a Palm Springs vibe and it was a great value compared to some of the mega hotels in the area. It was perfect for what we needed
Manager Response: Dear 689hollyf,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your recent visit to The Anaheim Hotel! We are ecstatic that your party enjoyed everything about your stay! We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Hotel could use a major update
Summary: Although the location of The Anaheim Hotel is hard to beat (about a 7 minute walk to the entrance of either Disney park), the hotel rooms are old and in need of a major update.  The heater/air conditioner is one of those by the window and is very loud when the fan is at any setting higher than “low”. The bathroom shows sign of age although attempts have been made to try to update the facility. The bathtub and sink drainage was slow and there was a patched wall that looked questionable.   Our room was at the end of the hallway and had a frosted window that was covered by a sheer curtain. The curtain did nothing to stop the sunshine from illuminating the room every morning. It’s curious as to why the hotel didn’t use a heavier curtain like the ones used for the other windows in
Manager Response: Dear RedPanFan,  Thank you so much for your feedback! I apologize for the concerns with the A/C and sink drainage in your room and appreciate you bringing it to our attention so our team can make sure they are resolved. I am pleased to note that we are in the process of updating the drapes in a number of our rooms and hope this alleviates your concerns in that area! Again, thank you for letting us know about your stay and for giving us the opportunity to have you with us during your Disney vacation, we hope to have the chance to do so again in the future!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Great location with on-site dining/room service, gift shop & parking. Appreciated the special discounts for McDonalds (down the street).  Buildings/room are old, yet well maintained. Front desk will provide small microwave upon request.
Manager Response: Dear 89Nita,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We hope you consider us again during your next visit to Anaheim!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: This was our 2nd stay here and we love it.5 minute walk to Disneyland and surrounded by lots of places to eat.Also good if the kids get tired because its easy to walk over and nap.We will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Jeffjones32,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Stayed at the Anaheim Hotel for Christmas break. Love this hotel. So very close to Disneyland, just about 5 mins walk away. The hotel it self is amazing. The bed super soft, could use a couple different types of pillow but still great. The staff is very helpful and kind.
Manager Response: Dear alliemanda,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding your recent stay! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great location walking distance from Disneyland, comfortable beds and clean room. We got a great quiet room at the back. Price point is about right. Great pizza restaurant for some food after coming back from a long day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guide184039,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This is a weird one to write, and if it didn’t happen to me I’d have a hard time believing it. My wife thought she heard some coughing outside our room while falling asleep but figured thin walls, whatever. The next morning, I was looking outside the sliding glass door into the enclosed (no gate, high fence) courtyard area and saw what I thought was a person under a blanket. Spoiler alert, it was. We understood why someone was seeking shelter since it was raining and didn’t even say anything to the front desk until we were ready to leave for the day an hour or two later. When I told the front desk someone was sleeping on the chair outside of our room they seemed shocked and said they would take care of it right away. We were leaving for Disneyland for the day so I let them know
Manager Response: Dear dctdye,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about the challenges that may have occurred during your stay. We went over this issue with our team and we deeply apologize about the miscommunication regarding the transient in your patio as it came as a shock to us because it hasn't happened. We have informed our team to take extra precautions due to the winter season of more transients potentially on property. We would love another opportunity to accommodate you and your family next time you visit the Disney Resort. Please reach out to us at (714)772-5900 your earliest convenience so we can rectify our shortcomings from your past stay. We hope to hear from you soon!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Excellent Motel From Sue and Tony Sneesby
Summary: My husband and I arrived at the motel today and are truely greatly for the wonderful service we have received from Leo and the team at the motel. The room is spotlessly clean and quite  big we have a king size bed which is fantastic. The location is fabulous plenty of places to eat and very close to the Disney main entrance
Manager Response: Dear suesS4993NU,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel and staff! we hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Clean, walking distance to Disneyland, budget friendly
Summary: Saved literally hundreds of dollars each day by staying at this hotel instead of a Disney property! The hotel is older but in decent shape. Housekeeping took great care of us! Vernita was a rock star with our room and always the first person to greet us with a smile and "good morning!"
Manager Response: Dear toddschomer,   Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear "Vernita" was a "rock star"! We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding your past stay! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel was super convenient to accessing Disneyland! Only a 7 minute walk to the parks which was greatly appreciated at the end of the day. The hotel itself was great although we were given a room that had not been updated, however, the size of the room was impressive and the 4 of us in the room did not feel like we were squashed in. Parking was easy and cost US$15. We did eat a Pizza Press one night band while the food was fine, it was super busy in the restaurant and felt rushed to eat and leave. Laundry facilities were clean and we used them 3 times during our 5 night stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ali A,   Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding your stay and hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Leo, in concierge, has been amazing every time we have come to this hotel. He is the reason we will return. Our flight came in super early. After walking around for a while and then crashing in the lobby, he asked if he could help us and we were just exhausted. The front desk said our room wouldn’t be ready for a while. Leo helped get my young kids and I into a room within 5 mins. Not only that, but he unloaded all our bags. You have a great employee on your hands! Don’t ever let him go.
Manager Response: Dear kbrealtor360,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear "Leo" our bell captain was able to help assist you with your check in. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Large rooms, clean, close to Disneyland entrance, very friendly and helpful staff, real breakfast on site. My husband and I along with our adult son shared a 2 King bed room. It was great to have a 2 bed room where we did not have to share a Q or a double bed. Super comfortable and clean. I believe this is an old hotel that has been remodeled very well with a retro style. No complaints at all.
Manager Response: Dear Brenda G,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel with our remodeled look. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: My go to hotel for Disneyland
Summary: This was my second stay at The Anaheim Hotel for 5 nights. I must say my first stay was a bit better because our room was updated but this time we got a room which was noticeably dated and not renovated which was a bit of a downer. That being said I was still happy staying here since all we did was sleep there because we spend our days at the parks and just returned to sleep. This time we got a ground floor room but I would recommend a top floor room (if you are okay with stairs) because they are less noisy and I prefer having a balcony instead of a ground floor patio. Staff was all friendly, housekeeping did a great job. My main motivation staying here is the price and being so close to the parks so I will likely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear mmoroniz,  Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize if the room didn't seem renovated. We are going to have more rooms renovated this coming year! Great to hear our staff was friendly. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Hotel was clean and beds were comfortable.  Short walk to Disneyland.  Grounds were clean and maintained well.  Price was affordable.   Family friendly... There was a grass area set up with corn hole and a large connect for game.
