Had to pay for parking which I try not to do but that will not deter me from staying here again if the rates are within my budget.    Pizza Press onsite.. need I say more!
Manager Response: Dear cdaguiar,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Pros Good value, short walk to Disney, clean rooms, friendly staff, nice heated pool area, mini fridge in room. Cons pay for parking, no free breakfast, water temp fluctuates a lot during shower and got VERY hot a few times which is concerning with kids.  For the right price I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Melindaw238,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Our team will look into our water temperature fluctuating issue. We are truly grateful to have been your host during your trip and hope to accommodate you again in the future, nest time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Best Hotel to stay in if you’re going to Disneyland.
Summary: Nice accommodations, friendly staff. Always nice to stay at this hotel. I’m sure we’ll be returning again and receive the same friendly service. It’s a great location if you’re visiting Disneyland. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear dmdcats,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disneyland Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Hotel was nice, room clean.  The pool was exceptionally clean - whoever maintains does fantastic job, perfect clear water and no chorine smell.  The beef was with front desk at check out.  Original flight was delayed 14 hrs, so did not stay first night.  We paid in full $197 for first night, even though called when notified of delay, it was same day so understand.  When checked out saw the $5 resort/facilty fee for first night as well.  Requested they take that off since not there did not use the facility, wifi, etc. that is supposed to cover.  The woman at check out conferred with manager and took off the bill.   So left as semi- happy customers (would be happy if waived or reduced charge for night not there, but understand couldn't rent room).  My beef and why writing, was
Manager Response: Dear Bob S,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding or hotel. Our team deeply apologizes about the inconveniences you've experienced during check out regarding the resort fee. Management is looking into the situation to rectify our shortcomings. We would love another opportunity to accommodate you and your family next time you visit the Disney Resort. Please reach out to management at your earliest convenience so we may further assist you (714)772-5900. Again, we deeply apologize and hope to hear from you soon.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We were booked at another hotel and happened to walk into The Anaheim Hotel.   Candi on the front desk was incredibly helpful and got my family all set up in the Catalina Suite and nearby rooms.  Candi also helped me with our park passes.  Leroy and Chris were awesome too.   Room service was delicious.  From our room to the Disneyland gate was an 8 minute walk. (Literally across the street on a garden path).  I will absolutely stay here again.  Every six room nights you get one Free.   The staff are exceptional.  Room rates are reasonable.  Suite was beautiful other rooms were basic with great linens and very clean.   Pool, hot tub and workout room.
Manager Response: Dear Goodideaguru,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear Candi was "incredibly helpful"! Great that our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Again, we greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding "Candi" and our hotel. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We just spent 5 days within walking distance to Disneyland & California Adventure. Out flight came in way before check-in, yet the front desk was so helpful. They checked in our luggage and we spent our time walking in Downtown Disney.      We made an instant friend with Leo as we checked in. He helped us with our luggage, gave us some suggestions. He was very kind to our special needs daughter and would greet her every time we walked through the main foyer.       He was genuinely helpful and was an important factor in making our stay fantastic.    When they say “steps” from the gate they are right on. You can’t go wrong 👍.    Let thanks again, Mary E.
Manager Response: Dear maryeP4619YS,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear "Leo" was super helpful and friendly. Great that our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Location and Staff can’t be beat!
Summary: Just a quick 10 minute walk to the turnstiles. Close to several breakfast restaurants. Small fridge in room. Clean linen with soft towels. Great bar in lobby, pizza place attached to building. Safe parking lot but daily charge of $15 added to your bill. In spite of parking charge and no lobby breakfast, we would still come here again.
Manager Response: Dear Cogs,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity to the gates of Disneyland and restaurants around the area fit your travel needs.  We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel with the Pizza Press attached. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Nice older facility with lots of room amenities, 10 minute walk from the Disney parks. Disney pass holder discount, too.  Clean, well-maintained and friendly staff.  Ground floor rooms even have a private courtyard.
Manager Response: Dear HotRodDan,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: There are a lot more better hotels out there.
Summary: 1. Room card and Parking card not validated upon check in. Have to walk back to the reception under cold winter rain also leaving my 2 toddlers and husband outside the room freezing  (open air hotel 😐)  2. The second time, they only validated my parking. Could not use the card to enter our room. I have to repeat number one again. Again, toddlers, raining, winter, freezing.  3. The cherry on the cake, got back from Disneyland at 11.30pm at night , it was raining and winter, the kids were shivering and coughing and the card wasl not working again!   Have to go all the way to the reception ( while it is still raining) and to be denied the room key card because my husband does not remember my old mobile number and address ( booked through agoda where I registered with my old mobile
Manager Response: Dear anakranalan,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. We deeply apologize about the challenges you may have faced during your stay. Our team can assure you this doesn't happen quite often. When booking through third parties such as "Agoda", at times all guest information doesn't sync over into our system unfortunately so at times it can be troublesome for us and our guest and we do apologize for that as well. Our parking is at $17.55 a night after taxes and is one of the inexpensive hotels providing parking with security monitoring our hotel over night. Hotel management will be looking into all these concerns you've mentioned for alternative solutions regarding our key cards and guest information syncing over. Truly we are grateful you allowed us to be your host and hope to have another opportunity to rectify your past stay shortcomings. Please reach out to us at (714)772-5900 at your earliest convenience so we may further assist you. We hope to hear from you soon.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: My husband and I went to Disneyland without any kids! I loved how the hotel was so close to everything. The park, restaurants, drug stores, mall, theater. I was worried about the room being loud with an outside entry but it wasn’t. The beds were awesome.
Manager Response: Dear hillsanderson,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs to the parks, restaurants, and everything else close by! We hope to see you again, net time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We came into contact with some really amazing staff. The first was the woman working the concierge. Unfortunately we didn’t catch her name, but she was so friendly and even remembered us later that day (which is saying something when they’re seeing god knows how many people a day during the holidays). Second was Leo, the bellhop. We had SO much luggage because of the duration of our trip, plus 2 car seats. He was so friendly, so willing to help, fast, and full of good advice. The third person who made this hotel better than the rest was Cody. When we were able to go to our room, he took all of our bags and answered our multitude of questions. He was funny and full of conversation. Throughout our trip he greeted us like we were friends and remembered us each time. I’m truly
Manager Response: Dear KRPresto,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel as well as our staff being friendly and helpful! We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We have been staying at the hotel for many years, customer service has had its ups and downs. This year, we could sense a definite change for the best, we where treated very well. The attitudes of all the staff that we came across were pleasant and respectful. I had reservations about coming back based on a previous years treatment by front desk staff upon check in. I am very pleased with our decision to come back. We come here because we love the olympic sized pool, it’s a highlight of our trip, now there’s a poolside bar. The hot tub is a life saver after days of walking around Disney. We find the rooms comfortable and clean. House keeping is attentive and friendly. We prefer the rooms in this style rather than the sterile and cookie cutter rooms in the larger hotels and
Manager Response: Dear TeresaB1570,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience! We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I’m not sure how this place got such good reviews.  The lobby has been refurbished - it’s nice.  That is where it ends. None of the other buildings have been worked on inside or out.  There were loose tiles in the bathroom floor, stains, chips in the  sink and counter, and shoddy patches on the walls.  The furniture was chipped - all of it. The A/C is an in-window unit which they accommodated by cutting out a section of the curtain.  That means the air blows the curtain into the air and you get no privacy in the room. Considering check-in time is an hour later than every other hotel on the block, I expected a much cleaner spot.  I’ve stayed at multiple hotels in the area (we’re Disneyland annual pass holders so we go 4-6 times a year) and this was by far the worst place I’ve
Manager Response: Dear 710annep,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about the challenges you may have faced during your stay, Our team will look into the issues you mentioned so that they are addressed in a timely manner. We are truly grateful to have been your guest and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort. Please feel free to reach out at your earliest convenience at (714)772-5900 so that we may rectify your past stay. We hope to hear from you soon!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: An older hotel extremely well maintained, with small amenities beyond the norm.  Rooms were spotless, furnishings acceptable, extremely friendly staff.  Rooms are not large, but perfectly adequate, even a small courtyard for the ground floor rooms.  Food available on premises and a 10 minute walk to Disneyland Park entrance.  Very good prices makes it a great value.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Dan C,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotel close proximity fit your travel needs to the Disneyland park entrance. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Fun times at Disneyland, close to park entrance and Pizza Press next door. Rental car around corner which we used to go to local museums Lyon and Marconi to break up vacation. Used Alamo and was very pleased
Manager Response: Dear 577verac,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: How this hotel has good reviews is beyond me. Location is all it has going. We tried the hotel again hoping for a better experience.   Nope! Customer service was awful from management to front desk. Only smiles we encountered by staff was the valet or “bell hop” employees.  We arrived early, room was not ready so they held our bags. Advised we would be notified when room was ready. At 4pm we went back to see if we could get into our room. Check in, and luggage room attendant could not find our luggage. Said she would check into it right away and bring our bags ASAP. With kids in tow we were frustrated. Arrive to our room and alas our bags were there. No one documenting locations of luggage is unprofessional.  Our room was just ok. But for the price we didn’t expect luxury. Just
Manager Response: Dear wj0808,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize if your stay was below par. We assure you these issues aren't an ongoing process. Our team does have a third party company service our property routinely for any pest issues and had them come out as soon as possible to inspect the room you were given. We would love another opportunity to rectify the issues you may have had during your past stay. Please reach out to us at your earliest convenience so we may further assist you at (714)772-5900. We hope to hear from you soon.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Good clean hotel within easy walking distance to Disneyland. It had a good size pool and pizza restaurant which also had breakfast items. The hotel was also close to lots of eating options which would appeal to all ages.
Manager Response: Dear Jeannie1941,  Thank you for your feedback. We are grateful for the opportunity to have you stay with us during your recent trip to the Anaheim Resort Area! We are extremely pleased that our amenities and location made your trip more pleasant and we hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Perfect Disney proximity and GREAT hotel
Summary: Second stay and we will be back.  Front desk staff is super helpful and the security of the hotel makes you feel very safe.   Being so close to the park saves steps for time in the park :) Love having Pizza Press onsite too!
Manager Response: Dear Shana H,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We are thrilled you chose us again and that our staff and property provided such a positive experience for you! We hope to see you again the next time you visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: My best friend and I just spent a week here and had a great stay.  We were in building 300 and our room was perfect for us.  The staff were all super friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the hot tub every night (a must after hours of walking around Disneyland) and really loved the pool area; the pool is enormous! The restaurant attached to the hotel, The Pizza Press, is fantastic. We ordered pizza 3 times during our stay. The hotel is an easy 10 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland and is also within walking distance to many restaurants, drug stores and convenience stores.  I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to friends.
Manager Response: Dear slarnder,  Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay. We are extremely pleased that our staff and property provided such a wonderful experience! We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Second stay here. Big rooms for all the bags and cribs and toys that come along with Disney. Ease of check in and out was great. Will be staying here again for sure. The location is amazing and a nice short walk after long days at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear KristinB2263,  Thank you for your feedback. It's always a pleasure to hear from our returning guest. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel, we look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: My friend and I stayed here during our recent trip to Disneyland. The location was awesome. Just a quick walk to Disneyland. Lots of restaurants nearby. The hotel was clean and had a cool retro feel. My biggest complaint is that we had no hot water while staying here. We complained to the hotel staff that our shower tap was broken but we were never offered to switch rooms and nothing was ever done about it even the sink water never warmed up. I was glad to leave and finally be able to have a warm shower in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear 886tiffanya,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed our hotels close proximity to the Disneyland entrance. We deeply apologize about the issues you may have had with the shower during your stay. We assure you we take every guest issue serious. Our team will go over your feedback to address your concerns. We would love to make it up to you in the future, please reach out to us at (714)772-5900 so that we nay further assist you. We hope to hear from you.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We loved the room size. It's close to Disneyland, the staff are friendly and helpful. The onsite restaurant was one of our favorite features! The decor of the hotel had a retro feel and the music in the lobby matched the decor. Having water available in the lobby was a nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear Colleen M,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: If you are going to Disney, stay here!!
Summary: If you are going to Disney stay at this Hotel it has been updated at every level. The rooms are big with comfortable beds and all the extras. The grounds are well maintained with attention to detail. The pool is big and inviting. The staff could not be friendlier and they are very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie P,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding your past stay! We are thrilled to hear our staff was friendly and accommodating! We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: What a disappointment! As soon as I walked into our room I smelled mould/mildew and old cigarette smoke. I asked to change rooms and the new room was just as bad.  I’ve never experienced this stench in my life nor do I understand how it can happen in a hotel. Btw this is more of a very low budget motel, it’s not a hotel.  They’ve spent a lot of money on the foyer and have done something to make it smell very overpowering but have completely ignored the rooms, which is the priority.  God knows what smell they’re trying to cover up. If you’ve got asthma or any respiratory issue stay away.  I will be asking for another room tomorrow as I didn’t pay for this experience.  The smell is just gross to be honest.
Manager Response: Dear danazz9,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize if your stay wasn't up to par as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience. We will share your feedback with our team to address the issues you have mentioned. We assure you these aren't consistent issues we have. We would love another opportunity to make it up to you and your family in the future. Please give us a call at your earliest convenience so that we may further assist you at (714)782-5900. We look forward to hearing from you.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The front desk was very helpful and friendly. Clean, spacious, comfortable room. The bar and lounge area was a surprise, good selection of beer and the food was very good. We went to Disneyland and the location great, just a short walk. Rates were reasonable, especially early in the week.
Manager Response: Dear JVR89,  Thank you for  your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and helpful staff. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: First stay. A short walk to the parks, 5-7 minutes to the security area depending on traffic lights. The hotel was clean, the staff were friendly. I was pleased with my stay from Nov. 3 - 8. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear rikalr,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel and staff. We look forward to seeing you, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Wheelchair friendly, clean grounds and great staff
Summary: i’ve stayed at the Anaheim hotel dozens and dozens of times. This is where I feel safe. The grounds are kept clean and it’s very wheelchair friendly. There’s a large pool a nice bar and it is very close walking distance to Disneyland!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear musgrave1,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback. It's always great to hear from one of our regular guest! Great that you enjoy all the amenities The Anaheim Hotel has to offer along with our close proximity to Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you again!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I’m sitting in our room right now and all I can hear are the housekeeping staff LOUDLY laughing and carrying on outside our door ... it’s incredible how LOUD they are .. carts rolling by loudly over and over almost as if on purpose!  I’m going to complain abt it soon.  also the shower water was so ridiculously hot/cold/hot/cold that it almost scalded me.  The lobby smell horrible ... A combination of the worst air freshener I’ve ever smelled combined with frying onions ... we avoid the lobby altogether because the smell gives me an immediate headache.  It’s just LOUD here ... it’s like the housekeeping staff NEVER gets done ... they’re constantly in front of our door talking loudly and wheeling their carts around.  There are NO perks here... breakfast etc... u have to pay for
Manager Response: Dear Melissa H,  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to provide us feedback. Our sincere apologies about the noise level coming from our staff and the issues with the water temperature, we hope you informed our staff so we may have addressed these issues during your stay. Our team will look into your concerns to make the necessary adjustments to continue to strive to provide a first class hospitality experience. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your stay and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: the Anaheim hotel was a great place to stay and the entire staff was wonderful. They were very attentive to our needs and made sure that we had all the amenities that we needed while we were there. The pizza press served good food  and the breakfast was exceptionally good.  We would recommend this hotel as it was clean and very close to the park and had very attentive and kind staff.
Manager Response: Dear Amy P,  We greatly appreciate your feedback. We are truly pleased that our staff provided such an excellent experience during your stay! We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Excellent proximity to both Anaheim Convention Center and Disney.  Nearby fast food places were adequate for our needs.  Friendly staff and responsive.  Clean and neat room and the heat worked when needed!
Manager Response: Dear Cat J,  Thank you for your feedback. We are extremely pleased that our staff, rooms and location met your expectations! We hope to see you again in the future!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Good location near Disneyland main entrance, just a couple blocks. Good restaurants near by hotel. Pizzas on the hotel are very Nice (Not sure if the place belongs to the hotel). Wifi on the room was included and was good.
Manager Response: Dear George Z,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear that our hotels close proximity to the Disneyland entrance and restaurants close by fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again in the future, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This hotel was in close proximity to everything Anaheim has to offer in regards to conventions and theme parks. Shopping was within walking distance, and food was easily available to guests on the go.
Manager Response: Thank you Paul for taking the time to share your review with us. We are glad our property was convenient to your travel destination and enjoyed assisting you. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  In Hospitality,  Austin Russell Front Office Manager

Summary: My friends and I stayed here for our Disneyland trip. The location is ideal, its about a 7 minute walk to Disneyland and is conveniently located close nearby stores in case you forget to bring anything. The attached pizza place is also pretty good and reasonably priced. The rooms and grounds are clean and the staff was friendly. The one weird thing was the wall protrudes near the top of the shower which was inconvenient for our tall friend, but it wasn't a major deal
Manager Response: Dear Philip W,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs to the gates of Disneyland and the stores close by, We are thrilled to hear our staff was friendly. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: It’s close to the park, clean, and the pool was great. The rooms are older and run down, but the place was built in 1955 and has a cool retro feel. I liked it for the most part, but we rented 2 rooms and one was microscopic and the other was much nicer.
Manager Response: Dear Steve R,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate the kind comments. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We love staying here. It is typically our first choice as season pass holders since it is so close to the park and has a great bar and pizza place attached. We have staid over 5 nights total in 2019 and only once was there was minor hiccup where our key would not work. Besides that, we have enjoyed the amazing pool and the new pool side bar. We work remote so we typically grab our laptops and go work in Downtown Disney one day and visit the park here and there during our stay. I put this a a budget price since the prices around the area tend to be a lot more but average nightly price starts around $118. There is a great AAA discount and a great discount for season pass holders.
Manager Response: Dear CwithaSea,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel. We are thrilled that you were able to take advantage of our pool and the new bar area poolside! We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great stay at a very acomadating hotel
Summary: A great hotel with super friendly staff, comfortable clean room with a patio, nice big pool, and right across the street from the Disneyland park front gate! This was our second stay here and am looking forward to our next! Great place, great location.
Manager Response: Dear 1CHARLIE707,  Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We greatly appreciate the kind words about our staff, rooms and location. We are extremely pleased to have you with us again and we look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: If you are in an emergency, it's a survivable motel choice.
Summary: Stayed here overnight as a cheap solution to an airport layover, so in many ways it did the job it needed to do. The location is solid but other than that it's not great for a Disneyland trip if thats your intention. Here are some pros and cons to this hotel.  Pros:  - Cute lobby update and pizza place right next door. - Cost, it was cheap and we snagged it on Hotwire. - Bed was actually pretty comfortable.  Cons:  - Photos online are very flattering, rooms are pretty beat up in person. - Super thin walls and doors. - Shower has evidence of things like mold and rust. - Rooms are pretty spread out and are far away from the lobby.  Would I take a family trip or fun trip to Disneyland and stay here? Definitely not! If you are in an emergency, it's a survivable motel choice.
Manager Response: Dear Natalie M,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. We will share your feedback with our team to make the necessary adjustments moving forward. We are truly grateful to have been your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We had an excellent stay at The Anaheim Hotel.  Loved being able to sit out at the beautiful gardens with the "heat lamps!"  Love them, loved hearing the fountain and being able to watch the Disneyland fireworks from the comfort of the hotel.  We thought the Pizza Express was super convenient as a part of the hotel.  Loved the decor, the friendliness of staff, honestly, we'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Jkelly1109,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed all the amenities The Anaheim Hotel had to offer. Great that our staff was friendly. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, the Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Very nice place, walking distance to Disneyland and close to restaurants. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The pool is very nice and clean. Our room was very nice also. We really e enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear susan C,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Our 45-year high school reunion was held here in late September 2019.  Food was great & staff was so accommodating they went out of their way in helping plan & execute a great event!  A highlight was out by the pool enjoying the nearby Disneyland fireworks!
Manager Response: Dear A6669PGscottl,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear your high school reunion was great! We greatly appreciate all the kind comments.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We stay here all the time. We joined their free rewards program and after a certain amounts of free nights, you get a free night for your next trip. This location is so close for walking to the park without the high room rates. Great rates but doesn’t feel cheap, dirty or run down. It’s an amazing place. Lots of parking too
Manager Response: Dear booahh19,  Thank you for your feedback. Great that you are taking advantage of our hotels rewards program, every 6th night you accumulate, you get a free night stay among other perks! we hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Loved the location of this hotel! We went to rope drop in Disney stayed until lunch time then came back to eat, relax and swim! Only then to return to the Disney magic refreshed for another exciting session! Can’t go wrong at the Anaheim! The room was a bit tired and in need of an update but it was clean which meant a lot!!
Manager Response: Dear jumart2014,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate the kind comments. We hope to see you next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: A group of four friends shared one of the suites with bunk beds and it was the perfect sized living area for us. The room was very big, with plenty of space to accommodate us (two chairs, a small table, and a full-sized couch fronting the TV above a console). The second sleeping area was around the corner from the main bed, which offered the group a level of privacy. The bathroom area had a single, very long counter with one sink, and a separate shower/toilet room. The beds were comfortable and everybody slept well.  The hotel is spread out with separate two-story building units, so while our room was 433, it was actually on the second floor of a separate unit about 75 yards from the main building. The decor throughout the hotel was 50’s, with Frank Sinatra playing in the lobby
Manager Response: Dear Dunadan,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed one of our may suites and that our staff was friendly with each passing visit. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Wheelchair access is the greatest need. Wheel in showers great benefit. Bigger challenge was height of bed,  raising up was hard. When we first entered the room perhaps it had not been used much but it smelled mouldy or musty.  Either we grew accustomed to it or by using the shower it went away
Manager Response: Dear MarianneM1793,  Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased to hear that our handicap accessible rooms accommodated your needs. We will have our team look into the issues that you've mentioned to make the necessary adjustments. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This was our 2nd stay at The Anaheim Hotel to visit Disneyland.  We went with our kids and grandkids.  Had adjoining rooms this year, which was great.  We were across last year, which wasn't bad, but a little less secure with little ones.  We stayed in Room 721 this year, so most of my comments will be =specific= to that room.  Pros Staff is always friendly and was accommodating, from the front desk to the cleaning staff.  Always a "hello" or "good morning/afternoon".  There is a bar on premises with a nice, but limited selection of beers, with food available.  There is a Pizza Press restaurant also on premises with very little other than pizza for non-breakfast food.  They do serve breakfast, but we did not eat there.  Pizza is a build-your-own style and pretty quick.  Decent,
Manager Response: Thank you Lyle for sharing your experience with us! We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and cannot wait to welcome you back in the years to come! I will pass these concerns on your recent stay to my Chief Engineer to ensure the room receives the TLC it deserves. I am very sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. We appreciate you staying with us!  In Hospitality,  Austin Russell Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice place, good pool, close to Disneyland
Summary: Overall, this hotel is conveniently located close to Disneyland (10-15 min) walk from the main gate. The pool was very nice. The Garden Walk is 5 minutes away and this is a indoor/outdoor mall street with beautiful shops and restaurant. The Hotel is also very close to Bubba Gump, the Cheesecake Factory and a CVS
Manager Response: Thank you 131pierred131,  We value your feedback and appreciate you staying with us! We hope you will continue to stay with us next time you are in the area!  In Hospitality,  Austin Russell Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Hotel for the first time. We visit Disneyland regularly. I will definitely stay again and make this my hotel I use forever. The employees, especially LEO were so kind and helpful I will not hesitate to stay and refer The Anaheim Hotel to others.
Manager Response: Thank you JHammr for the excellent review! We are so proud in the service provided to our guests and love to hear when our guest share it! I will pass your kind comment onto Leo and the team. Thank you for staying with us!  In Hospitality,  Austin Russell Front Office Manager

Summary: Standouts where the pool with food & beverage service in the afternoon, on site affordable restaurant, super friendly/helpful staff and the location to the park. Our room was okay for the price but could definitely use some TLC from maintenance. Overall decor of the hotel is lovely mid-century design.
Manager Response: Dear 510lo,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! We appreciate you staying with us here at The Anaheim Hotel. We hope everything during your stay was to your liking. Please don't hesitate to contact the hotel if there was anything we could improve on!  In Hospitality,  Austin Russell Front Office Manager

Summary: The gentlemen working the front named Leo was very helpful, nice and had a great personality!  Pizza press right here on property with $11 awesome pizzas!  Can’t go wrong and it doesn’t break the pocket especially if you spent tons of money at Disney lol.   Great hotel and workers are friendly.  Great location walking distance to the park!  Thanks for making our stay memorable.  Aloha! 🤙🏼
Manager Response: Thank you kkhusey for sharing your feedback with us! Leo will be ecstatic to hear the positive words about his service. We hope to see you again in the near future!  In Hospitality,  Austin Russell Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel itself was great, but, the people that work there even better. They went out of their way to help you. Friendliest hotel ever. The rooms were very clean. The one negative thing was the pillows. Very lumpy. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Tracey! We are always glad to hear we could meet the standards of our guests and I will be sure to pass the compliments along! We look forward to welcoming you back!  In Hospitlaity,  Austin Russell Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Staff member Leo went above and beyond!!
Summary: My family would like to thank Leo (parking staff) on assisting us with parking and helping with my daughter who has disabilities.  It's a blessing to have staff who know their surroundings and how to help in any way possible! He truly went above and beyond!  We come on a regular basis and I truly look forward to seeing him.  Thank you Anaheim Hotel for having such a wonderful employee who greets you with a smile and is great as his job! Thank you for making our days extra-magical!
Manager Response: Thank you Pilar! I am so glad we can be there to help, especially Leo. I will be sure to share your wonderful comments and cannot wait to see you again!  In Hospitality,  Austin Russell Front Office Manager

Summary: Room definitely needs a remodel, but room was surprisingly quiet given exterior doors   Being tucked behind the GardenWalk totally blocks highway noise which I always notice in neighbor hotels.  Beds were very comfortable.  Staff friendly and helpful.  Good value and so close to park.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Relax648243,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. Great to hear that our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Be prepared to wake up during the night
Summary: Everything was great, service was great, etc. Until I woke up the second morning at 5:30am due to a bunch of banging. I thought people were slamming doors until it also happened two mornings after around the same time. It was so loud it shook the walls. The next night, I was woken up at midnight to drilling and hammering in the room next to mine. No joke, it lasted an hour. I realized the previous mornings had also been construction. I tried to wait it out thinking surely it couldn’t go on too much longer. I went out of my room at 1am to find a staff member in the room next to me. I asked if he was making all the noise and he just said “yeah, sorry, I’m done now”.  Talked to the manager about this the next day. He apologized and said they did “light maintenance” during the
Manager Response: Dear Raine S,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments. We deeply apologize about the inconvenience around 530AM regarding any maintenance work going on next to your room during your stay. Our team would love to make it up to you with a future discounted stay, please reach out to us at (714)772-5900 so we can further assist you. We hope to hear from you soon so that this issue may be rectified.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We love the early check in and being able to store our bags and having them delivered to our room so they were already there after a long day at Disneyland. It’s a very convenient walk, and the Pizza Press attached to the building is amazing!
Manager Response: Dear Dcamp928,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear we were able to accommodate you with an early check in! We are thrilled to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Hotel is in a good location, walking distance from Disney parks. The hotel provided pizza press for any late night munchies. There is a nice outside area with lights. Hotel accommodates any special life events.
Manager Response: Dear Reesa25,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed our hotels close proximity to the gates of Disneyland. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Next best place to stay outside of a Disney Resort Hotel!
Summary: My husband and I booked a 3-day Disneyland vacation and wanted to stay as close to the parks as possible so we didn't have to deal with parking, parking fees, massive crowds heading into and out of the parks, and trams. Staying at a Disney Resort hotel was our preference, and while we could've opted to stay at a Resort Hotel, we decided to take the cheaper route, save $1000 (and spend it at the parks instead), and stay at the Anaheim Hotel. We just needed a place to sleep and a hotel close enough to the parks to walk to and from.   The hotel is very conveniently located near the parks and we walked to and from each day. It's also situated in downtown Anaheim, so there's tons of restaurants to choose from if you wanted to opt for someplace outside of the Disneyland Resort. The
Manager Response: Dear pitacakes,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity to Disneyland fit your travel needs. We are thrilled to hear our staff was :extremely friendly and helpful". We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Excellent hotel for any kind of visit...but especially for Disneyland.  You are greeted at entrance...extremely courteous and helpful.  Friendly desk personnel. Rooms are big and roomy and well maintained. The pizza press is ccx excellent for any meal...including breakfast. The bar is excellent with good value.
Manager Response: Dear 696RobertL696,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! We are truly grateful to have been your host during your trip and hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This was our second stay at The Anaheim Hotel and it will always be our first choice! The hotel has been updated since our last stay in 2015. The rooms are roomy and you don't feel cramped. And being so close to Disneyland was a big plus!
Manager Response: Dear 1968tammyk,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed some of our renovations that we've gone through. We hope to continue seeing you when you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel is priced right and gives Disneyland Annual Passholders a special room rate. The hotel is located for a quick walk to the Disney Parks. Rooms were recently renovated are neat and clean. The staff are always pleasant and helpful. It's our go-to Hotel in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear C00kieM0m,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed our discounted rates for Disney Annual Pass-holders. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our staff being pleasant and helpful. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great location.  Helpful staff.  clean rooms. The landscaping and overall appearance has improved significantly.  The fitness center is small but nice.  The pizza restaurant infront is convenient and serves breakfast as well for a reasonable price
Manager Response: Dear shermantrigg,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We love staying here - the staff is friendly and helpful, the ambiance is great, and proximity to Disneyland is awesome!  Our room was spacious and comfortable, the pool was fantastic (with poolside drinks & food available).  We have stayed at a lot of hotels near Disneyland and this is by far our favorite and our "go-to" hotel when going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Chrissy R,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Had a rough start with room mix up but Leo helped so much and made it much better. He helped put us at ease after a room mix up.   We will continue to come here and can't say enough about Leo and the customer service. So friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Destination591973,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that "Leo" was able to assist you with any inconvenience you may have had upon check in.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We loved The Anaheim Hotel! Stayed here for 6 nights while visiting Disneyland for 5 days! I have to say the walk to and from the park was so easy! You are literally right there! We had two king beds in our room close to the amazing pool and it was perfect! We would walk to the hotel in the middle of the day to relax by the pool for a couple of hours then walk back to Disneyland! The Pizza Press was super yummy and we all enjoyed it pool side! The bar was awesome and we loved the whole atmosphere/music! We’ve stayed at a lot of the hotels across the street from Disneyland and this is our favorite!
Manager Response: Dear Katie S,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We had two rooms on the 2nd floor with a fireworks views.  Rooms were a good size, had a fridge, beds were comfy.  Having a balcony was a great and the fire works - on the Friday night were awesome. Pool and spa were clean with plenty of seating.  Hotel is super close to Disneyland, shops and restaurants - it was really handy being able to walk back and forth to the parks during the day.
Manager Response: Dear kdl5117,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Nice hotel - walking distance to Disneyland!
Summary: Overall a great walking distance place to stay near Disneyland! They did charge and extra $10 per night for a crib which I thought was lame but it was a nice room with a large vanity for all of our stuff, it had a mini fridge for all of the sacks we packed which was nice.
Manager Response: Dear Deneen K,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Clean, fun staff, pizza press on site. Pool is huge and always clean. New items such as corn hole have been added. Walk across to Disney. Safe parking lot. We have been coming to the property for over 30 years.
Manager Response: Dear HailtheBruins,  Thank you so much for your kind words! We are extremely grateful to have had the opportunity to host your party during your visit to Anaheim. We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel was offered as a “Good Neighbor” hotel through the Disneyland Website. We stayed 3 nights from September 19, 2019 through September 22, 2019. The hotel is about a block (0.5 mi) away from Disneyland which made it easy to push a stroller from the hotel room into Disneyland and back. We had room 516. The room was ground level, had 2 queens, a mini fridge, desk, bath and shower combo, huge TV, and a cute patio with a table and lounge chair.    Even though the trip was about going to Disneyland, the hotel was great! My favorite part of the trip was swimming in the pool and sipping a beer (TAPS Red) during happy hour. My husband got sick on the third day so instead of going back to the park, I took my girls down to the Pizza Press. I ordered the Herald and it was
Manager Response: Dear MotherKiser,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are ecstatic that your party enjoyed many of our amenities and that our staff made it a better experience! The Pizza Press is one of my favorite places to eat and I'm happy you enjoyed it as well. We hope you consider us again during your next Anaheim Resort area visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: We stay at this resort nearly every time we go to Disneyland, which is about four times a year.  Very nice that they don't charge people with handicap plates and placards to park, something other hotels don't do.
Manager Response: Dear sray55,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We are truly pleased that these considerations left such a positive impression during your past visits! We look forward to seeing you again!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: We continue to return to the Anaheim Hotel because of the great staff and location of the hotel.  The moment you get there, you are greeting and helped by the outside parking and bell staff.  Leo and his staff are fantastic.  Then easy check in.  Rooms are great!  All the bartenders are wonderful, ask for Sabrina, Joseph or AJ. Can't get any better on location, across the street from park entrance.   Makes for a magical trip!
Manager Response: Dear Cindy M,  Thank you so much for your kind words! We are extremely pleased that Leo and the Front Room Lounge staff provided such a positive experience for you! We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Best vibe around. Design and atmosphere is tops. Very clean place. Every employee was attentive and friendly. Really felt as if they were there for the guests, and actually wanted to be. Place felt immediately mellow, and very vacation-like. You gotta love the older styles. If you're into tiki or the rat pack days, you'll dig this place.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony E,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We are extremely pleased that our atmosphere and staff improved your experience! We hope you consider us again in the future!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: The rooms are large, TVs are massive, you get a patio. The staff are extremely friendly and welcoming. The pool is huge and the location is ideal for the premium vacation in Anaheim. This is truly the ideal place to stay if you plan to stay close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear kylebiscoe1995,  Thank you for letting us know about your stay! We are truly grateful for your kind words about our staff and property. We hope to see you again during your next visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Both the property and it's people were fabulous! The list of all the convenient amenities provided by The Anaheim Hotel is long. It starts with it's large, open area classy lobby, the Olympic size swimming pool, the well-landscaped areas surrounding the two-story buildings with patio and deck rooms for starters.. Just a 5 - 8 min. Jimmy the cricket hop to Disneyland gate depending on if you're at the beginning or the end of your trip. Special thanks to Concierge Candy for being so helpful:) You're leaving on vacation to get out of the “CAGE”!  Do yourself a favor and DO NOT go back into another cage. Just look at the satellite image on Harbor blvd from Google maps with all the other hotels compared to this one and you'll see what I'm talking about. Good luck and God-bless!
Manager Response: Dear fox83164,  Thank you so much for all your kind words! We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed our facilities, amenities, location and our staff! I also enjoy the open layout of the property and hope to see you again the next time you visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel is so close to the park, it is affordable if were planning on staying that close, not cheap but par for that area.  The rooms and style of the hotel is very cute.  I've never used the pool but it's really big and I see lots of people there.  The staff is very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear butterflyan79,  We greatly appreciate your feedback! We are so pleased that our location, style and staff provided such a positive experience during your stay! We hope you consider us again in the future!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: As a family we loved our 5 night stay here. The room was spacious and clean. Directly across the road from Disneyland made it so easy to walk over in the morning, come back for a rest and walk back again for some more fun. All the staff were very friendly and helpful if you needed anything. Would recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Jade G,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay! We are extremely grateful for your kind words about our staff and location, as well as your recommendation! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Our "Quick trip to Disney with our 5 year old granddaughter!
Summary: We arrived late at night so it would have been nice to have the air conditioning on already.  Great location!  Clean hotel and friendly staff!  It wasn't too expensive and just 2 blocks from Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Dear Annette F,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed our hotels close proximity. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our hotel and friendly staff. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Retro vibes and close to Disneyland
Summary: It took us 12 min with 7 kids in 3 strollers to walk from our room to the security checkpoint at Disneyland. Probably could’ve been faster without all the kids. Our room was clean and looks like it had been recently remodeled. We used the “yard” area of our room for sitting to have dinner the first night which wasn’t perfect. The shower couldn’t stay at a good temp so I’m guessing the fixtures are outdated but other than that everything was great, we’ll definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie R,  Thank you for your feedback. Our team will go over the shower temperature to make sure everything is working properly. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We stayed here during our Disneyland visit. Its perfectly located, within walking distance to Disney and restaurants. Staff and management is very good, tentative and informative. We arrived earlier, reception was understanding and asked to leave our luggage with them for a short while while they try to get our room prepared early. We had lunch and by the time we came back we were able to enter our room early then asked originally. All in all very good hotel, but keep in mind the price and that their rooms are little outdated.  We will be back definitely.
Manager Response: Dear GlamTraveler85,  thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We are thrilled to hear our staff was attentive and informative with any questions you may have had. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: It’s a 3 Star hotel with 5 star service
Summary: This is our second year staying at The Anaheim Hotel for our Disneyland vacation.  The Pros of the hotel.   Close to the park. Great staff. Front desk peeps were super nice. We stayed in room 434 for 8 nights. Whoever was cleaning our room was very kind and amazing. In fact, one day we left our safe open by accident with all of our passports and over $2000 in cash and nothing was touched. Everyone standing at the front door was so friendly, Leo always made us smile. Pizza Press has great food. We used the laundry facilities a couple of times. Made coming home easier to be able to pack clean clothes. Pool is large and clean. We love the 2 king beds.   Cons of the hotel.  Other reviewers are right, although the rooms are renovated, it’s a bit of a patch job reno. The bathrooms do
Manager Response: Dear Rachele H,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. Are team continues to make improvements to The Anaheim Hotel and your feedback does help us with that. We do provide complimentary waters to our reward program members and signing up is at no extra cost with every 6 night accumulated you get a free night Stay. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Staff friendly and helpful. Beds extremely comfortable. Very clean. Close to the parks. Would stay there again. Internet could be a little stronger. Really nice pool.  Attached restaurant, Pizza Press, unique and great food.
Manager Response: Dear KJR520,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We purchased our room at The Anaheim Hotel with our package to Disneyland Resort. The pictures gave the impression of a very neat, retro style hotel and the price was highly affordable. Which all drew us in. And yes, the Lobby, pool, lounge and outside lounge are very retro kitch.  However, once past those areas the lodging is not kept up and the buildings look worn down. Our room was not very clean and smelled odd. The bathroom was extremely small. But, the absolute worst of this stay was the cockroaches. They were everywhere outside and there were some in our room. Had I not dropped my bottle lid we would've never known that there were dead roaches under our bed. We did report this to staff and were comped/refunded our parking and housekeeping was supposed to deep clean our
Manager Response: Dear LeyahBrim,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about the the inconveniences you may have experienced during your stay. We assure you we make all guest issues a high priority. Our team will go over your feedback to ensure this issue doesn't happen again. We would love another opportunity to rectify your past stay, please reach out to hotel management at (714)772-5900 so we may further assist you. We hope to hear from you soon.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Leo, parking & luggage help, is the best! Friendly, fun, & professional with attention to our every need. I'm sure he'll make our stay even more fun.  Ask for Leo he is the best! We love our room, it is spacious ,as is the bathroom.
Manager Response: Dear Linda R,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled about all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff, especially Leo as he is truly a treasure. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Place is ok, it was clean and the staff was friendly... I didn't have any problems with noise... It's a decent place to stay... :-) I didn't get time to taste the pizza next door...but I'm sure I'll be back soon.
Manager Response: Dear ElvaF6,  Thank you for your feedback. We apologize if we didn't exceed your expectations, we would love more feedback so we can address any issues you may have had. Great to hear our staff was friendly. We hope to exceed your expectations next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The room was very clean and spacious. The amenities were good. I like the coffee pot. The beds are comfortable. Air conditioner works great. All the employees are friendly. They all say hi. The parking lot is big. Easy parking.
Manager Response: Dear Mike,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at The Anaheim Hotel. Great to hear our employees were friendly as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We went there to stay for Disneyland for a birthday trip. Hotel accommodations were clean. Luxurious, accommodating packages that were sent to the hotel and help with Disney tickets. About a block and a half from the entrance of Disney.
Manager Response: Dear MCCOOEY65,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear you chose The Anaheim Hotel during your birthday trip! It's always great to hear our hotels close proximity fits our guest needs. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort! Again, Happy birthday!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: A great hotel in a great location. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and really liked the Pizza Press, bar in the lobby and the great choice of beers. The staff were really helpful and would definitely return and recommend.
Manager Response: Dear ndb1962,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We are thrilled about all the kind comments and our helpful staff. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Close to all attractions, very pleasurable, rooms were clean, water was hot in the shower, and parking was close> wee were able to walk to breakfast each morning, and then on to our daily adventure. Very satisfied with the results.
Manager Response: Dear David A,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are extremely pleased that our location and facilities improved your experience! We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Pleasantly surprised with this hotel. Ample size room, nice big bathroom area- shower/toilet separate from large double sink area with lots of counter space. Proper sized queen beds so teen kids could share a bed without fighting. 10 min walk to main gates @ Disneyland/California Adventure. Nice big pool and hot tub to soak your aching legs after long days at the park. Can see the fireworks from the pool area too. Paid parking, but we dropped off our car as we didn’t need one while staying. Pizza Press delicious. Super cheap and delicious Mexican just down the street- Sabrosada. Also close to a 7-11, liquor store and lots of other restaurants. Friendly staff. Clean. Liked the retro vibe of this renovated hotel. Thanks Anaheim Hotel- we will be back!
Manager Response: Dear TravelinPatricks,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed the comfort of our spacious rooms along with all the amenities we have to offer. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Was a quick walk from hotel to front gate of Disneyland. Small convenience store onsite well stocked and had discounted pins- nice plus. Pool was large, clean. There was onsite laundry facility. Very nice overall, plan to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Missclaus,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity to the gates of Disney land fit your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: First -- let me say we have been big fans of The Anaheim Hotel -- we come a couple times per year, and have stayed there the past 3 years.  We previously loved the Annabella and when it was closed down, The Anaheim Hotel became our back up.  It's an excellent location -- just a few hundred yards from the gate!   It has a swanky cool theme, and the pool has been improved with a tiny bar for refreshment.  It's an old hotel, with updates.  The rooms we've had are a bit hit & miss with updates, but always clean and serviceable, and fresh.    This past visit though we were really disappointed and wondered if there is a new manager -- or new practices somehow?  We were put into a room that was frigidly cold and damp -- it was actually mildew, you could smell it.  The room was in the
Manager Response: Dear Kelli K,   Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about your past stay not exceeding your expectations. We assure you we take all guest issues  serious and will have our team look into your feedback to address it. Our property gets serviced routinely by a third party company to avoid any pesticides. We would love another opportunity to make it up to you in the future, please reach out to management at your earliest convenience at (714)772-5900 so that we can rectify the situation. We hope to hear from you soon.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Charming retro hotel at Disneyland gate
Summary: We just loved this hotel.  The decor was very 50s/60s retro with music to match at the pool.   The pool is 5 times the size of usual hotel pools.  With 5 lap lanes. And a pool bar with good margaritas.   Great place to break up a 16 hour Disneyland day...10 minute walk to disney security.  Really closer than the Disneyland hotel at other entrance. Extensive grounds. All rooms are well off the road and not on top of parking lot. A little (reasonably priced) oasis in Anaheim.  Rooms are modest...but great balconies or patios.
Manager Response: Dear hilaryus2016,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear you loved The Anaheim Hotel! We appreciate all the kind comments regarding your previous stay. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The rooms were clean, staff was great, and we love the location. Comfortable rooms and great facilities! We loved the pool! Staff was amazing! We loved the fact the hotel is just accross the street from Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Suus L,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate the kind comments regarding our hotels cleanliness and staff. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We were here before in 2015 (other name and staff). We love the new interior an colors. We had a pleasant stay. Perfect location for Disneyland and other sighseeing. We loved the pool! Rooms were cleaned every day!
Manager Response: Dear Suuslaban,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear you've enjoyed our renovations! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The location was perfect for visiting the theme parks, as well as being next door to the garden walk. The room was bigger and better than I expected, and the bed and pillows were excellent. The staff was friendly. I didn't find the pizza to be as wonderful as everyone seems to think it is, I thought it was mediocre but who cares? Lots of great restaurants in the area
Manager Response: Dear AlanK1470,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity to the parks and garden walk fit your travel needs. We appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel rooms and friendly staff. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Classy Retro Hotel Steps from Disneyland
Summary: In past Disney visits we have stayed at the Stanford Inn down Harbor but this trip I really wanted to be closer to Disneyland so we didn't have to deal with the bus ride. I hummed and hawed between the Anaheim Hotel and the Del Sol Inn and eventually chose the Anaheim because it looked nicer (based on pics and reviews) and it had King rooms available for our stay. I was initially disappointed that it didn't come with free breakfast (which Stanford Inn does and Del Sol I believe also did) but honestly I think it was better for us - instead of wasting a bunch of time with a sit down breakfast, we had a quick breakfast in the room and got an early start in the park. Next time I will bring better breakfast snacks though (like muffins).  We arrived at about 8pm and check in was
Manager Response: Dear Carolinedeacondes,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear such kind comments regarding The Anaheim Hotel. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Very nice. Great location. Worth a stay.
Summary: Check in was great. Lobby is retro 1960s and is clean and cool. When I was walking down the hall to my room a man laying out the outside doormats greeted me and thanked me for staying with them.  A small but nice gesture.   Room is nice. Choose one without a patio - they’re a bit bigger.
Manager Response: Dear randallblaum,  Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I am pleased to hear that our staff made your trip more more pleasant and that you enjoyed our decor! We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location.
Summary: We stayed for four nights and were extremely happy with the hotel, services, food and location. The food served in the bar and Pizza Press was really good and came with a great selection of beers. All staff were pleasant and helpful. We’d definitely use again on our next trip to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear MissHavishamstearoom,  We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I am truly pleased that our staff, amenities and food left such a positive impression! We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: I was so very impressed by the customer service I received at this establishment, Terrance is absolutely amazing, a shining example of what great customer service should be. If you want a place that has great customer service and located close to Disneyland might I suggest booking your self into the Anaheim Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear John H,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel. We are extremely pleased that Terrence provided you with such a positive experience and exceeded your expectations! We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Will remember for future vacations. Clean, friendly staff, and walking distance to the Anaheim expo and Disneyland. Pizza restaurant was attached to the hotel. Pizza was great. Very similar to fired pie. FYI, you can order half pizzas. Bar within hotel for drinks.
Manager Response: Dear OnAir768899,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are extremely pleased that our staff, property and location were able to meet your expectations. The Pizza Press is fantastic and also has an excellent breakfast menu in the mornings!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Great value for a great hotel
Summary: The Disneyland hotels were all booked so my wife and I stayed off property at the Anaheim Hotel. We did not know what to expect since it was a very good value and so close to the parks but we decided to try it anyway. What a suprise this property is just so cool. The Mid Century vibe is just great. The staff was great, helpful and friendly. The grounds were very beautiful and we felt like we were taken back to the 50’s and 60’s. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable. Property was very well taken care of. The pool was amazing, very large and went from 3’ to 11’ deep. Bathroom was a little small but very clean. While our room did not have a Mid Century vibe it still was very clean and I think if it was all Mid Century rooms the price would be double or
Manager Response: Dear Nickylv,  Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are extremely pleased that your party had such an excellent experience and that our staff and amenities were able to exceed your expectations! We hope to see you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: very nice hotel  very near to disneyland entrance, 4-5 minutes walk to disney  high value to paid price very clean room nice swimming pool great pizza restaurant highly recommended for family looking to stay to near to disney without paying very high rate
Manager Response: Dear HMSabry,  We greatly appreciate your feedback for The Anaheim Hotel! We are truly pleased our property was able to meet or exceed your expectations! We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Super Convenient to Disneyland & the Convention Center
Summary: Have stayed here many times, the most recent being for the Disney Expo. Clean, comfortable and a very short walk to the Disneyland resort and the Anaheim Convention Center. Also offers a room discount for annual passholders, which I am. Check in was easy and the folks at the front desk are friendly.  Great large pool after a long day at the park.   While not luxury, the rooms are spacious and well kept. They fixed my only complaint which was a lack of shower mats, so overall, it's a great place and good value.
Manager Response: Dear ktfaye,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your recent stay! We are extremely pleased that your party enjoyed our location and amenities and that our staff was able to improve the experience. We hope to see you again the next time you visit The Anaheim Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Leo was amazing!!! As soon as we drove up he greeted us and helped us find parking. He was Very helpful and has exceptional customer service. He went above and beyond to help us find a missing item! This man deserves a raise!!!! Leo you rock!!
Manager Response: Dear stephdizzle,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that "Leo" went above and beyond providing exceptional customer service! We will surely praise his efforts. We hope to see you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, Robert Flores

Summary: The rooms were very clean. It's only a short walk to the Disneyland entrance. The staff were very friendly, helpful and informative. And the price was great. I would go here again whenever in the area.
Manager Response: Dear myfamily8-2019,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We are thrilled to hear our team was friendly and helpful. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, Robert Flores

Summary: It’s our go to place to stay when going to Disneyland. Comfortable rooms, we had a ground floor patio room this time that we enjoyed. Nice grounds, friendly staff. Easy walk to the park entrance. Love the pizza place connected to lobby. Great pool area for those mid day breaks.
Manager Response: Dear Sue M,  We greatly appreciate the feedback regarding your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are extremely pleased that our amenities and staff were able to make this trip memorable! We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort area!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management
