Steve had worked there for many years and we were happily surprised to see him now working at The Anaheim hotel. Steve, very kindly, spoke to the gentleman checking us in and we received a free room upgrade!   Shout out to all of these staff (reception, bar, cleaners, Pizza Press) who took the time to say hello and ask how we are each and every day. It felt like coming home at the end of each day and we cannot commend them more on their customer service.  During our 3 weeks we were going from
Manager Response: Dear GemmapageAU,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Steve is truly a treasure to have with our team. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your stay and hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We stayed here because it was close to the park, easily within walking distance, and reasonable priced.  We did not try the restaurant as we ate elsewhere, but the hotel was nice.  The rooms seemed a bit dated and the electrical outlets were scarce.  Overall it was clean and the staff were helpful.  We checked bags in storage when we arrived and before we left.  The concierge desk also booked tickets and shuttle to Universal studio.  All in all, not a bad stay.
Manager Response: Dear Gary B,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I definitely recommend the Pizza Press if you want a great breakfast or excellent pizza. We are extremely pleased that everyone enjoyed the visit and we hope you consider us again for your next trip to Anaheim!   Best Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Super cute lobby, like Hotel Valley Ho in Scottsdale with the retro 60s vibe. Room basic, but clean. Fine enough for what we needed and a short walk to main gate. This is my 5th hotel stay on Harbor Dr. (we like the gate access to Disneyland) and is stay here again if the price is right again. Pool looked nice. One of the better of the Harbor hotel strip. Parking is $15 a car per night. There are mini fridges in the room... nice.
Manager Response: Dear Lauren H,  We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your recent visit to The Anaheim Hotel! I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and we would love to hear from you to see how we can improve and earn your recommendation for a return visit!  Best Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: On the positive side the staff is very nice and I feel like we met them all. The hotel tries to shoot for a retro chic vibe. The small bar area and lounge are nice and they have a good selection of micro brews. You are very close to Disneyland. It is an easy walk.  The negative. We had a remodeled twin king room. It is very worn and had a lot of issues. It was a warm afternoon and we turned on the ac to get the heat out of the room. It blew room air. After giving it a fair chance, an hour, we called down to the front desk. They quickly sent someone up. He said the valve that allowed the chilled water was closed. He opened it and it worked fine. Later that evening, when we returned from Disneyland, we turned on the heat. It only blew cold air?  I guess it’s one or the other?  We
Manager Response: Dear LoveEurope6,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are extremely pleased that our staff made your experience more enjoyable. I sincerely apologize for the challenges you encountered during your visit with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback and will have these concerns regarding the safe and room temperature addressed immediately.   We are grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Best Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: The place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: I thought I was staying at Worldmark Wyndham because of a time share presentation agreement and when I went to checkin they sent me to The Anaheim Hotel. Best decision ever. Right across the street from both parks. Convenient parking. Amazing staff. They were friendly and helpful. I will definitely stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Safari66550988472,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: #1 thing: The proximity to Dland! It's across the street (you can see Guardians of the Galaxy across the street- so a hop, skip, and jump to the gate.    #2 thing: Parking is easy!    #1 bad:  Rooms are small!    4 of us- cramped in the 2 double bed room.   Maybe there are bigger rooms?!    I will probably try another hotel even closer next time, like next to IHOP.
Manager Response: Dear Ninja_Mom_Hacks,  We greatly appreciate your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We deeply apologize if our double bed room didn't fit your needs. We do have larger size rooms depending on availability, we hope you asked our front desk team so we could have address your issue. We hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.   Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Anaheim Hotel
Summary: Efficient, friendly service and our rooms were ready when we checked in at 9:00 am.  Book directly through the hotel for the best value.  They also gave us adjoining rooms even though we did not ask for that until check-in.  The bar in the lobby is great as is the pizza restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear 766bobf,  Thank you for your feedback, Great to hear our front desk team were able to accommodate an early check in! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: The biggest benefit of this hotel is the proximity to Disneyland. We just had to cross the main street and the side street then walk half a block. It just took about 10 minutes to get to Disney security.   The lobby is nice and bright. There is a bar in the lobby and a pizza place attached that are very convenient. The rooms are older and have not been renovated in a while. The furniture is showing some where as well as the paint and carpet. The bathroom has a large double sink vanity with a separate toilet and shower. There is refrigerator and microwave in the TV cabinet.   The main benefit of this hotel is the proximity to Disneyland. It made it easy to go to the room to rest for a little bit during a busy Disney day. The hotel was also clean.
Manager Response: Dear DeniseK45,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your stay. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great experience. Huge rooms. Beds were comfortable. Very close to Disney.  Lots of parking space, especially in comparison to neighboring hotels. They let us check in early at no charge. I even heard them over the walkie-talkie ask for a maid service to put a rush on our room so that we didn’t have to wait long. Remodel looks great!!
Manager Response: Dear Explorer54454755831,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel. Great to hear our staff was able to accommodate an early check in at no extra charge. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort Area.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: No hot water, staff not helpful, manager blew us off
Summary: When we arrived at the hotel there was no hot water in our room. We complained to the front desk and was told it could be fixed. Next day no hot water and complained again via the phone to the front desk and was told they would fix it. a third day with no hot water we complained again, to be told they had no record of us complaining before.   Send a workman who looked at it for a half hour, then said he had to go away as it was the end of his shift and a replacement would be sent. No one came, when we came back to our room at almost 4pm, no fix and now the room wasn't cleaned. So another complaint at check out. We were told the manager (Austin) would call us to discuss how to resolve it. No call, and when I checked he went home for the day!!!  Location great, but what's the
Manager Response: Dear sanfranscot,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I sincerely apologize for the challenges you encountered during your visit with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback and will have these concerns regarding the water and lack of communication investigated. We would love the opportunity to improve your experience with us, please let us know how we can earn another opportunity to provide a fantastic memory or rectify this past experience!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Loved this retro remodeled stay which was right across the main gate from Disneyland. The rooms are in separate pods with outdoor walkways and nice plants so that you feel privacy and quiet. Our room even had a private outdoor patio.
Manager Response: Dear Nomad32856012134,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding our hotel. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: My family loves this hotel and we will continue to stay at this property every time we come to Disneyland.  The pool is great, the property is very cute and well-kept, the staff is awesome from the front desk to the bartenders to the restaurant staff and even the cleaning and maintenance folks are friendly.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip46539439675,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We greatly appreciate your kind words about our property and staff. We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed your visit and we look forward to seeing you again during your next Disneyland trip!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel worked out perfectly due to the close proximity to Disneyland!!!  We had our 3 year old with us, and we brought her stroller... she had the best time and allowed for us to walk to the gates!  The people were incredibly friendly and the pizza joint attached to the hotel was so yummy.  They served good breakfast and great pizza!    We loved the atmosphere, a hotel almost stuck in the 50’s.  The pool was great, and added huge value for our 3 year old.  We had a private patio that my wife and I had drinks and played cards on while our little one slept.    Our only negative feedback, was the air conditioner was placed so close to the ground and blocked by the bed.
Manager Response: Dear Chrisleitch21,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: A little paint and retro furniture not quite enough.
Summary: Our accommodations for a couple of our previous trips to Disneyland landed us at the Annabella Hotel, a great place for families with clean, big rooms and easy access to the park.   I went to book the Annabella only to find out it had closed in 2017.  The website noted they had purchased the Anaheim Hotel and spent 8 Million on renovations.  It was easier access to the park so we gave it a shot.    The staff is extremely nice and helpful and although the main lobby lighting was more like the inside of Wal-Mart there was a decent bar.     This is where the positives end.   The "Renovations" seem to have been confined to the lobby as the rooms were extremely lacking.   Newish furniture did appear to have been installed but the aside from some new paint and carpet the
Manager Response: Dear Anthony P,  We sincerely apologize for your experience at our hotel. We value guest feedback as it gives us the opportunity to improve the service and facilities that we provide. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding our staff.  We hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort, please contact our management staff should you decide to return in the future.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I stayed here with two small children in October and had I not prepaid the room I would have moved us! The website and photos are very misleading and make the hotel look inviting and large. I paid for a "park view", meaning Disneyland park and expecting to be on a high floor overlooking the park, which was across the street. We got to the hotel and checked in, walked to our outdoor room on the second floor of a MOTEL and could not get the door to open. I had to have two small, tired children follow me back down to the front desk where I was told that you have to jiggle the handle of the door and lift up on it to get it to open. Why they didn't tell me that to begin with I don't know.  The "park view" room that I had booked had a small lanai facing another wing of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Amy K,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about the issues you may have had throughout your stay. Several of our rooms do get a Disney view and on select nights when Disney displays fireworks. We will have our team look into the door issues to make sure it is addressed. Truly we are grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This place has bed bugs need I say more? Also the hotel was not helpful at all. Crappy place and now I can’t use half my stuff because of bed bugs. Do not stay here at all. It’s a terrible place full of bed bugs. Don’t stay in room 221 that’s where the bugs were and don’t expect any help from the hotel to deal with the problem.
Manager Response: Dear T B,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize about any issues you may have had. We assure you that we get our property serviced routinely by a third party to avoid any pesticides. Certainly we take this very seriously and will follow up with our team to look into this matter to assure you it is addressed. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We've been to Anaheim several times, this was the best stay to date.  Had a great nights sleep, the room was large (not overly crowded) and clean.  I loved that the gym was open 24 hours, the other hotels we've stayed at had not gym or specific hours that never worked with my schedule.  Great lounge areas and game areas too.  My family and I really enjoyed our stay, we've already booked our rooms at this hotel for our next trip there.
Manager Response: Dear Pioneer66708043928,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are glad the hours for some of our property amenities, such as the gym, made your stay more pleasant and convenient! We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed your visit and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Excellent value hotel close to Convention Center and Disney
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights whilst attending the NAMM show. The hotel is in walking distance on the Conference Center and Disney and is great value for money. This hotel is by no means luxury but it is a very pleasant place to stay with clean rooms, comfortable beds and a good location. There is a small bar area plus the pizza press restaurant which is well worth a visit. Breakfast is also available which we found to be good value for money.The pool area is very nice and clean with plenty of seating and sun beds. In all this was a perfect location for us, we weren’t going to be spending much time at the hotel so weren’t looking to spend a huge amount so this place was perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Gillian C,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! We are excited to hear that everyone enjoyed our location, amenities and value! We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed the visit and we hope you consider us for your next Disney or Anaheim Convention trip!   Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: We loved this hotel. It is so close to Disneyland. There a couple places close by to eat and very close to a Walgreen's.  The hotel itself was clean and nice. The rooms were an okay size. They have a large nice pool that we enjoyed. The staff were all very nice and friendly.  Only thing is that since it is so close to the parks you hear the fireworks each night. We were traveling with a toddler and the fireworks woke her up each night.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda454,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed our hotels close proximity to the parks, restaurants and convenient stores! We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding our staff. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Comfy beds which are a must, older hotel but well cared for.  Great location, close to Disneyland, lots of food options and Pizza Press is on sight.  When we can this is our go too, but as with all things in near Disney the prices fluctuate to be flexible on your dates. .
Manager Response: Dear Stay44903885132,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs to the park and several options for food as well. We are grateful you allowed us to be your host and hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Our first visit to the Anaheim Hotel last fall was just fantastic!  I led a group of Disneyland Arts Performers and their families for a long weekend stay in October, and we were so pleased with everything here.  Our accommodations were clean and comfortable, our check-ins and outs were handled professionally, and the location is ideal for the park. There is a fast food pick-up area, which we often used as we were "on the run", but the connected pizza place was also a hit for us.   I cannot say enough about Roxanne, the Senior Group Sales Manager for the hotel.  We had known her from her previous hotel, and had such respect for her services, that we followed her to the Anaheim!  It takes quite a bit of coordination to travel with a group, and Roxanne has always made it so easy
Manager Response: Dear Julie S,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding out hotel and staff, especially "Roxanne" as she is truly a treasure to have with us. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Opposite Disney, Big Rooms, Plenty of Parking
Summary: Stayed there for  nights .This is a great hotel! We have visited Disney twice and this hotel is great because it is right across the entrance which is very important because at the end of a disney day, noone has any strength to walk any further back to their hotels, especially during peak seasons when Disney stays open till  midnight. Also the hotel sits right beside Ihop and Macs, great place for snacks and meals. Their rooms are huge and clean. It is not a brand new hotel but they have done some refurbishment and upgrading. What I do think they could improve on is to have free parking for hotel guests. We were taken by surprise that we had to pay $12 extras to pay everyday, which I think they could have given it free to staying guests and charge people who dont stay in the
Manager Response: Greetings Singapoorean,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel!  We are truly excited that our location and updates were able to make your stay more pleasant and that our staff was able to quickly resolve your concern. We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed your visit and we hope you consider us for your next Disney trip!   Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: My family frequents this hotel while visiting Disneyland. The grounds are clean and I love the modern style of the lobby. We had the pleasure of meeting Leo, one of the car attendants out front. He was polite, professional, and efficient! He is ALWAYS very friendly and helpful every time we go to the hotel!! Definitely will keep coming back.
Manager Response: Greetings RhiB86,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel!  We agree that Leo is fantastic and we greatly appreciate your kind words. We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed your visit and we look forward to seeing you again during your next Disney trip!   Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: We love this hotel but the service here is exceptional. I have stayed at this hotel three times. In October, my boyfriend had a broken ankle was using a knee scooter. Unfortunately, the knee scooter brake broke because a screw came loose. Leo, the man who was kind enough to check our bags, searched high and low to find screw man that fit the scooter and even went out to his own car! He is so friendly and personable and truly made our trip extra special by his act of service! Thanks Leo!!
Manager Response: Dear Sarah Jane C,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear all the kind comments regarding our staff, especially "Leo" as he is truly a treasure to have part of our team. We hope yo see you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We stayed 4 nights. Staff was friendly and helpful. Beds were very comfortable. Grounds were clean. Happy hour in bar lounge was great. Very friendly service and pizza was delicious. Walking distance to park. Over all great experience.
Manager Response: Dear Angiea424,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our staff was friendly and helpful as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience! We are thrilled that our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: A Surprisingly Quiet Delight VERY close to Disneyland Main Gate
Summary: We had stayed at the Anabella for year until they tore it down. I'm not sure if there's a relationship between these two properties but we seemed to end up here and it looked okay in the pictures so we booked. VERY affordable.  I can be a little hard on hotels and I've read reviews of this one. I have to say, though, that for a first time guest, I was bowled away. The place has been remodeled or refreshed or something but they did a wonderful job. The decor is fresh and modern. There's a bar right next to the lobby which is really good.  The grounds are really impeccable. We noticed large river rock carefully placed in the planters, the plants and trees were all in good shape and the lawns looked freshly mowed The pool looked immaculate (though it was too cold to swim). The
Manager Response: Dear OregonRainGuy,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We recently took our entire Family to Disneyland and chose The Anaheim Hotel and were impressed! The price was competitive, their rooms clean! Comfortable beds, nice shower! A few minute walk to Disneyland. Great, accommodating staff. A bonus was Pizza Port which is connected to the hotel. They have great food and serve a great breakfast for a reasonable price! Happy Hour 2-6 with great prices. Would definitely recommend and would stay again. Great job!
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip614696,  Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear you had an exceptional stay with us! Great that our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We have been coming to this hotel for years now. It just gets better and better. The staff is very friendly very welcoming. The rooms are always clean. We look forward to coming back many many times. Great location
Manager Response: Dear Traveler35470073866,  Thank you for your feedback. Its always great to hear from a regular! We are thrilled to hear that your stays with us keep getting better and better. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: I would recommend them for their friendly staff, excellent trained people who care about having bilingual staff and also for the proximity to the Disney parks, excellent price and the very comfortable rooms
Manager Response: Dear Climber36572505412,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our staff as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We are a family of four and we can appreciate the spacious rooms. We can maneuver our double stroller into the room without any complications or having it be in the way. The beds are comfy and the prices are great. The staff has always been friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Gina G,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our spacious rooms fit your needs with the double stroller. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding our staff as we strive to provide a first class hospitality experience! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: PERFECT for us. Candi at Concierge EXCELLENT!
Summary: One block from Disneyland Entrance, lobby decor is hip retro modern, rooms have balconies and we watched fireworks! They have Disney Annual Passholder discount and a stay 6 nights get one night free if you book through them.
Manager Response: Dear RobinP841,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear all the kind comments regarding our hotel! We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Moved to 3 different rooms - Door lock failure, No W-Fi
Summary: We stayed for 4 nights 12/28-1/1. The first room we were given had a door safety failure -- the door plate secured to the wall where the lock is secured completely fell off. They offered to have maintenance look at it, but there was no way I would trust the safety of my family to a patched-up job -- and it was about 10 PM that night.  I had to work during the trip on Monday, 12/31 and was dismayed to learn there was no WI-Fi when I attempted to connect.  When I called the office on Friday night, I was told that the Wi-Fi was out for the property, but that I could come into the lobby and use the business center -- which consisted of a small cubby with 2 computers and hardly a comfortable place to work for 10 hours. The staff member was polite and said that they did not know when
Manager Response: Dear Serena,  We sincerely apologize for your experience at our hotel. We value guest feedback as it gives us the opportunity to improve the service and facilities that we provide, and we have since resolved the WiFi & door lock issues that you experienced. I am glad to hear Leo and the rest of our staff was courteous at all times. We would love to have the opportunity to provide you with a wonderful experience at our hotel, please contact our management staff should you decide to return in the future.  Regards,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, fine but not great
Summary: This fit the needs of me and my two friends on our recent trip to Disneyland, but I would hesitate before coming back here. The bathroom in our room did not seem 100% clean, but the beds and rest of the room were fine.  The staff was responsive when we had trouble with the air conditioner in our room. It was fixed within half an hour.  If you’re here for Disney and don’t plan to be in the room much it’s fine, but if you want to spend any time around the hotel this might not be the place for you.
Manager Response: Dear rsweetkind,  We are glad to hear our hotel fit the needs of you and your two friends on your recent trip to The Disneyland Resort. I do apologize about the cleanliness of your bathroom, our housekeeping staff normally takes great pride in providing our guests a clean environment. We appreciate the feedback and hope you would be willing to give us another try in the future!  Regards,  Hotel Management

Summary: Firstly, the location of the hotel of course is great for access to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure, they're a short 10-minute walk away. Plenty of paid parking available at the hotel too. There's also a pizza place in the hotel where you can easily get food. There are also a few food/drinks/convenient stores just across the road. The front desk service we received was warm and friendly.   Room wise, it was very spacious, but the walls were pretty thin. I could hear our neighbours pretty clearly even with all the doors and windows closed. The beds were mighty uncomfortable and I couldn't get proper nights' rest. The bed was lumpy and overly-bouncy. The bath also couldn't really drain properly and we would be standing in a flooded bath while it slowly drained. Guess
Manager Response: Dear adryll,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland, The Pizza Press restaurant, and the friendly service from our staff. We do sincerely apologize about the issues you had in the room and can assure you this is not a typical guest experience. Your feedback is appreciated and we hope that we will see you again in the future!  Regards,  Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Hotel for five nights during our Christmas trip to Disneyland. We were very happy with it. It is stunningly close to the parks - five minutes walk from the Harbor Blvd entrance. The grounds and rooms are clean and well kept. The restaurant and bar on site are great. I do wish customer service had been a bit friendlier, but I guess when you have a hotel this in demand (and this close to Disney) service isn’t at the top of the priority list. But that’s okay - I would definitely stay here again for park proximity and overall quality.
Manager Response: Dear Laura F,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel!  We are extremely pleased your party was able to take advantage of our location and enjoyed the Pizza Press and other facilities on property. Our staff strives to provide an incredible experience for our guests so we sincerely apologize if we did not meet those standards. We would love to provide a better experience and hope you consider us for your next Disney trip!   Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Location, location, location for Disneyland lovers!
Summary: The hotel is reasonably priced with very large rooms that are decently appointed and a large pool for the real swimmers among you. Plus, it’s less than 1 block from the Harbor Blvd entrance to Disneyland. The staff are very friendly and with a restaurant and bar on site, what more could you ask for? It’s not fancy but is great for families.
Manager Response: Dear SueFly57,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel!  We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed the facilities on property and our staff was able to make your visit more pleasant. We hope you consider us for your next Disney trip!   Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: From Valet to guest services A+
Summary: I wanted to take a few mins and thank a few people for making my holiday business trip wonderful. One individual stood out the most from the valet services Leo. He set the metion on my wonderdful experience by providing me the best customer service experience and was attentive and had a smile that illuminated my stay. Leo just wanted to say thank you and happy holifays  Will diffinatly be coming back thank you The Anaheim Hotel for hiring on the BEST.  Thank You J.
Manager Response: Dear Businessman49joey,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate Leo as he truly is a treasure to have part of our staff. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Over all was very nice. Would give it a 8 out of 10. More working ice machines would be nice. Liked the lobby bar and adjoining pizza place. Price could be a little lower and the added parking fee is a bit much. I'm staying at your motel, why chage me for parking there?
Manager Response: Dear Randy S,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear all the kind comments regarding our lobby bar and restaurant. We will share your feedback with our team so that we may continue to strive to provide a first class hospitality experience! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Business trip to Anaheim for a convention
Summary: The hotel did not look like the pictures online and overall paid way more money than I anticipated due to the 17% service charge, but Leo the concierge was so helpful and friendly. He recommended nice places to eat and visit while in town.
Manager Response: Dear Allison H,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize if your stay wasn't up to par. Unfortunately the Anaehim Resort does include a 17% tax on top of most charges. Leo is truly a treasure and are thrilled he is apart of our staff! We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: This hotel was awful  wasn't happy with the rooms . We had ajoining rooms with our kids one of there beds had blood on comforter . I went down and told front desk. They  took dirty comforter didnt clean anything else.
Manager Response: Dear Anaferra2,  Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize if your stay wasn't satisfactory. We will share your feedback with our team about the cleanliness so that your concerns are addressed. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We had a 3-day pass to Disneyland and this hotel was the perfect place to stay. It was a short walk to entrances to both DIsneyland and California Adventure as well as Downtown Disney. The room was large as were the dual bathroom sinks. There was plenty of room on the sink counter for my wife and I to have our toiletries. Each morning we filled our water bottles with lemon infused water from dispensers in the lobby. While this hotel, like all of the neighboring hotels, is old, it is well maintained. We were satisfied with the upkeep and the service.
Manager Response: Dear 408MartinK,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity to the parks fit your travel needs! We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and service. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We just stayed there recently in December 2018 and when we booked, they said the "king" room had been remodeled. So we thought great! But when we got there it was a whole other story. The room looked like the 70's. But that was just the beginning. It was old, dirty and worn out. The lamp shades were bent and cracked. The light itself leaned about 20 degrees. The finish on the lamps was all cracking  and comming off. The tile was all separated from the walls and bathtub. The caulking on the bath was separating and the enamel from the tub was lifting. The room door would shut, but you could see the light from outside all the way around the door along with all the cold air comming in!!!  The list goes on!!! Wish I could post pictures or videos which I took. MOTEL 6 IS BETTER! I
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize that you had less than an enjoyable experience. Please be assured we take all guest concerns as our top priority. We will place this room out of order to ensure it is fully inspected and the concerns are addressed. Please feel free to reach out directly if there is anything we can do for you!  Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Cozy little place, friendly staff, yummy food!!!
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for two night for a Disneyland getaway weekend.  We arrived early and our room was not quite ready so we left our luggage with the conseirge.  We went and had lunch at the pizza press, which was delicious!!! So good in fact we had a delicious breakfast there the next morning before heading to Disneyland. When we were able to check in, we met Leo.  He brought our luggage to our room for us and we had a nice conversation on the way.  To our surprise, our room had two king beds and not one and I am not complaining, lol.  Everything was clean and we even had a little welcome card with two fresh chocolate chip cookies to munch on.  We did notice we had to shut the door very hard and lift it up whereas it seemed the door hinge needed to be tighted at the
Manager Response: Thank you DISNEYBUCKETLIST,  We are so pleased to hear about your wonderful experience with us! We strive to provide the best customer service and accommodations possible to all of our guests. I will share your wonderful comments with our team here and hope to see you again very soon!  Best, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Pure crap hotel. They claim the have refurbished and remodeled. Pure lies!!!!! While it is across the street from Disneyland, that is about all that is accurate on their website.   This hotel is a one star at best. Lamps are falling apart  Open outlets are non existent, so charging your phone outside of the bathroom is impossible  Tile is falling apart  Paint is a mess, chipping and peeling  Front door does not seal, so light and cold air is just coming in.  There was someone else's hair all over my room. The toilet seat had hair on it.  The refrigerator is trashed and the worst frat house in the world would have already gotten rid of it. The beds have huge divets in them.   The manager told us he was going to give us a discount on our $200 a night room, and he took $50 off for
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really hope this company learns from their mistakes as I can tell I am not the only customer who had an unfortunately negative experience during their stay.  My husband and our best friends decided to stay here as our first leg of the honeymoon and enjoy a few days at Disneyland. My husband and I had stayed at this hotel prior to the change in ownership and have no negative comments but then this trip changed our minds completely.  I have never been more angry and disgusted by a management team. Our first day we didn't put the Do Not Disturb sign up on our door and came home from Disneyland at about 11:45pm and headed to sleep. The next morning my friend and I proceeded to head to the vanity to get ready. I notice that my coverup was missing immediately as it is just about the
Manager Response: Dear Jessica,  I am reaching out to you in hopes of rectifying our staff shortcomings during your recent honeymoon trip to Disneyland. I would like to sincerely apologize about your entire experience with your missing makeup and the lack of communication from our management team. I can assure you we have since been taking steps to improve our procedures of lost & found inquiries and documentation of these claims. We have sent you a private message in hopes of furthering this conversation to see how we may regain your loyalty to this hotel. Thank you for your time.   Sincerely,   Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights in the double room and loved it here. The room was clean and lots of towels were provided. The bed was comfy and they had plenty of USB ports as well as power points. The hotel is located an easy 5 minute walk from Disneyland, Disney California and Downtown Disney as well as having multiple food options such as Denny’s and IHOP literally a few doors down. The staff were fantastic especially the concierge Candi who sorted out our tours for us. The only downside was the room was very bright at night as we have a spotlight near the window the lit up our room. Overall fantastic place to stay on a budget We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Chloem0,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotels close proximity to Disney and several restaurants fit your travel needs. We are thrilled Candi was able to assist you with tours for you and your family. Truly we are grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Great place to stay with or without family, it is comfortable and nice. The beds are so soft and the room was very clean. The staff were so friendly. It is so close to Disney Parks entrance. I recomend it at 100%.
Manager Response: Dear Dherrejon,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff! Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We hope to see you next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.  Kind Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Had an amazing trip. Staff is super friendly. They arranged a scooter for my disabled mother.  The room  was very clean. They even gave us an upgrade.  Our passes for Disneyland were ready when we arrived.  And the price was perfect.  I will  definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear P9190CGannad,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I am glad to hear our staff was able to make your experience even more magical. We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed your visit and we look forward to seeing you again during your next Disney trip!   Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: I came with my family to enjoy Disneyland and attend a ducks game. Great location for both. Within easy walking distance to Disneyland. The restaurant is delicious. The staff was friendly. No complaints here.
Manager Response: Dear Austin K,  Your feedback is very much appreciated. Great to hear you enjoyed our hotels close proximity to both Disneyland and the Ducks game! We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel and staff. We hope to see you again next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: We recently stayed here for 3 nights.  Our room was not available when we arrived at noon, but we were able to do pre-checkin and they held our bags for us as we walked to the park which was literally a 5-10 min walk away.  I asked for a room on the top floor and was granted it.  Rooms have a fridge and were quite clean and comfortable.    However, the air in the area was very dry and we had dry lips, eyes and skin.  As a result we needed some hand lotion.  We didn't see any in the room so left a note for the maid on the bed and she took the note but didn't leave any lotion!  We asked again the second day and the same, took the note, but didn't leave any.  That night (after walking over 20,000 steps in the Disney parks) when again there was no lotion, we called the front desk to
Manager Response: Greetings niagaravisitor_11,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I sincerely apologize for the challenge regarding the requested amenity not being delivered to your room, we will speak with our staff to ensure our guest requests are met to the best of our ability. We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed your visit and we hope you consider us for your next Disney trip!   Best Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Clean rooms and close to Disneyland
Summary: We recently stayed at this property for our Disneyland trip 10/27-11/01. We enjoyed it and have no complaints. Our room was spacious and clean. Upon arrival we got a complementary upgrade and we could kinda see the park fireworks from the window. We enjoyed the pizza place, Pizza Press, connected to the hotel. It could get a little busy at the end of the evening from families trying to get in a meal before bed time. But other than it being loud, the food was really good. We didn’t have a chance to go swimming. The main reason we wanted to give this hotel a try was the distance to Disneyland. It’s a quick 10 min walk to baggage check. On our last night we received a noise complaint from the downstairs neighbor. To be fair, it was almost midnight, we had just got back to the room
Manager Response: Dear Lis_Naj13,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our hotel. We are thrilled our staff was able to accommodate a complimentary upgrade. It is always great to hear our hotels close proximity fits our traveler’s needs. Our team is truly grateful to have been allowed to be your host and hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Nice hotel, 50's décor but still modern, exceptionally friendly/helpful staff, easy walking distance to Disneyland entrance, on site good pizza restaurant.  Only downside is the shower water pressure which is almost non-existent and the fact that is vacillates between scalding hot to cold without warning.  Tough for children to shower.
Manager Response: Greetings Lisa S,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I sincerely apologize for the challenges your party encountered with the water pressure and temperature, we greatly appreciate the feedback and will have these concerns addressed. We are extremely pleased your party enjoyed your visit, that our staff and amenities improved your experience and we hope you consider us for your next Disney trip!  Best Regard, Steve Bernard

Summary Heading: I want to love this hotel, the location is great lobby wonderful and Pizza Express super
Summary: We had two rooms on out last visit, both in the same wing, we had no hot water for 5 days, out of the two rooms we had 2 warm showers, 1 hot shower and the rest were cold. One room had a huge gap under the door bugs were coming in at night. We did complain and were offered very little for the inconvenience I would have paid more to have a hot shower.  Love the Pizza Express, Love the bar in the lobby very classy, and love some of the staff, but can not recommend this hotel when my family does not want to go back.
Manager Response: Greetings S C,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Anaheim Hotel! I sincerely apologize for the challenges your party encountered during your visit with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback and will have these concerns regarding the water temperature and door spacing addressed. We are grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trips and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Best Regards, Steve Bernard

Summary Heading: Convenient but watch out for parking fees
Summary: The hotel is conveniently located a block from Disneyland. The rooms are a bit warned but comfortable. The parking fees are alright but to charge a parking fee on the day that you check out is ridiculous.
Manager Response: Dear Passenger44137377848,  Thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay. We are glad to hear that you found the property to be convenient and comfortable. As you stated, we do charge for parking at a rate of $12 per night and offer extended parking for the day of checkout at $12. We also offer luggage storage for guests wishing to enjoy a little extra time at the Resort. Thank you again for choosing the Anaheim Hotel!

Summary: The Anaheim Hotel, great service warm welcoming and friendly staff. We enjoyed our stay here. The Pizza Press was great we had breakfast and dinner service and portion of food was to high standards.Pizza Press being open till late 1am was a bonus, we arrived 12:30 am in the morning from Australia and the family had a snack before heading to our room, we really loved it! Wish Pizza Press can come to Australia !!
Manager Response: Hello Mr Michele D!  Thank you for the wonderful review! We are delighted to hear you loved the property and our onsite restaurant, The Pizza Press. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back next time your in the Anaheim Resort.  Regards,  Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Great value hotel near Disney.  Rooms were good size and staff was friendly.  Very walkable to stores and restaurants, as well as Downtown Disney. Would definitely recommend for kids (heated pool), and business (nice sized room with desk).
Manager Response: Dear Dreamer637731,  Thank you for the amazing review! We are absolutely delighted to hear that you had such a great experience and appreciate you taking the time to share about it on Trip Advisor. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!

Summary: The immediate area around Disneyland has many hotels that offer essentially the same thing, a place to stay while enjoying the park.  I've stayed in a number of them, and what differentiates the good from the bad is customer service.  Unfortunately, The Anaheim Hotel falls into the bad category.  Good customer service stems from managements attitude toward, not only it's customers, but it's employees as well, and the unempathetic attitude of management at The Aneiheim Hotel is pervasive.  The bottom line is: they don't care.  I made a reservation three months in advance, and called to check and see if we would be able to park a 22 foot small RV in th parking lot.  I was told by the representative I spoke with, (always get a name, I didn't!) that it would be fine, as it's the
Manager Response: Dear Jeff B,  We sincerely apologize for any miscommunication regarding our over-sized vehicle policy. Unfortunately we do not have the space to accommodate over-sized vehicles on property, which is why we have the policy listed online and in our confirmation emails. As you mentioned, we maintain a list of parking options for guests with over-sized vehicles to assist our guests as over-sized parking is extremely limited within the Resort area. Again, we sincerely apologize for any miscommunication or inconvenience this policy may have caused you and your family.   Sincere Regards,  Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland.
Summary: We flew in to LAX from Australia at 6am and caught a shuttle straight to The Anaheim Hotel.  We were very surprised at how nice and how big the lobby was, as it didn't cost too much for us to stay here.  They were happy to store our bags, and we got changed and headed straight to Disneyland.  We had take away pizza from their pizza restauramt for dinner that night and it was really great, we ate it cold for breakfast the next morning!  We were so very tired after the flights and a big day and the bed was very comfortable.  The pool area was really great for families and our room was very big and clean.  We only had one night, and they happily stored our bags again the next day.  When we bring our kids back to Disneyland next time we will definitely stay here.  It was such a
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the Anaheim Hotel! We are delighted to hear that you had such a great experience and found the Anaheim Hotel to be such a great value so close to the Disney Resorts. We look forward to welcoming the whole family back for the next visit!

Summary Heading: Good hotel very convenient to Disneyland
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice now. This time they had recently updated, mainly in the common areas.  *Beds are comfortable. *rooms are a normal size.  *some rooms have balconies you can watch fireworks from, which was very nice. *Friendly staff *Parking is $12 a night *Walking to/from parks is very quick. Amazing location.  *Quiet   The negatives are that it has a window air unit that is hidden behind a curtain... which means the air doesn't circulate and cool the room properly. I fixed that issue by using full water bottles to hold the curtain back. The room didn't seem to have been deep cleaned in a while. Needed a little sprucing.   I would recommend this hotel for it's location and overall comfort. I would just not expect anything fancy.
Manager Response: Dear Kathryn L,  Thank you for taking the time to provide such a detailed review. We really appreciate hearing feedback from our guests as it allows us the opportunity to improve our overall guest satisfaction. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to the Anaheim Hotel soon!  Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: I loved this place, very close to Disney entrance and the staff here is beyond friendly. I love the pizza place right next to it (extremely delicious). I would highly recommend this place, i would go back in a heart beat.
Manager Response: Dear daniela30180,  Thank you for the excellent review! We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback and for recommending us to future travels. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: The staff is really nice, friendly and most of all helpful. Hotel is clean! We got fresh towels every night. The pool and Jacuzzi is perfect after a long day walking at the Park. Candi at the concierge desk was super helpful at arranging our travel plans, park tickets, and bus tours. Atm, gift shop, pizza press... they all made our dream vacation the best it could have been. You can see the fireworks from your balcony. Walking distance from the park too!! I could not have been happier. I will be coming back soon!! Thank you for excellent service!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Convenient and the basics are clean
Summary: Such a great location to Disneyland! They accept scooter drop offs and you keep it in your room. Fabulous huge pool area with a disabled lift access to pool and hot tub. Daily parking fee. Staff were a huge help when I needed to go to a clinic after hours, they called in a doctor for me that is very familiar with extended health insurance. The basics are clean but the doors/walls could use a scrub, a few holes could be filled. Grounds are well maintained and I did see security walking around late at night. Laundry on site. Microwaves on request. Valet folks who handled the scooters were great, very personable. Staying in the 700’s you had a bit more road noise but conveniently close to the parking lot, where you can see the fireworks. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay here was made an unforgettable experience due to the wonderfully attentive and friendly staff, and beautiful surroundings. Leo went above and beyond to assist my family and I with anything that we needed. A special thank you to you Leo, you are what customer service is all about! Thank you also to Sabrina, Charles and Ajay who also shone! The relaxed but very professional atmosphere that is created here is worth experiencing for yourself. You cannot beat the location to Disneyland, very clean, perfect for any family, couples or singles. There is something for everyone. We are from Australia but want to come back and my children have said we are not staying anywhere else. We would stay here again in a heart beat.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in June of this year. I was really excited because it's right across the street from the parks, plus it was newly renovated. However, do NOT under any circumstances stay here. On our first night there, around 1245am, we were rudely and disgustingly awakened to finding ourselves covered in bed bugs. They were not only on my bed, but they were crawling all over my son. In fact, they were so active, we collected three of them and brought them to the front office. What was great was the front office said they would "courtesy" refund us for the night's stay, then told us they would follow up with us the next day. They never did - I called the department of health, and the county shut the room down due to an infestation. The room wasn't even properly sealed,
Manager Response: Dear luluthi529,  Thank you for your feedback. We apologize that you had less than an enjoyable experience. Please be assured we take all guest concerns as our top priority and all rooms receive preventative maintenance on a monthly basis. Please feel free to reach out directly if there is anything that can be done to retain your future loyalty.   Regards,  The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Have been to Anaheim many times before and I really loved this hotel. Only a two-minute walk to the Disneyland Entrance. The Room itself was massive and a great big bathroom area. Clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights.  On the 3rd  night a  mouse came into our room under the door.  Between the door and threshold is a 1 inch gap.  My husband was walking past the door and saw it run  in so he shooed it out with a towel.  Reported it to the front desk who assured us they would fix the gap the next day.  Nothing was fixed so we packed bath towels under the door to keep any more mice out. Found a small roach in the bathroom so I trapped it and left a note for housekeeping but never heard anything back.  Began zipping closed our suitcases after that. The girl that checked us in when we arrived hated me for some reason and was unnecessarily rude.  I told my husband I wanted to stay somewhere else because she was so unpleasant but we figured we would lose our deposit.  She
Manager Response: Dear V3593MYjims,  We apologize that you had such a poor experience during your recent stay. Unfortunately we do not have any notation of the incidents you mentioned in your review, but please be assured, that if management was notified of any of the above, we would have addressed quickly and efficiently. We have since shared your feedback with our entire team so that we can look into the issues mentioned and ensure they are all properly investigated and addressed as needed. We hope to have the opportunity to better accommodate you and your family in the future.   Sincere Regards,  Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Hotel last week.  We were so disappointed in the condition of the rooms--particularly the bathrooms.  For the price that we paid we expected so much more.  The rooms seemed run down and a bit unkempt--especially the bathrooms.  This hotel is convenient to Disneyland but that is the only advantage of staying here.  The check-in process was laborious.  The desk staff seemed confused even though I had confirmation emails in hand.  We will not stay here again or recommend it to any of our friends or family.  Poor value!
Manager Response: Dear KimOlsen,  We apologize that your experience was anything less than exceptional. We actually pride ourselves on the value we provide to our guests considering our proximity within the Resort and our recent property wide renovation project. We have shared your feedback with both our Housekeeping and Front Desk teams to ensure better efficiency and overall guest satisfaction in the future. We hope that you'll give us the opportunity to better accommodate you during your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.   Sincere Regards,  Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: WONDERFUL Resort and even better PIZZA!
Summary: We have stayed here three times in two months. The rooms are always clean and fresh!. They also offer an Annual Passholder discount for those that have an AP.  The pool is huge and you can lounge around and order drinks and food poolside. They have a gym and laundry room. Plenty of space for outside eating, relaxing, etc. Their lobby is big enough to relax and invite friends to chill. The bar is outstanding and staff are friendly, too! Gift shop, computers/internet, etc. Bathroom in lobby and bathrooms in the rooms are super big. Some rooms even have a patio that could be used to store your luggage/hang your items that need air dry.  Bar has happy hour for drinks and pizza.  Literally, a quick 7-8 minute walk to park. Easy-peasy!
Manager Response: none

Summary: First off the customer service here is wonderful! I've stayed here quite a few times while visiting Disneyland and the place keeps getting better. I recently took a solo trip to the park and got to the hotel very early. I asked the front desk if it was possible to park here and come back at 4pm to check in. The gentleman said no problem! We can get you pre checked in and you just have to come back at 4pm to pick up your room key. He even offered the lobby restroom to freshen up before I hit the parks. I was very pleased. I came back at 4pm, they had my reservation all set up I just picked up the key. The room was nice and clean. Two queen beds and a small fridge. It had a nice balcony, tip: I always request a top floor room, it's usually a little more quite. My only issue is the
Manager Response: Dear TwoGuysInTahoe,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our staff as we always strive for a first class hospitality experience. We are thrilled to hear that our team was able to assist you with a pre-registered check in which we believe makes it easy when you return from a tiring day from the park. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Perfect hotel. Very clean and big. Walking distance to Disneyland. Has ample parking. We could see the fireworks too from the hotel. This place has very friendly staff too. No negative comments at all
Manager Response: Dear Binara J,  Thank you for your feedback. It’s great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Hotel, is about 5 min walk to park gates, the pool and hot tub were awesome! Room was fine, nothing special, clean and very comfortable bed. Restaurant had great pizza and the little store has everything you could need. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear dac0578,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear you enjoyed our Olympic size pool and the hot tub! We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Anaheim Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary Heading: Super close to Disney, great stay
Summary: This is a great hotel - so close to the Disney parks and includes magic hours. It has a great restaurant for a spot of breakfast before heading out for the day. Rooms are nice as are the staff. The swimming pool is huge and really deep at one end. You can watch fireworks from Disneyland from the pool.  Great place and I would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear DMiz,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity to the parks fit your travel needs. We are thrilled to hear all the kind comments regarding our staff and hotel! We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope you will consider us next time you visit the Disney Resort!  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management Team

Summary: Even though they didn't have the room that we requested they took such good care of us! We had requested a king bed room, we didn't get in until about 11:00pm so they were all gone. But, because it was our Anniversary and didn't have the kido's with us, they upgraded us to a Suite and it was fantastic! We weren't in the room much, but when we were it was amazing! I would stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Goods and bads, not too clean
Summary: Stayed at The Anaheim Hotel for 3 nights in September. Had first floor room in building 1. Room was damp and musty the whole time. Not too clean, either- sticky floor, hair in tub, on floor). Noticed the musty smell more when the AC cycled.  Pool area is nice, landscaping is nice. Close to park entrance (not across, but close).  Had tried to call front desk few times and never had anyone answer. First, was looking for the wifi password. We pay for that in the hotel fee but need to ask for it?? Not given to us at check in, nor is it in the room. Also called, but went to the front desk for a microwave. The woman immediately called to have one sent to us but we never got it. So many choices in the area so I would only stay again if I got a super cheap price. (BTW- their website has
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked direct with the hotel, quoted prices for Kings and Queens.  Person from our party was backing out so I tried to change to the two queens at a much lower price as originally quoted.  I was told they had the queens but the price went up and they wouldn’t honour my previous price even though they had rooms available.  I thought that was pretty poor service on their part.  Check in was fine, room was large and I liked that the sink was apart from the bathroom.  Downside, you couldn’t have just the bathroom light on, it turned on lights by the sink as well which illuminated into the sleeping area.  Our bathroom was not well maintained, toilet seat had rips and cuts, bathtub looked disgusting.  Beds were comfortable. But the AC was extremely loud.  Cleaning of room was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location was perfect and accommodations exceptional. The family suite was perfect for our family. The pool was clean and great fun for the kids!! We came for Disney and was very pleased with The Anaheim! Your location right across the street was fabulous.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here several times before and after remodel.Before remodel this hotel was our last resort if no other hotel was available.Now it's our go-to!Hotel & rooms are great.Only thing is that in some of the rooms,some outlets still need to be changed out (loose connections,plug falls out). Bar is great place is relax after a long day at the park or you can take your drink back to your room if you prefer. Pizza press is very good and less crowded than eating in the parks.Staff is always friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel to stay in especially if you’re visiting Disneyland
Summary: We arrived a couple of hours before check in but were very happy they had a room ready for us already (executive with 2 king size beds). We were able to park right next to our block and carry our luggage upstairs to find we had a lovely, clean spacious room with 2 huge, extremely comfortable beds! The bathroom had a seperate large double basin area with the toilet/ bath/shower leading off it. So much room to spread out all our toiletries! The hotel is only 5/10 mins walk into Disneyland which is a big bonus. We tried the pool on our last day which was lovely. Plenty of sun beds and towels and a very good sized clean pool. A friendly, polite staff member came around every so often taking orders for drinks and food from your sunbed, if you wanted anything. Overall, the hotel was
Manager Response: none

Summary: Outdated and dirty hotel. Worst hotel I’ve ever been in. And, to make it worst, $240 first night, $400 second night. This hotel isn’t worth $50/night. If there wasn’t a large convention going on and other hotels were available, I would leave.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I do not know what any of the bad reviews are about!! This hotel was perfect for us, the room was clean & the beds are incredibly comfortable! The room was fully equipped with everything we could need & lovely toiletries supplied. The pool is lovely & free towels are provided. The hotel is literally a 5-10 minute walk away from Disneyland- the perfect distance! There are so many restaurants around & a few Walmart’s not too far away.  We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Great Upgrade to the Classic Hotel of Anaheim
Summary: Anaheim plaza recently got updated, and we love it. The lobby and the bar was a welcoming improvement. The family had a blast since it provides easy access to Disney and other places worth visiting in orange county. The place is quiet and parking is convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worst hotel I’ve ever been to
Summary: My family and I just stayed here for our trip to Disneyland. We have stayed at four other hotels in the area and we usually stick to a certain one, but decided to try The Anaheim Hotel because of the price. Big mistake. Our hotel key stopped working twice during our stay, we had a cockcroach in our room, the maids forgot to give us coffee two days in a row, our room didn’t get cleaned one day, I don’t think it was ever vacuumed, and the room made our allergies go crazy. The lower price was not worth it and we will definitely never stay here again
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights on a trip to Disneyland. It‘s super close to the park! Only a 5-10 minute walk down the road which was fantastic.  Plenty of parking available but $12 per night fee is a bit steep.   Our room was located on the second floor and we could see the firework show from our balcony which was cool. The room itself was quite big. The sheets were stained which was a bit worrying and the fridge had been unplugged. It took us awhile to realise the latter and it meant that all of our chilled items got very warm. Whilst trying to figure out why the fridge was not cooling we pulled the furniture forward and found left over food and cutlery. We left the furniture pulled out so the cleaners could clean it but when we returned nothing had been touched.   The shower
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great renovations to our much loved hotel
Summary: This was our 12th annual visit to this hotel, the second under the new management. You guys have done a great job in taking the hotel to a higher level. Love what you’ve done to the pool area, really smart. The rooms although still on the small side are much smarter & better equipped. An improvement area would be for your reception staff to read and act upon emails sent prior to check in. Offering more towels & pillows doesn’t compensate to sloppy front desk service. But you’re getting better. See you next year.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The place is very quiet and a close to the park if you decide to walk instead of drive to the park. We did have to wait as we arrived early from Las Vegas  but it all went smooth since we went out for breakfast. Also kim at the front desk made it easier as she interacted with us.
Manager Response: Dear Ericaliliaba83,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. Our sincere apologies about not being able to accommodate an early check in upon your arrival due to lack of available rooms at the moment. We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding “Kim” she truly is a gem to our staff. We hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Great hotel one block to Disneyland, staff amazing especially Leo, AJ, and Sabrina. Room had all the comforts required, mini bar, microwave. The Pizza Press attached to hotel,great breakfast and the best pizza with great service from staff in the Front Bar. Throughly enjoyed our stay,would recommend for families
Manager Response: Dear Vicky W,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We greatly appreciate all the kind comments regarding our staff Leo, AJ & Sabrina, they are truly a treasure to our hotel! We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a great location accross from Disney
Summary: The Anaheim is located across the street from Disney and makes for easy access for older kids and for parents to return to the pool on hot days. The pool is great with drink service and happy hour with the good pizza from Pizza Press is all you need. Rooms were large and clean with fridge, safe and other amenities. not a 5 star, but perfect for families.
Manager Response: Dear Gary A,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our hotels close proximity fit your travel needs. We are thrilled you enjoyed our Olympic sized pool along with our poolside service! We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: I have stayed here a couple of times. And plan on coming back later this year. The hotel has an awesome vintage old school  Vegas "rat pack" vibe. There's a pizza parlor attach to the hotel. In the bar they have a nice happy hour featuring local beers on tap. And for the kids can we say POOL. Bonus it's walking distance to Disneyland. The staff is super sweet and very helpful. A special shout out to my favorite staff member, Yesenia, her customer service is excellent... So if you're looking for a place to stay The Anaheim hotel might be right for you!!
Manager Response: Dear Lynne W,  Thank you for your feedback. It’s always great to hear from our returning guest. We are thrilled that you and your family enjoyed all our hotel amenities and that our close proximity to the parks fit your travel needs. Yesenia truly is a treasure to have among our staff. We look forward to seeing you later this year!  Kind Regards, Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: This is the first time my family and myself stayed here.  We loved the staff was friendly and very helpful upgraded us to a view room for me and my husband anniversary with the kids :)  Kids loved the pool was HUGE! This will be our go to hotel from now on when we visit Disney !!
Manager Response: Dear Kendra A,  Thank you for your feedback. Great to hear our staff was friendly and helpful and were able to provide a complimentary upgrade for your special occasion (congratulations once more!). We look forward to seeing you again next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: My family and I stayed at the Anaheim Hotel during our recent Disneyland vacation. The staff is amazingly friendly and helpful. The location is also great. It is within walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants as well. The rooms were clean and the staff kept the rooms and the grounds clean as well. I would say that the rooms could use an update in the bathroom, but that is my only issue with the hotel and it is minor. Overall, a great place to stay when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Robert F,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciably all the kind comments regarding our staff as we continue to strive to provide a first class hospitality experience. Great to hear our hotels close proximity to the parks and restaurants fit your travel needs. We are truly grateful you allowed us to be your host during your trip and hope to see you next time you visit the Disney Resort.  Kind Regards, The Anaheim Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed with family. Excellent service. Rooms clean. Guest service representative spontaneous. Breakfast was at the pizza press. Close to Disney. About a 5 minute walk. Highly recommend and would surely stay here again. Very satisfied.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice refurbishment need to be more efficient
Summary: Although the rooms were nice, the time it took to get in the room was too long. We wanted to rest and we couldn't because the room was not ready. More efficiency will serve you well so that travelers can get access to their rooms in a timely manner
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was amazing! Two street lights and you are walking onto the Disney property! The room had everything we could ask for including a mini fridge, microwave, and coffee maker. We grabbed room service before heading to the park, and the stuffed french toast was yummy. The staff was also wonderful, making sure we had all the disney info we needed including discounts (this hotel is considered a Good Neighbor by Disney). I will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I recently stayed here with my two boys, ages 11 and 13.  This is not a 5 star hotel and I will not hold it to the standards of a 5 star hotel. I am not knit picky enough to complain about one cracked tile or a wrinkle in the sheets. This hotel is amazing for the type of hotel it is and the price point!  It has a great location, right across from Disneys California Adventure (you can see the Guardians Tower from the hotel). The lobby is done in a retro 50's style and it extends to the olympic size swimming pool where they pipe in Frank Sinatra style music. Each employee we dealt with greeted us with a smile and went out of their way to meet all of our needs. We did have an incident where my son clogged the toilet and I had to call down to the front desk for assistance (talk
Manager Response: none

Summary: We absolutely enjoyed our stay at The Anaheim Hotel! The staff was very welcoming and accommodating we asked for a room with a patio and luckily there was one available and had no issues putting us in one. My kiddos enjoyed their stay as well, the MAJOR plus was it was soooo conveniently close to the parks! A few minutes walk to the main entrance, highly recommend this hotel worth every penny.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is good hotel for Disneyland trip since it is across the parks. Very easy to walk to parks (one block from entrance). Hotel offers good clean rooms. Showers are little bit older (water pressure is weak). You pay for parking but it is reasonable.  I did have problems since I stayed twice in this hotel and on my second stay they did not have my reserved room. They had to find different room. And when I went to that room, it was already occupied. This is was strange experience.  They did correct mistake.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You can't beat the value and convenience of The Anaheim Hotel. I have stayed at MANY hotels near the Disneyland Resort, and The Anaheim Hotel is our favorite.  I can't say enough about the staff, they are courteous, attentive and really go the extra mile.
